A helmet with a german klappvisor is an example of the highest armourer's art. It is easy to breathe in and through the widened visors it is much easier to see to the sides.
配有德国翻盖面甲的头盔，是盔甲锻造工艺的顶峰之作。佩戴此头盔亦可舒畅呼吸，其加宽的面甲可让佩戴者更轻易的观察侧边。
A helmet with a klappvisor in a fashionable round pattern. It is much better adapted to the face, so it is easier to breathe and the knight has a better view to the sides through the folded visors.
一顶带有时尚圆形翻盖面罩的头盔。它与脸部的贴合度更佳，使得穿戴者呼吸更为舒畅，还可通过翻盖面罩更好地观察侧面。
A helmet with a fashionable italian klappvisor. It is a good middle ground between price and armour durability. Lately, this helmet has become very popular among mercenaries.
配有时尚意大利风翻盖面罩的头盔。它在价格和耐用性之间达到了良好的平衡。最近，这款头盔深受雇佣兵的喜爱。

A foreign pointed helmet with a visor in the form of an iron mask. Cumans are said to have adopted it from wild nomads called Kipchaks, who are said to drink mare's milk from buffalo horns and live far out on the eastern steppes. The face with moustache perhaps represents some mythical progenitor of all these nomads.
一顶外邦人使用的尖顶头盔，带有铁制面甲。据说此种头盔是库曼人从称作“基普恰克人”的野蛮游牧民族那沿用而来，还有传闻称后者会用水牛角喝马奶，且生活在遥远的东部草原上。带胡子的面甲可能就象征着这些游牧民族的某个神话始祖。
A simple bridle consisting of a bit, cheekpieces, reins, headpiece and browband. The better the bridle, the greater the bonus on the horse's stamina and speed.
简易马勒，配有嚼环、颊片、缰绳、头带和额带。马勒的质量越好，对马匹耐力与速度的加成越大。
A simple bridle consisting of a bit, plated cheekpieces, reins, headpiece and browband. The better the bridle, the greater the bonus on the horse's stamina and speed.
简易马勒，配有嚼环、镶板颊片、缰绳、头带和额带。马勒的质量越好，对马匹耐力与速度的加成越大。
A simple bridle consisting of a bit, cheekpieces, reins, headpiece, browband and noseband. The better the bridle, the greater the bonus on the horse's stamina and speed.
简易马勒，配有嚼环、颊片、缰绳、头带、鼻带和额带。马勒的质量越好，对马匹耐力与速度的加成越大。
Leather harness with crenellations and loose hanging straps. Helps with balance, slightly improves carrying capacity and makes the horse more courageous. However, it limits its speed and stamina.
配有锯齿状物和松垂带子的皮制马具。此物有助于保持平衡，略微提高负重能力，可使马更加勇敢。但是，它也限制了马匹的速度和耐力。

Leather harness with loose hanging straps decorated with rosettes. Helps with balance, slightly improves carrying capacity and makes the horse more courageous. However, it limits his speed and stamina.
配有松垂带子和花饰图案的皮制马具。此物有助于保持平衡，略微提高负重能力，可使马更加勇敢。但是，它也限制了马匹的速度和耐力。

Leather harness with loose hanging straps decorated with rosettes. Helps with balance, slightly improves carrying capacity and makes the horse more courageous. However, it limits his speed and stamina.
配有松垂带扣和花饰图案的皮制马具。有助于保持平衡，略微提高负重能力，可使马更加勇敢。但是，它也限制了马匹的速度和耐力。
Versatile saddle with reinforced cantle. It extends the horse's carrying capacity only modestly. But the effect on its speed is also negligible.
鞍尾经过加强的多功能鞍具。略微提升马匹的负重能力，但对其速度的影响微乎其微。
Lightweight saddle with reinforced saddle pads and a rear cantle. It extends the horse's carrying capacity only modestly. But the effect on its speed is also negligible.
配有经过加强的鞍垫和后鞍桥的轻型鞍具。略微提升马匹的负重能力，但对其速度的影响微乎其微。
Saddle with slightly raised cantle. It extends the horse's carrying capacity only modestly. But the effect on its speed is also negligible.
鞍尾略微抬高的鞍具。略微提升马匹的负重能力，但对其速度的影响微乎其微。
An arrow made in large numbers ideal for military deployment in large numbers.
量产的箭矢，适合在战场上大量使用。
A bolt made in large numbers ideal for military deployment in large numbers.
量产的弩箭，适合在战场上大量使用。
Ammunition for firearms, suitable for immediate use. The powder is faded and the ball is a little conical.
火器的弹药，可随时使用。火药已褪色，而弹丸略呈锥形。
An egg laid by a black rooster and brooded by a frog. Perhaps it gained magical abilities, or maybe just a slime shell.
一颗由黑公鸡产下、由青蛙孵化的蛋。或许它被赋予了魔力，也可能只是一个软壳蛋。
This die will not only secure me an easy win but also grant me entry into select circles.
这颗骰子能让我轻松取胜，还能让我跻身一些特殊的社交圈。
An egg laid by a rooster, or a very strange hen.
一颗由公鸡，或是古怪母鸡下的蛋。

This is how you make meat dumplings. Finely chop your beef, or better yet, crush it in a mortar, if you have one. Add the parsley, egg and salt, knead well and add some flour for thickening. Then artfully form the dumplings and fry them in lard.
以下是制作肉丸的方法，将牛肉切碎（用研钵更佳），加入欧芹、鸡蛋和盐，充分揉搓，并加入一些面粉来增稠。最后揉成球状，放入猪油中油炸。
Nothing goes better with everyday work in the fields than some good beef jerky.
在田间劳作时，咬上一口美味的风干牛肉，真是太爽了。
Great meat suitable for many dishes. It is best served with a white cream sauce.
百搭的优质肉类，最好配上白色奶油酱享用。
Liquid bread, a satisfying drink that also fills the belly. Don't overdo it, lest you succumb to alcoholism.
液体面包，一种称心的饮料，还能填饱肚子。但不要喝太多，免得你变成酒鬼。
This beer is brewed by the innkeeper Betty herself and some say that maybe she should stop.
旅店老板贝蒂亲自酿造的啤酒，有人说她该停手了。
Beet can be eaten even raw. It's really healthy.
甜菜甚至可以吃生的。真的很健康。
Beet is a very healthy vegetable. Cooking it does not change anything.
甜菜是非常健康的蔬菜，烹饪不会影响它的营养价值。
The old rusty sword is probably somehow connected with the dark past of the innkeeper Beikovetz.
这把老旧的锈剑可能与旅馆老板贝科维茨的黑暗过往有某种关联。
A belt is primarily used to hold weapons, which are then much easier and faster to access. Of course, the amount of things that can be attached to the belt is limited.
腰带主要用于挂载武器，即可更方便迅速地取用武器。当然，腰带上能挂载的武器数量是有限的。
If a blacksmith doesn't have a hammer, the first thing he must forge is a hammer, but...
如果铁匠没有锤子，他就得先锻造一把锤子，可是……
A woman's wedding dress full of dust with a dried bloodstain. The ruined dress has been lying here for a long time, but it's still neatly folded. Interesting…
一件女式婚纱，满是灰尘，沾染的血迹已经干涸。这件破损的婚纱已经放置许久，但仍然折叠整齐，真是耐人寻味……
Kidneys are healthy if you do not eat them too often. Stew them and serve with some mushrooms.
只要不吃得太频繁，动物肾脏就是有益于健康的。可以炖煮后配一些蘑菇享用。

Here is a good way for preparing wild boar meat. Cook the meat until tender. Crumble some bread and boil it in beer, add a little vinegar and salt. Slice some apples and fry them in lard. Then serve everything together You can also prepare pork and beef this way, but trust me that wild game meat is the most delicious.
这是一种不错的野猪肉烹饪方法：先将肉煮至嫩滑；然后将面包捣碎，放入啤酒中煮沸，再加入少许醋和盐；最后切一些苹果，用猪油煎炸。准备完毕后，把所有的食材放到一起就是美味的一餐。这种方法也适用于猪肉和牛肉，但相信我，野猪肉是最好吃的。
Hunting boar is dangerous, so boar meat is a show of strength, courage and a well-deserved delicacy.
狩猎野猪很危险，所以野猪肉代表着力量和勇气，也是当之无愧的美味佳肴。
The taste of a poacher's long winter evenings.
偷猎者漫长冬夜的滋味。
A piece of lightly spiced boar meat with an unmistakable taste.
加入了少量香料的野猪肉，味道十分独特。
You can serve boar leg with rosehip sauce or cabbage, but never cook it the same way twice in a row.
野猪腿可以搭配玫瑰果酱或者卷心菜，但记住不要连续两次用同一种配方。
A prime piece of a boar meat, juicy and tasty. Prague burgher Havel of Silberstein liked it very much and used to prepare it in a special way called wild boar on venison.
一块优质的野猪肉，美味多汁。布拉格人哈维尔·西尔伯斯坦非常喜欢这种肉，还发明了一种野猪肉配鹿肉的烹饪方式。
A ring given to me by the refugees from the mill as a thank you for God's blessing.
磨坊里的难民送给我的戒指，用以感谢上帝的庇佑。
An estimable fruit of the Bohemian lands, tasty boiled or roasted, with meat or porridge.
波西米亚生长的珍贵菌类，煮熟或者烘烤，搭配肉类或者白粥，都极美味。
Nothing can mend this irrepairable damage to the dignity of this once fine and dandy bolt.
这支曾经华丽的弩箭所受的损害早已无法修复。
A cheap, homemade bolt. It's unbalanced and veers off, but it's hard to tell exactly where.
廉价的自制弩箭。未进行平衡调节，射击路径易偏离，而且很难确切判断偏离的方向。
A bolt with a serrated tip to increase damage and bleeding.
箭头呈锯齿状的弩箭，可提升伤害、加剧流血效果。
A balanced bolt with serrated tip to increase damage and bleeding.
平衡良好的弩箭，箭头呈锯齿状，可提升伤害、加剧流血效果。
A balanced bolt for hunting game.
A balanced bolt with a piercing effect against a variety of armours.
能够穿透多种护甲的平衡弩箭。
A balanced bolt with good range and high accuracy.
射程更远、精确度更高的平衡弩箭。
A bolt slightly better balanced than a regular bolt.
一支比常规弩箭平衡性更强的弩箭。
A bolt suitable for hunting game.
A regular crossbow bolt. It won't fail or surprise.
A bolt capable of piercing a variety of armours.
能够穿透多种护甲的弩箭。
A bolt with great range and high accuracy.
射程更远、精确度更高的弩箭。
An excellent bolt for practice shooting, but otherwise useless.
用作射箭练习的绝佳弩箭，除此之外毫无用处。

The tied cap is worn by women and girls not only at work, it is also a sign of their status. According to the custom of the time, married women should not be seen in public without their hair covered.
妇女与少女都会在工作中穿戴这种系带帽，这也是她们身份的象征。根据当时的习俗，已婚女性不可在公共场合露出头发。

A quilted cap is worn by women and girls not only at work, it is also a sign of their status. According to the custom of the time, married women should not be seen in public without their hair covered.
妇女与少女均会在工作中穿戴这种绗缝帽，这也是她们身份的象征。根据当时的习俗，已婚女性不可在公共场合露出头发。
When working hard in the fields, men and women protect themselves from the sun by wearing straw or wicker hats.
在田里辛苦劳作时，人们会戴上草帽或藤帽来防晒。

A simple bonnet is worn by women and girls not only at work, it is also a sign of their status. According to the custom of the time, married women should not be seen in public without their hair covered.
妇女与少女均会在工作中穿戴这种简易软帽，这也是她们身份的象征。根据当时的习俗，已婚女性不可在公共场合露出头发。
Comfortable lace-up leather boots that tightly wrap around the their wearers ankle are in fashion among nearly every class of society.
舒适的系带皮靴，紧紧包裹着穿着者的脚踝，几乎在每个社会阶层都很流行。
Low courtiers shoes with a raised curved toe, a contemporary fashion fad. Worn mainly by the wealthier people, the burghers or the nobility.
低帮侍臣鞋，鞋尖弯弯翘起，是当代的时尚潮流。主要由富裕人士、市民或贵族穿着。
Jester's shoes, with a bell on a toe, jingle as he walks. Sometimes it's amusing, sometimes infuriating.
小丑的鞋子，鞋尖上配有铃铛，走路时会发出叮当声。时而让人欢悦，时而又惹人窝火。

Solid shoes with buckles that stand out for their durability and strength. They reliably protect your feet and give them a little comfort. A great choice for long-distance pilgrimages - to the Holy See in Rome, to the Holy Sepulchre in Jerusalem or to the end of the world in Santiago.
结实的扣带鞋，以耐用性和坚固性著称。能够有效保护双足，并提供些许舒适感。非常适合用于长途的朝圣之旅——无论是前往罗马的圣座、耶路撒冷的圣墓，还是抵达世界尽头的圣地亚哥。
Plain, ankle-high lace-up boots with a raised toe, suitable for wealthy travellers and poor vagrants alike.
简朴系带靴，高至脚踝，鞋尖翘起，富旅者与穷浪子均可穿戴。
Unobtrusive boots that protect the foot and strengthen the ankle, making them suitable for most jobs. They're not the most expensive, which is why they're worn by every hired hand or craftsman.
不起眼的靴子，能够保护足部，稳固脚踝，因而适用于大多数工作。这种鞋并不昂贵，因此每位雇工或工匠都会穿着。
These shoes should not be visible in the game.
这些鞋不应该在游戏中被看到。
Tall leather boots with lacing and raised toe. They are popular especially among wealthy burghers.
高筒系带皮靴，鞋尖翘起，尤其在富裕市民中广受欢迎。
The Cumans are feared opponents especially for their mounted archery, and they adjust their equipment accordingly. Their riding boots meet the demands for both comfort and confidence in riding.
库曼人因其骑射技艺而令人畏惧，而且他们还对装备进行了相应的优化，以至于骑行用靴在舒适度上表现出色，且提高了骑手的自信。
A pair of mid-calf-high boots, practical for most every day activities, and can even be wornn to social events.
鞋帮较高的中筒系带靴，十分实用，适合大多数日常活动，即使在社交场合中穿着也不显尴尬。
You need proper footwear for the forest. The hardy hunter will find the terrain challenging. Treacherous rocks, slippery mud and miles of forest undergrowth.
行走在森林中，你理应穿着合适的鞋子。即便是顽强的猎人也深知树林内地势险要，遍布危险的山岩、滑溜的泥泞地以及连绵的灌木丛。
Decorated high men's boots with a raised toe, made of quality leather. They are designed for the richest.
装饰精美的高筒男靴，鞋尖翘起，由优质皮革制成，专为富裕之人而设计。
Simple riding boots below the knees tightly encircle the shins and ankles and give the rider confidence in controlling the horse.
低于膝盖的简易马靴，紧紧包裹着小腿和脚踝，可让骑手在骑行时更加自如。
They're just ordinary shoes, don't look for the brand on them. But what kind of set would it be if it didn't have shoes?
它们都只是普通的鞋而已，别在上面找牌子。可如果一套装扮连鞋子都没有，还算什么套装呢？
A longbow made of young hazel wood. While it may not be the strongest longbow, but it can still handle small game or the occasional cheeky bandit.
使用幼年榛木制成的长弓。虽然它或许不是最强的长弓，但仍然可用于应付小型猎物或偶尔碰上的狡猾强盗。
A homemade weak bow made of hazel wood. It's not very strong or accurate, but it'll do for a rabbit or a fox.
自制简易弓，材质取自榛树木材。此弓威力与准度并不出众，但解决一只野兔或狐狸并不再话下。
A homemade weaker bow made of dogwood. It's a little stronger than a hazel bow, but that's about it. It'll do for poaching small game, though.
由梾木制成的自制弓，威力较弱，但稍强于榛木弓，不过也仅此而已。尽管如此，亦适用于猎取小型猎物。
A homemade stronger bow made of elm. Elm wood is flexible and hard to split, so it is excellent for making very precise bows.
榆木制成的自制弓，威力更强。榆树木材柔韧，不易裂开，因此非常适合制作精准无比的弓。
Hunting bows are supposed to be strong enough to bring down larger game. This bow is made of dogwood and is therefore one of the weaker hunting weapons.
要想猎杀大型猎物，猎弓就应当足够强大。这把弓由梾木制成，以至于它也不过是把威力不足的弓。

Hunting bows are supposed to be strong enough to bring down larger game. This bow is made of ashen wood and is therefore one of the stronger hunting weapons that are still easy to handle. Most experienced gamekeepers and poachers will rely on it.
要想猎杀大型猎物，猎弓就应当足够强大。这把弓由白腊木制成，因此是把威力相对强劲的弓，且易于操持。大多经验老道的猎手和偷猎者都对其有所依仗。

Hunting bows are supposed to be strong enough to bring down larger game. This bow is made of elm, but it is still a bit stiffer than it should be. It's almost as if it was made to hunt two-legged vermin.
要想猎杀大型猎物，猎弓就应当足够强大。这把弓由榆木制成，但比预想中要稍显僵硬。很大程度上，它似乎是为了猎杀恶徒而生。
A long strong bow made of elm. It can hardly be compared to the famous English longbows, but it can still do a lot of damage both in the woods and on the (war) fields.
榆木制成的长弓。尽管难与赫赫有名的英格兰长弓相提并论，但是无论是在树林里还是在战场上，它均能造成可观的伤害。
A long strong bow made of ashen wood. It has a decent range and thanks to its draw speed it is suited very well for fighting.
白腊木制成的强劲长弓。射程可观，且得益于拉动其弓弦的速度，这把弓非常适合用于战斗。

Hunting bows are supposed to be strong enough to bring down larger game. This bow is made of yew, and besides an inattentive deer, it can also torment many a trapper, if he is not wearing an iron skin.
要想猎杀大型猎物，猎弓就应当足够强大。这把弓由紫杉木制成，除了尚不留神的鹿以外，它还能给许多捕猎者带来麻烦，前提是他们没有穿着坚甲。
The finest hunting bow you can get your hands on. It's strength and accuracy makes it perfect for hunting big game.
这是你能得到最好的一把猎弓，是猎鹿的绝佳利器。此弓威力出众，准度惊人，足以击杀大型猎物。
A valued halberd of Sir Jan Posy of Zimburg, which he lost when Cumans ambushed him.
齐姆博格的扬·“花骨朵”爵士的珍贵长戟，在遭受库曼人伏击时遗失。
They say not to bite the hand that feeds you. And if you can feed yourself, just stuff your belly and shut up.
人们常说不要恩将仇报。当你能自食其力时，就低头吃你的面包，少说两句。
A plaited, crusty white bread roll, smells wonderful and tastes just as good.
一种打褶的、有硬壳的白面包卷，吃到嘴里就像闻起来那样，味道极好！
This breviary is a small but invaluable guide for daily spiritual consolation.
这本祈祷书虽小，却能提供无价的精神安慰。
The Breviary contains psalms, prayers and stories from the lives of the Saints and is therefore an invaluable aid for the salvation of the soul of every Christian who can read.
这本祈祷书包含诗篇、祈祷和圣人故事，对于每一个能读书的基督徒来说，它都是能拯救灵魂的无价之宝。

Folded armour made up of a number of forged plates hammered side by side under a leather vest of good cowhide. A well-made brigandine has the individual plates folded so that they overlap slightly. Compared to a plate cuirass, it is a little cheaper to make, but still a very expensive part of a warrior's armour.
折叠式盔甲，由多块锻造板组成，且在优质牛皮背心下经过并排捶打而成。这是一件制作精良的板甲衣，各部分金属板稍微重叠。与板甲胸甲相比，它的制造成本稍低，但仍是战士盔甲中非常昂贵的一种。

Folded armour made up of forged slats hammerd on a leather vest is a slightly older form of protection than the fashionable metal cuirass. Both provide similar protection, but the brigandine is a bit heavier, but there are warriors who will not let it go. This one's been through a lot, though, and has had more than one owner. Most certainly haven't given her up willingly.
由钉在皮革背心上的锻造板条组成的折叠盔甲，与时尚的金属胸甲相比稍显古老。尽管两类护甲都具有相似的保护性，但是这款板甲衣更重，却仍有战士不愿舍弃它。这件盔甲已久经沙场，也曾有过不止一个主人。显然，他们中的大多数人都是战败后才不得不放弃这件盔甲。

One of the best folded armours you can get. The individual hardened plates overlap perfectly, making the brigandine very durable. In addition, a lower fauld is attached to the vest, so the armour covers not only the torso, but also the warrior's groin.
这是你能得到最好的折叠盔甲之一。各部分硬化的板片完美重叠，使得此板甲衣非常耐用。此外，外套下方还附有裙甲，不仅能够覆盖躯干，还能保护战士的腹股沟。

Composite armour according to an Italian tradition. It is actually a fake plate cuirass sewn into cow leather. Its arched belly disperses blows better than ordinary lamellae. The armour is also fitted with a wide skirt at the bottom, so that it covers the knight's groin.
意大利的传统复合盔甲。主体由缝在牛皮中的仿板甲护胸构成，其拱起的腹部设计比普通的甲片更能分散打击力度，在盔甲的下摆装有宽裙边，用于保护穿戴者的下体。
The metal cuirass with folded falds creates excellent protection for the torso and groin of the knight. The falds are also made from slats, so they can be easily moved and worn on a horse.
这件带有折叠裙甲的金属胸甲为骑士的躯干和腹股沟提供了妥善的保护。裙甲同样由板条制成，因此可使穿戴者轻松移动，骑马时亦可穿戴。
Simple arm and forearm armour composed of individual lamellae supplemented with elbow guards called couters.
由多张单独薄片制成的盔甲，保护整个手臂，并配备了肘甲用于护肘。
Full arm protectors consisting of forged slats mounted on solid cowhide leather, supplemented by shoulder protection in the form of simple forged rondels.
由锻造的板条组成的全臂护具，被固定在结实的牛皮上，还配有简易锻造的圆板形肩部护具。
Arm protectors consisting of overlapping hardened slats hammered on cowhide leather.
手臂护具，由钉在牛皮革上的重叠硬化板条组成。
Arm and forearm guards composed of leather parts with hardened lamellae and plate couters and pauldrons.
由皮革，硬化甲片，板甲护肘以及肩甲组成的臂铠，可以保护整个手臂。
Excellent full arm protectors composed of sheet metal parts and supplemented by laminar shoulder pads.
优质的全臂护具，由金属板件组成，并配有层叠肩甲。
The rest of a polearm weapon. Just add a bucket for a head, some old rags, some other junk for hands, and instead of villains, the poor pole will be scaring away crows in the field.
一把长柄武器的残余部分。只需添上一个桶作头，再加上一些旧布、废品当作把手，这根可怜的长柄武器将不再用于制裁恶棍，而是用来赶走田地里的乌鸦。
A beautiful jewel with a stone in the colour of the depths of a forest pool. Many girls' hearts will be enchanted, but what can be done, it's still just a polished brass.
一件美丽珠宝，镶嵌着一种色泽如森林池塘般深邃的宝石。许多女孩都会为之心醉，但它不过只是块抛光过的黄铜而已。
An exquisite piece of jewellery made of gold decorated with a nobleman's coat of arms. Such marked pieces pose a considerable danger to thieves and must therefore be sold or melted down quickly.
一件由黄金制成、饰有贵族纹章的精美珠宝。这类带有明显标记的珠宝对小偷来说可是极大的烫手山芋，因此必须尽快出售或者溶炼。

Try putting a beautiful brooch like this on a beggar's skirt and you'll be thrown straight into the jail. You could be king and no one would believe it belongs to you. Clothes make the man, as Lord Capon and I already know.
试试看把这样一枚漂亮的胸针别在乞丐的裙子上，你会立刻被扔进监狱。即使你是国王，也没人会相信它属于你。正如卡蓬领主和我早已知晓的那样，人确实得靠衣装。
It's the way of the world that clothes and especially jewellery make the woman. And how many slaps have been given cause of women's pride and men's vanity!
衣服，尤其是珠宝，往往能定义一个女人，世事便是如此。因女性自尊和男性虚荣而引发的争执，可谓数不胜数！
Why do people succumb to vanity? Man should think more of his salvation than of earthly goods. Especially when there are people who need them more than he does.
人们为何会屈服于虚荣？他们就应该多关注自己的内在救赎，而非世俗之物，尤其是当有人比他更需要那些世俗之物的时候。
I don't know much about jewellery making, but this is a really nice piece. The decoration is done in enamel, which is like stained glass... And the silver underneath isn't bad either.
我对珠宝制作了解不多，但这件真的很漂亮。它的装饰物由搪瓷制成，就像着色的玻璃......下面的白银质量也不差。
In ancient times, copper was a very rare metal for making jewellery and weapons. Today it is mainly used for the production of tinware and for the smelting of other metals.
在古代，铜是非常珍贵的金属，可以用来制作珠宝和武器。如今它主要用于生产锡器和冶炼其它金属。

A cross guard, also known as quillon. It serves to protect the swordsman's hands from the opponent's blade. It can also be used to execute a grappling hold or strike to an unprotected face. In sword making, it is put on the blade's tail before the hilt is made and the pommel is put on. In cheap weapons made by poor blacksmiths, it will loosen over time and begin to clink unpleasantly.
剑格又称剑镡，用于保护剑士的手，防止被对手的剑刃伤到，还可以用在近距离缠斗中，或是殴打对方未经防护的脸。在锻剑的过程中，安装剑柄和剑首配重之前会先将剑格放置在剑刃尾部，如果制作水平不高，剑格会随着时间推移变得松弛，并发出令人不快的声响。
A mixture of nails, rivets and wires. Everything a good blacksmith needs to hold his work together.
一些钉子、铆钉和钢丝的混合物，足够让熟练的铁匠完美地固定他的作品。
Malleable iron of questionable quality. It is a mixture of various scrap and waste iron. But as every blacksmith knows, no iron can go to waste.
品质存疑的可锻铁。它是各种废料和废铁的混合物。但对于铁匠来说，任何一点铁都不能浪费。
Good quality malleable iron. The iron is soft, but nicely homogenous, so it can be used well for most blacksmithing products.
优质的可锻铁。铁质地柔软但均匀，可用于大多数锻造产品。

The end of the hilt of the sword. It is struck against an iron tang, which is then hammered and the pommel is thus fixed. It serves mainly to balance the whole weapon and as a counterweight to the long blade. In swordfighting, it prevents the weapon from slipping out of the hand, but it can also be used to grip and extend the hilt of the sword. Some swordfighting techniques use the pommel to deliver crushing blows to the opponent's face.
剑首在剑柄的末端，通过锤击固定在握柄上。它的主要作用是作为长剑刃的配重来平衡整把武器的重心。在剑斗中，它还可以防止武器从手中滑落，也可以用来持握，变相延长剑柄的长度。在一些剑术技巧中，也会使用剑首重击对手的脸。

Steel is an alloy of iron, carbon and other elements, and is the main material for the manufacture of weapons and armour. It is valued for its hardness and durability, but it is also very flexible, a quality that a good blacksmith must know how to work with.
钢是铁、碳和其他元素的合金，是制造武器和盔甲的主要原料。因为其高硬度和坚韧性得到广泛使用，同时它也十分柔韧，这些都是一名优秀铁匠必须了解的特性。

Toledo was already a city of blacksmiths and sword makers in the days of the ancient Holy Roman Empire. But the secrets of the local craft have been closely guarded by the local guilds for centuries. Toledo's steel is considered to be some of the finest that can be found.
托莱多自古神圣罗马帝国时代起就是铁匠和剑匠之城，但当地的工艺一直作为机密受到行会的严密保护。托莱多产的钢铁是世界上最好的钢材之一。

Steel is an alloy of iron, carbon and other elements, and is the main raw material for the manufacture of weapons and armour. It is valued for its hardness and durability, but it is also very flexible, a quality that a good blacksmith must know how to work with.
钢是铁、碳和其他元素的合金，是制造武器和盔甲的主要原料。因为其高硬度和坚韧性得到广泛使用，同时它也十分柔韧，这些都是一名优秀铁匠必须了解的特性。

Ebony, Zebrano, Rosewood and other exotic woods have been valued since ancient times for their extraordinary hardness and beautiful colour palette. It is used to make fancy furniture, weapons or chess pieces.
自古以来，乌木、斑马木、红木和其他异国木材因其超凡的硬度和美丽的色彩而备受珍视。它们被用来制作精美的家具、武器或棋子。
The key to the bedchamber shared by the bathwenches at Adam's bathhouse.
一把钥匙，能够打开亚当的澡堂中女工们共用的卧室。
A hood left at the bathhouse by a drunk.
一顶被醉汉遗留在澡堂的兜帽。
Someone spilled something on this shirt while drinking at the baths.
有人在浴场喝酒的时候把什么脏东西洒在了这件衬衫上。
These miparti hose can't be used anymore unless a tailor looks at them. They're torn lengthwise.
除非有裁缝修补，不然这条紧身裤就没法再穿了。它纵向撕裂得非常严重。
A discarded tankard left at the baths after a great celebration.
一次盛大的庆祝活动过后，遗留在浴室的酒杯。
The key to Adam's sleeping quarters in the loft.
亚当在阁楼上睡觉地方的钥匙。
A hat that smells really bad. I don't know what happened to it at the celebration, and I don't want to know. I'll never put it on my head.
一顶臭不可闻的帽子。至于它在宴会上到底经历了什么，我也毫无兴趣，总之绝不会把它戴在自己头上。
A chemise that was left at the bathhouse after the celebrations.
一件在庆祝活动后遗留在澡堂的衬衣。
Paint wiped off the bull. Slightly diluted with blood...
公牛身上擦掉的颜料，还略带血迹......
Cabbage is a common ingredient of meals - and a healthy one at that!
卷心菜是一种常见食材——而且十分有营养！
Cooked cabbage can be served with meat, in soups or just on its own.
熟白菜可以搭配肉食，可以煲汤，也可以直接吃。
A caftan is a long men's overcoat with long sleeves. It is a traditional part of the male dress of nomads from the eastern steppes. It fastens at the chest with a series of ornate buttons.
长袍是一种长袖男士外套，是东部草原游牧民族传统男装的组成部分。这件长袍有多只精美纽扣系至胸前。
A caftan is a long men's overcoat with long sleeves. It is a traditional part of the male dress of nomads from the eastern steppes. This one is heavily decorated with an embroidered hem.
长袍是一种长袖男士外套，是东部草原游牧民族传统男装的组成部分。这件长袍的边缘饰有精美的刺绣。
A Caftan is a long men's overcoat with long sleeves. It is a traditional part of the male dress of nomads from the eastern steppes. This one is also quilted for better durability.
长袍是一种长袖男士外套，是东部草原游牧民族传统男装的组成部分。这件长袍经过绗缝，进而拥有更好的耐用性。
A caftan is a long men's overcoat with long sleeves. It is a traditional part of men's clothing in many eastern cultures. This one has rich oriental decoration.
长袍是一种长袖男士外套，是许多东部文化中传统男装的组成部分，而这件长袍则饰有丰富的东方装饰。
A caftan is a long men's overcoat with long sleeves. It is a traditional part of the male dress of nomads from the eastern steppes. This one has was made for more comfortable riding.
长袍是一种长袖男士外套，是东部草原游牧民族传统男装的组成部分。这件长袍便是为了提升骑行舒适度而制作的。
Felt hats are generally popular for their durability and ease of shaping.
毡帽通常因其耐用性和易塑形性而广受欢迎。
From under this chaperon came strong talk and would-be wisdom. The owner, despite his undeniable knowledge of proverbs and aphorisms, is surely already burning in hell.
这顶风帽下传来了强硬言辞和看似深奥的智慧。诚然，它的主人对谚语和格言有着深入了解，但他肯定已在地狱中倍受煎熬。
A cloth cape covering the entire body of the horse. It makes the animal more courageous, but it also slows it down and limits its carrying capacity.
布料制成的披挂物，可覆盖马匹的整个躯体。此物可使马匹更为勇猛，但会减慢其速度且限制负重能力。
A cloth hood covering the whole body of a horse which, according to an old Czech legend, belonged to the brave knight Brunswick.
可覆盖马匹全身的布制披挂，根据古老的捷克传说，此物曾属于英勇的骑士布伦瑞克。
A cloth cape covering the horse's head, neck and shoulders. It does not make the animal very brave and has little effect on its speed and carrying capacity.
覆盖马匹头、颈和肩部的布质披挂，并不能增强马匹的勇气，对其速度与负重能力几乎毫无影响。
A cloth cape covering only the horse's shoulders. It does not make the animal very brave and has a little effect on its speed and carrying capacity.
仅覆盖马匹肩部的布质披挂，并不能增强马匹的勇气，对其速度与负重能力的影响甚微。
Cloth cape in colours of the Lords of Leipa covering the head, neck and withers. It doesn't make the animal very brave and the effect on its speed and carrying capacity is negligible.
涂饰莱佩领主配色的布制披挂，可覆盖马匹头、颈和马肩隆。此物并不能增强马匹的勇气，对其速度与负重能力的影响微乎其微。
Cloth hood in Ruthard colours covering the horse's head, neck and shoulders. It does not make the animal very brave and the effect on its speed and carrying capacity is negligible.
涂饰鲁瑟德家族配色的布制披挂，可覆盖马匹头、颈和肩部。此物并不能增强马匹的勇气，对其速度与负重能力的影响微乎其微。
Cloth cape in Semine colours covering the head, neck and shoulders of the horse. It does not make the animal very brave and the effect on its speed and carrying capacity is negligible.
涂饰塞米家族配色的布制披挂，可覆盖马匹头、颈和肩部。此物并不能增强马匹的勇气，对其速度与负重能力的影响微乎其微。
A cloth cape covering only the horse's loins. It does not make the animal very brave and has little effect on its speed and carrying capacity.
仅覆盖马匹腰部的布质披挂，并不能增强马匹的勇气，对其速度与负重能力几乎毫无影响。
A cloth cape covering the entire body of the horse except its neck and head. While it makes the animal more courageous, it also slows it down and limits its carrying capacity.
厚布料制成的披挂物，可覆盖除了马匹脖子和头以外的躯体。此物可使马匹更为勇猛，但会减慢其速度且限制负重能力。
It may be just a caparison, but in medieval society, a left-handed child needs to show that at least one of his parents belonged to the nobility.
或许这不过是件马衣，但在中世纪社会中，左撇子的孩子需要证明他的父母至少有一人是贵族。
Overhanging fabric cap with hem protects head and hair in dusty environments. It is popular not only among millers.
此布帽悬垂的边缘可以在尘土飞扬的环境中保护头部和秀发，对这种帽子倍感喜爱的可不只有磨坊主。
This elegant fashionable hat with a narrow hem is worn mainly by the burghers.
这款优雅时尚的窄边帽主要受市民们的喜爱。
A tall, cylindrical hat, also called a burgundian hat. The hem is decorated with a bird feather.
一顶高筒圆顶帽，也称为“勃艮第帽”，帽边装饰着一根鸟羽。
A chaperon is originally just a folded hood put on backwards. A simple trick created an elegant and rather eccentric headdress.
风帽（Chaperon）原先只是种反戴的折叠帽，后来一记简单巧妙的改动便创造出了如此优雅却略显怪异的头饰。
Elegant and slightly eccentric headdress decorated with a decent brooch.
优雅但略显古怪的头饰，饰有一枚得体的别针。
A richly embroidered, elegant headdress, which is originally nothing more than an upside-down hood.
一顶刺绣精美的优雅头饰，其实它起初不过是顶上下颠倒的兜帽。

A chaperon is originally just a hood worn backwards, transformed into an elegant headdress by means of a special harness. This one is tailored to the best cut of good cloth and would therefore not be lost in a royal court.
风帽（Chaperon）原先只是种反戴的风帽，后经过特别设计变成了一种优雅的头饰。这顶帽子由上好布料裁制而成，即便在皇室宫廷中穿戴也不会显得失礼。
A cap made of raw leather and sewn with leather straps is an unmistakable headgear of the Cuman raiders.
这顶由生皮制成并用皮制带子缝制而成的帽子是库曼战士的独特头饰。
A high cuman cap in the shape of a polyhedron made of coarse leather is an unmistakable headgear of the wild Hungarian horsemen.
一顶高耸的库曼帽，呈多面体状，由粗糙的皮革制成，是匈牙利荒野骑手们穿戴的独特头饰。
A decent round cap with a high hem is a hot novelty in Bohemia and every burgher with a finger on the pulse of the times must have it.
一顶体面的圆顶帽，带有高边，是波希米亚的时尚头饰，紧跟潮流的市民都应当人手一顶。
A frilled round cap with a raised hem, decorated with a simple brooch, it is popular in towns and fortresses.
这种有褶边的圆顶帽，其边缘翘起，饰有简易别针，在城镇和堡垒中都很受欢迎。
A fur-lined hat is favourite among the sholars andwise doctors.
皮毛衬帽是学者和医生的最爱。
A hat of unmistakable pointed shape with a decorated hem is the pride of every good hunter. Its colourful shades guarantee that no one will mistake you for prey in the woods.
形状明显的尖形帽，帽檐经过装饰，是每个优秀猎人的骄傲。其多彩的色调能确保他人不会在森林中将你误认为猎物。

Legend has it that while pious people rushed to church on Good Friday, Hubert, the oldest son of the Prince, went hunting. But instead of prey, he saw a majestic stag with a glowing cross between its antlers, which spoke to him. After this incident, Hubert led a pious life - so pious that he was eventually canonized and became the patron saint of hunters.
有传闻称，耶稣受难节那天，虔诚的人们都匆匆赶往教堂，而王子的长子休伯特却外出打猎。可他并未觅得猎物，只见一只雄伟的牡鹿，其鹿角间闪耀着一柄十字架，随后它还开口与休伯特交谈。自此，休伯特便过上了虔诚的生活，而如此虔诚的他，最终被封为圣，成为了猎人的守护圣者。
A black chaperon whose owner I sent straight to Hell. Someone left it on the spot Istvan landed.
一顶乌黑风帽，其主已然成了我的刀下亡魂。有人将这顶帽子留在了伊斯特万下坠的地方。
A pointed yellow hat, also called a Judenhut, is a strange and hard to miss head covering for Jewish men.
一顶尖尖的黄色帽子，也称作“Judenhut”，犹太男性佩戴的一种奇特且引人注目的头饰。
A hat of the Handsome Charlie
A felt cap with a curved hem, a tight fit to the head, is a popular head cover, especially among hard-working people.
带有弯曲边缘的毡帽，紧贴头部，是种受欢迎的头饰，在辛勤劳作的人群中尤为常见。
An elegant pointed hat with a wide brim, decorated hem and badge is worn especially by master hunsmans and they are proud of it.
一顶优雅的尖顶帽，帽檐宽，褶边经过装饰，配有徽章，尤受老练猎人的青睐，他们会因拥有如此帽子而感到自豪。
The magnificent wine coloured chaperon of the Trosky chamberlain Ulrich.
特罗斯基管家乌尔里希的风帽，是璀璨的葡萄酒色。
The festive miner's cap with sewn-on split brim, decorated with a miner's patch, is designed for special occasions.
节庆矿工帽，两边缝制了帽檐，装饰着矿工徽章，专为特殊场合设计。
A felt cap adjacent to the head has an extended brim at the back to prevent rock rubble, dust and dirt from falling behind the neck when working in the mine.
一顶紧贴头部的毡帽，帽子后方有延长的帽檐，以防在矿场工作时碎石、灰尘和污垢落于脖子后方。
Mikush's handsome cap, supposedly made according to the latest Italian fashion.
米库什的漂亮帽子，据说是按照最时髦的意大利风尚制作而成。
The pointed hunting hat decorated with a brooch is the badge of an experienced hunter. Poachers should be on the lookout if they see him.
这顶饰有胸针的尖顶猎帽是老练猎人的标志。如果偷猎者看到穿戴此帽之人，就应该提高警惕。
A beautiful hat made of real rabbit fur, lined with patterned fabric and decorated with a brooch with jay feathers, deserves to be worn by none other than a nobleman.
一顶美丽的帽子，由优质兔毛毡制成，衬有图案织物，并装饰着带松鸦羽毛的别针，堪称贵族装扮之选。
A narrow pointed cap is decorated with peacock feathers. It may look a little eccentric in company, but as they say, fortune favours the brave.
一顶狭长的尖顶帽子，饰有孔雀羽毛。它在社交场合中或许稍显古怪，但俗话常说，幸运青睐勇者。
A simple pointed cap with a narrow crepe is an interesting fashion choice even for less affluent people.
一顶配有窄边绉纱的简易尖帽，对于并不富裕的人来说依然是一种值得关注的时尚选择。
Scooped cap of linen cloth or felt with a wide raised hem, split in two at the front. Especially popular north of Bohemia.
这种用亚麻布或毡子制成的浅顶帽，帽前端分为两部分，边缘宽宽翘起，特受波希米亚北部地区的人们喜爱。
A simple round cap is popular especially among the bourgeoisie.
一顶简易圆帽，备受中产阶级人士的喜爱。
A work scarf is worn tightened around the head and tied in a knot at the back of the head.
劳作时穿戴的头巾。头巾绕过头部，并在后脑打结。
A simple felt cap without a hem covers only the top of the head.
简易无边毡帽，仅能覆盖头顶部分。
The wide wanderer's hat with a raised front hem is pulled back to protect the back of the traveller's head from the inclement weather on the road.
宽流浪者帽，前部分的帽缘上翘，可将帽子向后拉，以使旅者的后脑免受恶劣天气的影响。
A simple felt hat with a wide brim protects your head from the sun and rain. For a poor vagrant, it's often his only possession besides his own rucksack.
一顶简单的宽边毡帽，可为你的头部遮光挡雨。对于贫苦的流浪者来说，这常常是他除了包裹以外唯一的财产。
A simple men's scarf, skillfully tied around the head to keep it from untying.
一条简易男士围巾，可巧妙地环绕头部而系，以防止其松开。
A root vegetable, healthy, juicy, and sweet. Good in soups and mash. Can be eaten raw as well.
一种根茎类蔬菜，健康、多汁、清甜。用来做汤或做成糊都很美味，还可以生吃。
When cooked, it becomes soft and sweet. You can use it to improve any dish, or just eat it as is.
煮过的胡萝卜会变得又软又甜，和任何菜品都很搭，直接吃也没问题。
Interesting... and yet it looks like ordinary water from the well.
有点意思......但看起来和井水没什么区别。
For half a day, sleep will heal you two times faster.
半天内，睡眠可使你以两倍速度得到疗愈。
For two days, sleep will heal you five times faster and restore Energy three times faster.
两天内，睡眠可使你以五倍速度得到疗愈，能量也将以三倍速度恢复。
For one day, sleep will heal you four times faster and restore Energy two times faster.
一天内，睡眠可使你以四倍速度得到疗愈，能量也将以两倍速度恢复。
For one day, sleep will heal you three times faster.
一天内，睡眠可使你以三倍速度得到疗愈。
For those who aren't fans of poppy seeds or nuts, a quark kolach is the best of all.
如果不喜欢罂粟籽和坚果，凝乳面包就是最好的选择。
A wedge of cheese. When it's properly aged, it lasts a long time and is filling.
一块奶酪。经过适当熟成后，能够保存很长时间，且十分饱腹。
Drying gives cheese a more distinctive flavour. With some bread and a bit of ham, it's a fine substitute for a hot meal.
干燥处理让奶酪获得了别具一格的风味，配上面包和火腿，比起正餐丝毫不会逊色。
Smoked cheese never gets old, whether it's made from cow or sheep milk.
无论原料是牛奶还是羊奶，熏制奶酪永不过时。

A dead chicken… it looks a little reproachful. To soothe your hunger and lift your spirits with a good meal, roast a young chicken. Then boil some bread in red wine with parsley, sage, mint and lavender. Strain this sauce through a cloth and pour it over the roasted chicken. Finally, sprinkle it lightly with cinnamon or ginger.
一只死掉的鸡……看起来在斥责命运的不公。如果想缓解饥饿，你可以烤一只小鸡，然后在葡萄酒中煮一些面包，加上欧芹、鼠尾草、薄荷和薰衣草制成酱汁，把它用干净的布过滤，浇在烤鸡上。最后再撒少许的肉桂活姜，一道让人精神振奋的大餐就做好了！
If you find out someone killed all the chickens in your backyard, the only thing you can do is make jerky.
如果你的鸡突然全被杀了，你就只能把它们全都做成肉干。
Smoked chicken doesn't look so reproachfully anymore.
烟熏鸡看起来不像活着的时候那么咄咄逼人。
No one will refuse a juicy chicken leg.
没人会拒绝美味多汁的鸡腿。
A hat to go with a waiter's suit, suitable for royal banquets.
与侍者服饰相配的帽子，适合在皇家宴会上穿戴。
A coat in which you don't have to be ashamed to serve the King himself.
即便你穿着这件外套去侍奉国王也无需感到羞愧。
Tailored trousers that fit perfectly with a royal waiter's tunic.
一条剪裁讲究的裤子，可与皇家侍者的束腰外衣完美搭配。
A simple coat with a full-length buttoned front will not put its wearer to shame on any occasion.
衣前配有全长纽扣的简易外套，无论任何场合都不会让穿着者蒙羞。
A beggar's overcoat is all patch and almost falling apart. Still, in a pinch, it's better than nothing.
满是补丁的乞丐外套，几乎破得七零八落。不过在关键时刻，有它总比没有强。
A burgher overcoat made of fine fabric with rich embrodiery and decorated buttons.
由精致面料制成的市民外套，饰有丰富的刺绣，且缝有装饰性纽扣。
The coat with embroidered hem and forearm is fastened up to the neck with decorated buttons.
此外套下摆和前臂均有刺绣，装饰性纽扣系到了脖颈处。
A coat with embroidered hem and forearm is fastened up to the neck with decorated buttons. It is decorated with the symbol of Kuttenberg.
外套下摆和前臂均有刺绣，装饰性纽扣系到了脖颈处，衣上还饰有库滕堡的纹章。

Unbuttoned at the neck, sleeves rolled up... This is how every good jester who knows how to enjoy life wears his coat. Many a maiden and married woman looks back at it in secret and then has to examine her conscience in church.
领口解开，袖子卷起......这是每位懂得享受生活的优秀小丑穿着外套的方式。许多少女和已婚女性都会回头偷看，然后又不得不到教堂里审视自己的良心。
A fitted coat made of good fabric with a wider skirt will make its wearer look good in any better company.
这件由优质面料制成且带有宽摆的合身外衣，可让穿着者在任何体面场合中都显得光鲜亮丽。
A simple hunting coat allows its wearer freedom of movement and sufficient comfort when wandering after prey.
简易狩猎外套，可让穿戴者在追逐猎物时能够自由移动并保持足够的舒适感。

Nimrod was the great-grandson of Noah, who, according to legend, possessed the mantle of Adam with which he lured animals into his traps. He is rightly called the greatest hunter of the ancient world. In the Bohemian lands, his name "Nimrod" has become synonymous with hunter or huntsman. This coat may not attract animals, but its colour makes the hunter blend in well with the surrounding vegetation.
尼姆罗德是诺阿的曾孙，据说他拥有亚当的披风，尼姆罗德曾借此将动物们引入他的陷阱之中。他曾被誉为古代世界中最伟大的猎人，在波希米亚地区，他的名字“尼姆罗德”已经成为了狩猎者或猎人的代名词。这件外套或许无法吸引动物，但是它的配色能够让猎人很好地与周围植被融为一体。
A colourful coat decorated with jingle bells and an equally colourful jester's hood are worn by the minstrels in an attempt to attract the audience's attention. Be careful not to burst out laughing.
多彩的外套，装饰有铃铛，搭配同样多彩的小丑帽，多由吟游诗人穿戴，以此吸引公众目光。矜持点，可别哄然大笑。
A plain coat, made in red and white and decorated with symbols of Kuttenberg.
一件红白相间的简朴外套，饰有库滕堡的纹章。
A plain red and white coat with the coat of arms of the Kingdom of Hungary.
红白相间的简朴外套，饰有匈牙利王国的纹章。
A simple merchant's coat with a flare and a wider skirt. It is intended to convey the traditional impression of the wearer's trustworthiness and wealth.
一件简易商人外套，带有喇叭形的下摆和更宽的裙摆。它旨在传达穿着者的传统商人形象，展现其可信赖和富有的气质。
An overcoat of traditional cut from regular fabric, buttoned at the neck. It is available to villagers and burghers as well.
传统剪裁的外套，面料普通，领口设有纽扣，村民和市民均可穿着。
The overcoat of traditional cut, designed especially for the noblemen's subjects and the army, is decorated with the coat of arms of the Lord von Bergow.
传统剪裁制成的外套，专为贵族臣民和军队设计，饰有冯·波尔高领主的纹章。
An overcoat of traditional cut, designed especially for the subjects and the army, is decorated with Kuttenberg symbols.
传统剪裁制成的外套，专为臣民和军队设计，饰有库滕堡的纹章。
An overcoat of traditional cut, designed especially for the lord's subjects and the army, is decorated with the coat of arms of the Lords of Leipa.
传统剪裁制成的外套，专为领主臣民和军队设计，饰有莱佩领主的纹章。
An overcoat of traditional cut, designed especially for the military, is decorated with the coat of arms of the Kingdom of Hungary.
传统剪裁制成的外套，专为军队设计，饰有匈牙利王国的纹章。
A jacket of traditional cut, designed especially for the lord's subjects and the army, decorated with the coat of arms of the Lord of Nebak.
传统剪裁制成的外套，专为领主臣民和军队设计，饰有内巴克领主的纹章。
A jacket of traditional cut, designed especially for the lord's subjects and the army, decorated with the coat of arms of the Lords of Pisek.
传统剪裁制成的外套，专为领主臣民和军队设计，饰有皮塞克领主的纹章。
A jacket of traditional cut, designed especially for the lord's subjects and the army, decorated with the coat of arms of the Polner family.
传统剪裁制成的外套，专为领主臣民和军队设计，饰有波尔纳家族的纹章。
An overcoat of traditional cut, designed especially for the subjects and the army, is decorated with coat of arms of Ruthards.
传统剪裁制成的外套，专为臣民和军队设计，饰有鲁瑟德家族的纹章。
A jacket of traditional cut, designed especially for the lord's subjects and the army, decorated with the coat of arms of the Lords of Semine.
传统剪裁制成的外套，专为领主臣民和军队设计，饰有塞米领主的纹章。
A jacket of traditional cut, designed especially for the lord's subjects and the army, decorated with the coat of arms of Ulrich Vavak von Neuhaus.
传统剪裁制成的外套，专为领主臣民和军队设计，饰有乌尔里希·瓦万克·冯·纽豪斯的纹章。
Plain red and white coat with the emblem of the Old Town of Prague.
红白相间的简朴外套，饰有布拉格老城的纹章。
Quilted thick coat, suitable for every splash and slots.
加厚绗缝外套，适合应对各种泼溅和撕扯。
An overcoat is made of thicker fabric and is designed for long journeys in bad weather. It is recommended by nine out of ten wanderers who have reached their destination.
由较厚布料制成的外套，专为恶劣天气中的长途旅行设计。十个抵达目的地的流浪者中，就有九个会推荐此种衣物。
A simple linen headdress usually worn under a hat or cap.
简易亚麻头饰，常穿戴于帽子之下。
A quilted hood with a wide collar protecting the neck and shoulders of the fighter.
一顶带有宽领的绗缝兜帽，用于保护战士的颈部和肩部。
A quilted hood that was lent to me as part of the equipment for the Kuttenberg tournament.
一顶借来的绗缝兜帽，是我参与库滕堡比武大会时使用的装备。
A quilted hood with a collar and wide mail hood.
一顶带领的绗缝兜帽，且配有宽大的链甲兜帽。
A hood complete with a small hook. Provides decent protection while hiding under a large bucket helmet. According to legend, it belonged to the Bohemian Prince Bruncvík.
略呈钩状的兜帽，穿着在大的桶形头盔下可提供不俗的保护。有传闻称，这顶帽子曾属于波希米亚王子布伦瑞克。
Sturdy padded cap serving as a soft underlayer beneath the helmet. A good soft padding is simply essential, even for tough guys.
结实的软垫帽可作为头盔下的填充物。即使你再强壮，优质的软衬垫也是必不可少的。
A short chainmail collar, called a gorget, protects the neck and guards the warrior from being cut or penetrated by a blade under the visor of the helmet.
较短的锁甲护颈，又称颈甲，用来保护脖子，防止刀刃从头盔下方刺入。
Short quilted collar protecting the neck of the fighter.
绗缝短领，用于保护战士的颈部。
Some still believe that the fork is the devil's invention and stick to the old tried and tested spoons.
有些人至今都认为叉子是恶魔的造物，因此始终坚持使用那久经考验的勺子。
Part of the kit of every experienced cook and inexperienced killer.
老道厨师和新人杀手的必备工具之一。
A tear-out sheet with the names of the horses and their sale price.
一张撕下来的纸，写着马匹的名字和它们的售价。
A human thigh bone, or femur in latin.
人类的大腿骨，在拉丁语中叫“femur”。
This bag allegedly contains nails from Saint Peter's cross, and perhaps even Christ's!
据说袋子里装的是圣彼得十字架上的钉子，甚至可能是钉在耶稣手上的钉子！
A secondary product of hay drying.
干草晾晒过程的副产物。
I reckon this horseshoe has done its fair share of travelling.
这个马蹄铁好好地完成了它的任务。
Useless on its own, but the iron could be put back into circulation.
它本身已经没用了，但是上面的铁可以回收。
Useless for any job. But the iron could be put back into circulation.
它本身已经没用了，但是上面的铁可以回收。
Shackles covered it rust. They don't exactly serve their purpose anymore.
这些镣铐生满了铁锈，已经起不到作用了。
Half a pound of metal nails. Theresa would be very happy.
这有半磅金属钉子，特丽莎一定会很高兴的。
A light outer jacket, popular among wealthy burghers and noblewomen. It is commonly adorned with pendants, decorative buttons and embroidery. Long, flared sleeves are also in vogue.
一件轻薄的外套，在富裕市民和贵妇中很受欢迎。通常饰有吊坠、装饰纽扣和刺绣，还会配上又长又宽的袖子。
Tasty and healthy. Fry them in fat or roast them on the fire. Just like with other offal, you need to take care not to consume too much and too often. They also make for an excellent dog feed.
美味且健康，和脂肪一起煎或者放在火上烤都行。不过，和其它所有内脏一样，不能吃得太多太频繁。也可以用作狗粮。
Raw beef tongue is a piece of perfectly lean meat.
生牛舌是一块完美的瘦肉。
Beef tongue for lunch – a joy for the whole family.
午餐有牛舌，全家都快乐！
What could be better than freshly roasted pork cracklings? Especially with a tankard of ale.
还有什么比新鲜出炉的烤猪肉脆皮配上一大杯啤酒更美妙吗？

You can make crayfish soup as follows. Boil it in boiling water, remove the claws and tail and take the meat out of them. Crack the shell, add butter, set the pot on the fire and let it simmer. When the dish turns red, strain it through a cloth and make it into a soup or a sauce; finally, add the meat you took out earlier.
小龙虾汤的制作方法如下：先将小龙虾放入沸水中煮熟，取下钳子和尾巴，并剥出其中的肉。将龙虾壳打碎，加入黄油，放在火上慢炖。当汤变成红色时，用布过滤制成酱汁，再把之前取出的肉加进去即可。
A blue-green crayfish, you don't see that every day.
蓝绿色的小龙虾，这可不常见。
Cooked blue crayfish. The healthiest thing you can eat.
煮熟的蓝色小龙虾，你能吃到的最健康的食物。
Cream has always been a luxurious additive to sauces, whether sweet or savoury.
奶油一直都是酱汁中的一种奢侈调味品，甜咸都适用。

The heavy siege crossbow is used for shooting soldiers defending castle walls. The strong iron limbs have a considerable draw weight, therefore a hand crank must be used to load it. A bolt fired from this weapon can easily tear through plate armour.
用于射杀守城士兵的重型攻城弩。结实的铁弩臂拉伸力巨大，因此需要使用手摇曲柄进行装填。使用该武器发射的箭矢可以轻松击穿板甲。

A heavy siege crossbow is mainly used for shooting defenders on the walls. The strong steel arms have a considerable tension and therefore a hand pulley is used to cock it. In addition, the body has been reinforced with steel to make its shot truly lethal. You just can't get a stronger ranged weapon.
一把重型攻城弩，主要用于射杀城墙上的守城士兵。其结实的钢制弩臂张力巨大，因此需要使用手动滑轮来拉弦。此外，弩身经过钢材加固，因此拥有致命威力，你找不到比这更强大的远程武器了。
Artemis - the ancient goddess of the hunt, but also the guardian of virgin purity, who can bring sudden death. So watch out!
阿尔忒弥斯——远古的狩猎女神，亦是圣女贞洁的守护者，她拥有瞬间致人死亡的能力，所以可要小心了！

An old, homemade lightweight crossbow that is long past its prime. Its arms are made from a simple piece of wood. therefore it has little power, but it can be drawn with the bare hand. It reloads quickly, but is more suited to hunting small game and scaring off poachers and vagrants.
一把老旧的自制轻型弩，它也早已不复当年。弩臂由一块简单的木材制成，因此威力较小，但可以徒手拉开。它装填迅速，但更适合用来猎取小型猎物和吓退偷猎者及流浪汉。
An tastefully decorated light crossbow that can be drawn with bare hands. It would be a shame to hunt with such a beautiful weapon!
一把精美的轻弩，可徒手拉开其弩弦。如此美物，用其狩猎简直是暴殄天物！

A well-crafted lightweight crossbow. Its draw weight is adapted for hunting big game, but it could still be drawn with one's bare hands. Hunting poachers with it is not recommended, but it will do the job in a pinch.
一把打造精良的轻型弩。它的威力适合猎取体型较大的猎物，不过仍可以徒手拉开。不推荐用来猎杀强盗，但在紧要关头也能派上用场。

An old war crossbow. It has considerable strength, so its arms must be cocked by means of an iron lever called the Goat's Foot. Worn and repaired several times, but still guaranteed to take down many enemies without proper armour.
一把老旧的战弩。此弩张力惊人，因此要拉动弩臂就必须使用一种称作“山羊脚”的铁器。尽管早就老旧不堪，且历经多次修补，但它依然有能力放倒许多未穿坚甲的敌人。

A war crossbow made by a true master, beautifully inlaid with bone and polished wood. This beauty may not look like it belongs in combat, but it can pierce chainmail armour as well as weaker plate armour. She stretches herself with an iron contraption called a Goat's foot, because no one can stretch her strong shoulders with their bare hands.
一把战弩，出自真正的大师之手，镶上了骨饰和抛光木材，外观精美。虽然这把华丽的弩似乎不该用于战斗，但它却可以击穿链甲和较差的板甲。你得用一种叫做“山羊脚”的铁器进行拉弦，因为没人能徒手拉开它那结实的弩臂。

A well-made war crossbow. Its folded arms give it such strength that even with a lever called a Goat's leg, it is difficult to draw quickly. This crossbow is found in abundance on the battlefield, though it will not penetrate good plate armour. Anything else, however, it can penetrate like nothing.
一把制作精良的战弩。它折叠的弩臂提供了极大张力，以至于即便使用一个叫做“山羊脚”的撬杆，也很难快速上弦。这种弩在战场上随处可见，但无法击穿质量上乘的板甲。不过除此之外，它能穿透任何东西。
This type of armour provides less protection than any brigandine, as it only protects its wearer's chest.
这种款式的护甲所提供的保护难与其它板甲衣相提并论，因为它仅保护到战士的胸部。

The richly shaped two-piece cuirass with folded faulds protects the whole torso and groin very well. There are constant arguments among knights about whether a good brigandine or a hardened cuirass is better. In short, both have their undeniable advantages and obvious weaknesses.
这件外观华丽的两片式胸甲装有折叠裙甲，可有效保护整个躯体和腹股沟。骑士们常常为精良板甲衣和硬化胸甲的质量高低争论不休。总而言之，两者都有毋庸置疑的优点和显而易见的缺陷。

An excellent piece from the Italian armoursmiths. Thanks to the perfect tempering and fine surface cannulation, the sheet metal used can be much lighter and yet just as durable. The cuirass is composed of two parts that fit together perfectly to form an impenetrable shell on the knight's body.
由意大利盔甲匠锻造而成的杰作。得益于完美的淬火工艺和精细的表面凹槽，盔甲所采用的金属板材不仅更轻，而且同样耐用。胸甲由两部分组成，它们完美契合，构成了包裹骑士身体那坚不可摧的保护壳。

This cuirass has been in a fight before... and not for the first time. Battered, full of patches, but still a piece of metal that can make the difference between life and death for an unheralded warrior.
这件胸甲曾经历过战斗……而且不止一次。虽然受损严重，且满是补丁，但仍然是一块能为无名战士在生死关头发挥关键作用的铁甲。

Solid front plackart with a thin bar to prevent the tip of a polearm from slipping into the noble neck. The cuirass is made of tempered sheet metal to withstand the potential impact of a spear in a frontal collision of a knight's ride.
附带细条的坚固前胸甲，可保护贵族的脖颈免受长柄武器尖端的攻击。此胸甲由回火处理后的金属板制成，能够抵御骑士冲锋时长矛带来的正面冲击。
Damn it, who let such a fine piece of armour rust so reprehensibly? It won't do much, but it'll still protect you from death by stabbing.
该死，谁让这么精美的盔甲变得锈迹斑斑？虽然质量不佳，但仍能在受刺时保护你免受致命伤害。

A masterpiece from the best armoursmith workshops. Well-set metal parts decorated with brass bands, possibly additionally suitably gilded. The two-piece cuirass is joined by folded plate faulds, so that the armour perfectly covers the whole body and can still be worn while riding a horse.
出自顶级盔甲匠之手的杰作。精致的金属部件饰有黄铜带，可能还额外镀了金。这件两片式胸甲通过折叠裙甲连接，使得护甲能完美覆盖全身，在骑马时也能舒适穿戴。
An older form of the German cuirass, square shaped to withstand both slashing and crushing blows. It has considerable durability, but this is heavily compensated for by its weight.
较老款式的德国胸甲，其自身的方形设计可抵御斩击和重击。它的耐用性极强，但也因此大大提升了自身重量。

A masterpiece from the best armourer. The folded armour is assembled from a number of small hardened slats attached to an upper vest of the finest cowhide, which is covered with a precious fabric of excellent quality. The best protection and fashion taste in one! The armour is said to have once belonged to the legendary Bohemian Prince Brunswick.
出自顶尖盔甲匠之手的杰作。这件折叠盔甲由多个小型硬化板片组装而成，固定在最优质的牛皮上身背心上，且覆盖着质量上等的珍贵织物。此盔甲集优等的美观与保护能力于一体！据说它曾属于传奇人物波希米亚王子布伦瑞克。

The Cuman riding bows are one of the lighter bows, easy to handle even from the horse's saddle. Their strength comes from the layering of different materials similar to better crossbows. This piece is exceptionally well crafted and therefore slightly stronger than normal.
库曼骑射弓是一种较轻的弓，即便身处马背之上亦可轻松使用。它们的强度源自不同材料的层压结构，与效用更胜一筹的弩类似。这种弓制作精良，因此比普通的弓稍强。

Cuman riding bows are one of the lighter bows, easy to handle even from the horse's saddle. Their strength comes from the layering of different materials similar to better crossbows. This bow is a true masterpiece worthy of a famous Cuman chief.
库曼骑射弓是一种较轻的弓，即便身处马背之上亦可轻松使用。它们的强度源自不同材料的层压结构，与效用更胜一筹的弩类似。此弓乃名副其实的杰作，配得上一位名声显赫的库曼首领。

Cuman riding bows are one of the lighter bows, easy to handle even from the horse's saddle. Their strength comes from the layering of different materials similar to better crossbows. This piece is well made and will certainly serve well.
库曼骑射弓是一种较轻的弓，即便身处马背之上亦可轻松使用。它们的强度源自不同材料的层压结构，与效用更胜一筹的弩类似。这把弓制作精良，铁定好用。

Cuman riding bows are one of the lighter bows, easy to handle even from the horse's saddle. Their strength comes from the layering of different materials similar to better crossbows. This bow has been through a lot, it's weaker, and you can hear it creaking. It can still deliver a killing blow, or at least one that hurts.
库曼骑射弓是一种较轻的弓，即便身处马背之上亦可轻松使用。不同材料的层压结构为它提供了可观的射击强度，与效用更胜一筹的弩类似。这把弓早已饱经风霜，威力较弱，你甚至能听到它在吱吱作响，但它仍然能够射出致命一击，至少能将目标致伤。
The goodness of curdled milk. Very valuable and nutritious food.
美味的凝乳奶酪，营养丰富，价格昂贵。

The dagger is the knife's more dangerous cousin. Most of the time it's used for slicing cheese or apples, however, it comes in very handy if you need to creep up on someone and dispose of them without attracting attention.
匕首与小刀类似，但却更为危险。匕首大多情况下用于切奶酪或苹果，然而，如果你需要悄声接近并在静默之间解决目标的话，它就能派上大用场。
A dagger worthy of a true knight. Its shape is perfectly suited to cut right into a gap between armour.
一把值得真正骑士配有的匕首。它的形状能够完美地刺进护甲之间的缝隙中。
The gold ring that Margaret gave me as a pledge. It originally belonged to her mother.
原属于玛格丽特母亲的金戒指，玛格丽特将戒指予我作为誓物。
Best to make a roast out of it and serve it with a fruit sauce. However, make sure to bake it just long enough and be careful not to dry out the meat too much.
适合做成烤肉，配上水果酱享用。不过，烤的时候要注意火候，千万不能烤得太干。

A well-prepared heart is a real delicacy for true gourmets. Slice the heart in two and clean it, then marinate it in a mixture of red wine, vinegar, pepper and onion. After some time, coat it in flour, quickly fry it, then and bake until soft.
精致的心脏料理是真正美食家的极致享受。首先将心脏切开并清洗干净，随后用葡萄酒、醋、胡椒和洋葱混合成调料进行腌制。腌制过后，将心脏裹上面粉快速煎至表面金黄，然后慢烤至肉质柔软。

Deer meat has its place on every Lord's table. It has a firmer texture, yet is lean and easily digestible. The meat of younger animals up to three years of age is usually the most valued, the meat of older animals is usually firmer and more aromatic, especially suitable for making stews.
鹿肉在每位领主的餐桌上都有一席之地，它的质地紧实，瘦肉多，易于消化。通常三岁以下的幼鹿肉最好吃，而成年鹿的肉会更加紧实，味道更香，适合煮炖。
Preparing venison is a lengthy process, but the taste is worth it.
准备鹿肉的过程十分漫长，但这份等待是值得的。
It will last a long time, and it will be also easier to hide from the suspicious gaze of the huntsman.
可以保存很长时间，也可以逃过猎场看守的目光。
Venison is the bounty of nobles' hunts and poaching expeditions.
鹿肉是贵族狩猎或偷猎的战利品。

Delicious hind leg meat. The topside cut makes for the best roast. Dice the rest and boil it in salted water. Now to make a good sauce to go with it, crumble some bread in beer, add a little vinegar and cook it with some pepper and cloves, if you have them. Pour the sauce on top of the cooked venison and garnish with baked apples. This is how Severin the Younger advises deer to be prepared.
美味的后腿肉。顶端的部分可以切下来做成最好吃的烤肉，剩下的部分切块并放进盐水中煮熟。之后将面包屑放入啤酒中，加入少许醋，如果可能的话再加一些胡椒和丁香，一起煮熟成特制酱汁，倒在煮好的鹿肉上，配上烤苹果作为装饰，一道美味菜肴就诞生了。这是小塞韦林告诉我的做法。
A wooden longsword that can bruise but not kill. For those who are serious about swordsmanship, this is an invaluable tool for practicing.
一把能够造成皮外伤的木制长剑，但无法致人于死地。对于那些认真学习剑术的人来说，这种长剑是宝贵的练习用具。
Sometimes Lady Luck is on your side, sometimes she isn't. With this die, she most likely isn't.
幸运女神有时在你这边，有时不在，但如果有这颗骰子，那就永远不在。
The Saint Antiochus' die always rolls a 3. Not 2. And especially not 4.
圣安提阿克斯的骰子总是投出3，不会出2，更不会出4。
A very lightly loaded die. One can barely differentiate it from an ordinary die.
作弊痕迹十分轻微的骰子，几乎难以与普通骰子作出区分。
One of the dice coloured using modern techniques that hide the attempt to load it.
一颗使用先进工艺着色的骰子，用来掩盖它被做过手脚的事实。
The second in the line of the demonic dice, she likes to get lost, but when she's with her sisters she's very strong.
恶魔骰中的第二颗，据说她经常迷失方向，但在与姐妹一起时，就会展现出可怕的力量。
A die that feels hot to the touch. In place of a one it has a devil's head, which is not something folk like to gaze upon…
触感炽热的骰子，用魔鬼头像代替了1点的图案，人们可不愿意看到这东西……
A die loaded in favour of even numbers
一个做过手脚的骰子，更偏向于掷出偶数。
A playing die that brings luck more often than you'd expect
会带来好运的骰子，带来好运的次数超出你的预期。
A shoddy loaded die. It's quite noticeably unbalanced.
一枚劣质的作弊骰子，显而易见的重心不稳。
A die modified by an expert. It is precisely loaded, but also inconspicuous.
专业人士改造过的骰子，经过精准的调整，在外观上也几乎看不出来。
A consecrated die commemorating the Holy Trinity, especially by rolling threes.
一颗神圣的骰子，经常掷出三点，象征着三位一体。
A miraculous playing die, sent down from the Heavenly Kingdom to earth.
奇迹般的骰子，由天国降临到人间。
Doesn't look particularly tasty, but it's well balanced towards lower numbers.
看起来很普通的骰子，但经常能骰出小数字。
An annointed head has no need of a loaded die, since he is always right and can never lose.
国王总是正确，从来不会失败。不需要对骰子做任何手脚。
The first of the line of demonic dice.
When fortune smiles on you, smile back. Otherwise you'll look suspicious
当好运降临时，回应以微笑，否则会看起来很可疑。
A die loaded based on the work of a forgotten mathematician. It may be better suited to solving equations than playing dice.
根据一位被遗忘的数学家的理论设计而成的骰子，可能更适合用来解方程而非赌骰子。
一个普通且平衡的骰子。
A die loaded to favour odd numbers. Most of the time.
一个做过手脚的骰子，更偏向于掷出奇数，大部分时候都能成功。
A die blessed by St. Stephen, guaranteeing favourable numbers in the game and protection from loose stones.
圣斯蒂芬赐福过的骰子，能保佑你得到想要的数字，还能让你免受飞石的伤害。
A die of the most loyal regular at the Hole. It bears his likeness.
“墙洞”酒馆里最忠实的常客用的骰子，上面刻着他的肖像。
Legend has it this die will help you undress many a wench.
据说这颗骰子能帮你脱去女人的衣服。
A die made out of a molar tooth. It's probably better not to know who it came from.
一颗臼齿制成的骰子，最好不要问它是怎么来的。
A playing die made from a premolar tooth.
A playing die made from a wisdom tooth.
A playing die someone tried to load to his advantage, but didn't do a very good job.
有人试图用它作弊，但看来是玩脱了。
They say that when it rains, it pours. But if you play with this die, the only thing pouring will be your tears.
祸不单行，但如果你用这颗骰子，那厄运可就要成群结队地凑过来了。
According to legend, this die belonged to the famous Roman charioteer Arnuldus, whose tactics consisted of tiring his opponents or lulling them to sleep.
据说这颗骰子属于著名的罗马战车御者阿努尔杜斯，他能让对手疲劳，甚至酣然入睡。
Raw meat from a dog. It doesn't sound good because it's not very good. But it's still better than trying to eat shit. Actually, it might be wisest to fast.
生狗肉，味道不太好，但也总比吃屎强。其实，禁食才是最明智的选择。
Subtly spiced dog meat fills the stomach and satisfies even the most discerning palate.
精心调味的狗肉，不止可以填饱肚子，也能满足最挑剔的味蕾。
When the damned mutt just won't stop barking… Not for the faint of heart.
如果你实在难以忍受那条野狗的叫声......胆小者切勿尝试。
Meat from a cute little doggie. Slice it, salt it lightly, roast it… what a bliss.
一只可爱小狗的肉，切片，轻轻加盐，再烤制......多么幸福的一餐！
This bone is really huge. Good thing what it belonged to is long dead.
好大的骨头，还好它的主人早就死了。
This is supposed to be a piece of a dragon, but I'm not sure which part this bone comes from.
应该是龙的遗骨，但难以确定这是哪一部位的骨头。
Such a curved piece of a dragon must surely be his claw, right?
龙身上这么弯曲的部分肯定就是它的爪子了，对吧？
A letter addressed to the Abbot of the Sedletz monastery, written by the monk Slava.
僧侣斯拉瓦写给塞德莱茨修道院院长的信。
Expensive foreign spice excellent for gingerbread and meat.
昂贵的外国香料，适合搭配姜饼和肉类。
Rare eastern spice from the Silk Road for delicious sauces.
来自丝绸之路的稀有东方香料，可以用来制作美味酱汁。
Rare eastern spice from the Silk Road for making delicious sauces.
来自丝绸之路的稀有东方香料，可以用来制作美味酱汁。
A quarter of roast duck will fill you up nicely.
四分之一的烤鸭够你饱餐一顿了！
Charter with the seal of the Lords of Suchotlesky.
带有苏霍茨基领主印章的特许状。
Brigandine of the knight Peter with the coat of arms of the Lords of Suchotlesky.
骑士彼得穿着的印有苏霍茨基领主纹章的板甲衣。
A heater shield with the family coat of arms of Sir Peter of Suchotlesky.
印有苏霍茨基的彼得爵士家纹的斗盾。
A sword of the late knight Peter of Suchotlesky. It is an excellent weapon with a decorated pommel in the shape of a clenched fist.
已故骑士苏霍茨基的彼得的佩剑。这是一把打造精良的武器，剑首呈握拳形状。
Bronze decorated bridle consisting of of a bit, cheekpieces, reins, headpiece, noseband and browband. The better the bridle, the greater the bonus on the horse's stamina and speed.
青铜装饰的马勒，配有嚼环、颊片、缰绳、头带、鼻带和额带。马勒的质量越好，对马匹耐力与速度的加成越大。

Equestrian saddle with wooden seat and knitted saddle blanket. It generously extends the horse's carrying capacity. However, the rider has to take into account a considerable limitation of the animal's speed.
配有木制座椅和编织鞍毯的马鞍。此物能大幅提升马匹的负重能力，然而，骑手也不得不面对其对马匹速度的显著限制。

Equestrian saddle with bronze cantle, rosettes and leather saddle blanket. It generously extends the horse's carrying capacity. However, the rider has to take into account a considerable limitation of the animal's speed.
配有青铜鞍尾、花饰图案和皮制鞍毯。此物能大幅提升马匹的负重能力，然而，骑手也不得不面对其对马匹速度的显著限制。
It's not advisable to carry raw eggs into battle with you. Things could get messy.
把生鸡蛋带到战场上去可不是明智的选择。事情会变得一团糟。
Breakfast of champions, like from the caring hands of Goodwife Hanka.
为冠军提供的早餐，像是模范妻子汉卡做的。
A rare spice from the southern lands.
一种来自南方的稀有香料。
An excellent mineral suitable for stopping minor bleeding as well as tanning hides.
一种优质矿物，可以止住轻微的出血，也可以用来鞣制皮革。
An older cousin of the broad-bladed sword. A somewhat outdated weapon for some, perhaps, but there's nothing like tried and tested methods on the battlefield.
宽刃剑的前身。对一些人来说可能稍显过时，但在战场上，经受过时间考验的东西才真正可靠。
A military writ of Sigismund's soldiers, which they present as proof when collecting money.
西格斯蒙德士兵的军事通行证，他们征收钱款的时候会出示该证件。
Ornate headpieces are worn by young unmarried girls on their uncovered hair, by married women under the veil.
未婚少女会将精美头饰别于发间，而已婚妇女则会将它们佩戴于面纱之下。
A narrow headband, or also a crown, made of more or less noble metal, is usually decorated with semi-precious and genuine precious stones.
一条紧缩头带，也可用作王冠，由些许贵重的金属制成，通常饰有半宝石和真宝石。
Coloured or embroidered strips of fabric or ribbons are a cheaper alternative to crowns and headbands, popular especially among the poorer classes.
彩色或刺绣的布条或丝带是头冠和头带的廉价替代品，在较贫穷的社会阶级中尤为流行。
Wreath of meadow flowers. It looks nice, it smells nice, but it doesn't last very long. Plus, it can attract bees.
野花编织的花环。秀丽动人，芳香四溢，只惜朝荣夕毙。而且，它还可能会引来蜜蜂。
Gambeson of Lord Capon of Pirkstein.
皮克斯坦因的卡蓬领主的软甲。
My old gambeson, a memento of the many battles and the life I left behind. It has grown old with me, but it still serves where prayer alone is not enough.
我的旧软甲，见证了我的诸多战斗和我过去的人生。它与我一起度过许多岁月，而如今当祈祷无法拯救我时，它依然发挥着力量。
A quilted combat shirt made of several layers of plain linen. It provides some protection on its own, but is primarily worn as a soft underlayer under all types of armour.
由几件普通亚麻布缝制而成的战斗衬衫，它本身能提供一定保护，但通常作为盔甲的内衬使用。
Gambeson, which was lent to me as part of the equipment for the Kuttenberg tournament.
一件借来的软甲，是我参与库滕堡比武大会时使用的装备。
A quilted long gambeson soaked in dirt and much worse stuff. Its wearer surely died a horrible death.
一件长款绗缝软甲，已被污泥和糟糕杂物浸透，其主必定死状凄惨。
A well-made long combat coat made by a real tailor, so it doesn't restrict movement like ordinary quilted gambesons.
一件由经验丰富的裁缝制作的高质量长款战斗外套，因此不会像普通的绗缝护身服那样限制行动。
It's good to dress light for an event, but you never know what can happen. This pourpoint provides at least basic protection while allowing you to remain unseen.
轻装上阵固然是好事，但你永远无法预料欲要发生之事。这件棉衣至少可以提供基本的保护，同时还可避免你引人注目。
Exquisitely tailored and fitted noble coat made of precious fabric designed as a soft undercoat for chainmail armour and plate armour.
精心裁制的贵族外套，穿着合身，且由珍贵面料制成，专门用作链甲和板甲的柔软内衬。
A fitted quilted coat that honours the colours of the Lords of Warhorse. It is suitable as a base layer under armour, but one need not be ashamed even when wearing it "just as it is".
合身的绗缝外套，涂饰战马领主的配色，适合穿作盔甲内的打底衣物，但是即便单独穿着也不会让人感到羞耻。
A quilted combat coat made of several layers of plain linen. Can be worn alone or as a basic soft layer under other types of armour.
一件由几层普通亚麻制成的绗缝战斗服。可以单独穿着，也可作为其他盔甲下的基础软内衬。
A heavily worn, patch-covered quilted gambeson. Sadly, adding more patches to it won't make it any better.
一件磨损严重、满是补丁的绗缝软甲。可惜，就算继续添补补丁也无法改善它的状况。
An expensive and honestly made quilted coat from precious fabric for all noble warriors.
昂贵且精心制作的绗缝外套，由珍贵面料制成，为所有贵族战士而生。
A quilted coat sewn to the best fit, so it is great to wear and does not restrict movement. An excellent soft layer under other types of armour.
一件合身的绗缝外套，穿着舒适且不限制活动，可当作其它护甲下的优质衬垫。
Garlic, adds flavour and will heal any ailment as well as seasoning many dishes. But raw it burns the tongue.
大蒜，用来调味。能治愈多种疾病，还可以为许多菜肴调味。但生吃大蒜会让舌头有灼烧感。
Although raw it burns, cooked it is beautifully sweet and flavours meat and vegetables.
虽然生大蒜很辣，但熟了之后甜美无比，可以为菜肴增添风味。
The most commonly used type of iron gloves whose name refers to their typical hourglass-like shape. It protects not only the hand, but also part of the forearm of the fighter.
最常用的铁制护手，其名称体现它们典型的沙漏形状。不仅可保护手部，还可保护战士的部分前臂。
Fingered gauntlets in a typical hourglass shape. The individual fingers are protect a series of folded iron slats.
典型沙漏形状的指套。每根手指都由一连串折叠的护片保护。
Iron gauntlets that were lent to me as part of the equipment for the Kuttenberg tournament.
一副借来的护手，是我参与库滕堡比武大会时使用的装备。

Fingerless chainmail gloves with tempered sheet metal are an older type of armour and therefore cheaper to produce than plate gloves. Unfortunately for archers, and especially archers, they lack any advantages.
戴上后指头裸露的链甲手套，配有经过回火处理的金属片，是种较老的盔甲款式，因此生产成本比板甲护手更低。可惜的是，对于弓箭手来说，尤其是神射手，此种手套不会提供任何优势。

Fingered guantlets made in brigandine style, i.e. by layering lamellae and riveting them to the leather base. The division of the glove into individual fingers does not restrict crossbow loading or archery.
这种手套采用了类似板甲的制作原理，即在皮革手套上铆接分层排列的多个金属片。其独立手指的设计不会妨碍装填弩或射箭。
A masterpiece from the best armoursmiths. Finger gloves of hourglass shape made with metal decoration and brass lining.
来自顶级盔甲匠的杰作。沙漏形状的指套，配有金属装饰和黄铜镶边。

Finger gloves composed of small slats riveted to the leather and completed with a buckle, so they fit like a glove. Compared to gloves made of cloth, they last a little less, but they are lighter and fit better.
由小板条铆接在皮革上的指套，配有扣带，如手套一般贴合。与布制手套相比，它们的使用寿命稍短，但更轻便，贴合度更好。
These aren't just perfectly forged pieces of sheet metal, they're works of art! It's said that Prince Brunswick himself wore such gauntlets.
这副护手上的金属片不仅锻造得精致无比，它们还是妥妥的艺术品！据说布伦瑞克王子曾穿戴过这一护手。
Mitts are good for keeping your hands warm and protecting your fingers from injury, but aren't exactly suitable for anything requiring delicate handling.
手套可以保持双手温暖，并保护手指不受伤害，但不适合任何需要精细操作的事情。
The stinking gloves of a poor man who died a hideous death.
恶臭的手套，其主是位穷困之人，死状凄惨。
Hunting gloves provide a good grip on a bow or crossbow and those who don't want to get dirty when preparing game can keep them on. Although this pair may be a little too nice for the job.
能够在持弓或持弩时提供良好抓握力的狩猎手套，那些想避免在处理猎物时弄脏双手的人可以穿戴此类手套。不过，这双手套太过精致，不适合用来处理猎物。
Leather gloves that protect their wearer from abrasions and the cold. Suitable for horse-riding and hunting, but don't provide much protection in combat.
一副皮手套，可以保护佩戴者免受擦伤和冻伤。适合骑马与狩猎时使用，但在战斗中起不了多少防护效果。
Legate's gloves made of very fine lamb leather.
由上等品质的羊皮制成的特使手套。
Noblemen's gloves made of finely tanned leather keep the hands of the highest class safe and also show their social status by their quality.
由精细鞣制皮革制成的贵族手套，既可保护高贵人士的双手，也可借其优质性展现佩戴者的社会地位。
Gloves made of fine deerskin are quite flexible and retain the touch in the fingers, so they are perfect for riding.
由优质鹿皮制成的手套，柔韧度高，可保证手指灵活，适合骑马时穿戴。
Bare hands are best for delicate work, but sometimes it's better to protect them at least a little. And then thin gloves made of fine deerskin are ideal.
精细工作最好徒手进行，但有时还是稍微保护双手为妙，这种由优质鹿皮制成的薄手套即是不二之选。
A bunch of Godwin's stuff, I'd rather not open the bag. Who knows what I might find in there.
一堆古德温的东西，我还是别打开看了。谁知道里面有什么鬼东西。
A sweet pancake made of milk, flour and eggs.
甜煎饼是由牛奶，面粉和鸡蛋做的。
Roma bread made from flour, water and salt.
由面粉、水和盐制成的罗马面包。
A habit, or long, single-coloured outer robe of coarse cloth, is worn by priests and monks. Besides the shaved tonsure on the head and the bare, beardless face, it is a clear mark of a cleric.
教士服，或称作单色粗布长袍，由教士或僧侣穿着。除了他们那不留须发的头部或面容外，此种衣物也是神职人员的独特标志。
Legate's quilted clerical robe of the highest quality.
Long lord's overcoat made of fine fabric, decorated with rows of buttons. Perhaps every person in it looks robust and dignified.
由精美面料制成的长款领主大衣，衣上装饰着数排钮扣。每个披上它的人或许都能显得健壮而端庄。

A handgonne is a firearm that uses gunpowder to shoot small pieces of metal or stone. A thick metal barrel with a handle is attached to a wooden stock, similar to a spear, for example. Fire through the powder stopper detonates the main charge in the barrel and shoots the projectile out. It is fired by a lit cord, a red-hot iron wire or in a worst case scenario, a burning stick. This handgonne has a barrel forged from iron and is therefore less durable than those cast from bronze. Any living being hit with this weapon is sure to no longer be living.
手铳是一种使用火药来发射小型金属和石块的火器。它的厚金属枪管和手柄连接在木制枪托上，与长矛类似。通过火药塞引起主装药在枪管中爆炸，将弹丸射出。它可通过点燃的火绳、烧红的铁丝，最差也可利用燃烧的木头来发射。这种手铳的铳身由铁锻造而成，因此与那些青铜铸造的铳身相比更不耐用。使用这种武器击中任何活物，目标将难逃一死。

A hand wrap is a strip of cloth wrapped securely around the wrist, palm and base of the thumb. It helps to protect the hand and wrist against injuries caused by blows, serving both to keep the joints aligned and to compress and lend strength to the soft tissues of the hand during a fist strike.
手部缠带是一条紧紧缠绕在手腕、手掌和拇指根部的布带。它有助于保护手部和手腕免受冲击伤害，既能保持关节的对齐，又能在拳击时压缩手部软组织并增强力量。
Legate's red cardinal's hat with a broad brim, the emblem of high ecclesiastical office.
特使的红色宽边主教帽，是高级教会职务的象征。
A beautifully decorated and masterfully made crossbow for the traditional popinjay competition. Everyone would love to have one, but this one is mine now.
为传统射鸟比赛精心打造的弩。人人都想拥有这样一把好弩，但现在这把是我的了。
It grows in clearings and in leafy woods, but it is best not to seek it at all.
它生长在空地和茂密的树林里，但最好根本不要去寻找它。
Most often it is found in fields and fertile land.
一般可在田野和肥沃的土地上找到它。
Grows most of all on banks by water and in ditches around fields.
生长在河岸和田边沟渠处。
Grows everywhere as a weed, but mostly on grassy slopes and meadows it is to be found.
是种随处可见的杂草，但大多数生长在草坡或草地上。

This plant has a wide range of uses. The berries can be made into juice or sweet wine, its flowers and leaves are often used in folk medicine. Its flowers can also be covered in batter and fried. This flavourful dish is called 'Kosmatice'.
用途广泛的植物，其浆果可以制成果汁或甜酒，花和叶在民间医学中广泛使用，它的花还可以裹上面糊油炸，这道风味独特的菜肴叫做'Kosmatice'。
Grows on pastures and heaths and in all places where there is light enough, as well as wet ground.
生长在牧场和荒野，或任何有充足的光线，并且地面潮湿的地方。
You won't find this exceedingly rare plant anywhere else but in the apothecary.
这种植物十分稀有，只能在药剂师那里买到。
It is most fond of leafy woods, glades and clearings.
常见于多叶树林和空地。
Grows where the earth is fertile - on rubble piles and dung and abundantly too in pastures.
生长在土地肥沃的地方——粪堆，碎石堆和草场。
It is rarely found in nature, but rather alongside houses and in gardens cultivated.
自然界中很少发现，更多是在屋边或花园里栽培。
It grows in sunny and warm places, especially on dung and rubble.
生长在光照充足和温暖的地方，特别是粪便和碎石堆中。
It may be sought in deep woods.
在森林深处可以采集到。
It is found abundantly in fields and furrows as a bothersome weed.
在田野和犁沟里可以发现不少，是一种烦人的杂草。
Can be found in pastures and on hillsides.
可在牧场和山坡上找到。
A plant that is widely cultivated and used to reduce fever. In many languages, therefore, its name refers precisely to this beneficial property.
一种广泛种植的植物，可用于退烧，在许多语言中它的名字就指代这一特性。
Thistle grows in roadside ditches, in clearings and where there is shade and relief from strong sunlight.
蓟草生长在路边沟渠、空地以及有树荫遮挡强烈阳光的地方。
It can be found abundantly by water, on the edge of woods and in the furrows of fields.
大量生长于水边、树林旁以及田地犁沟处。
To be found on forest paths, in mires and peat bogs and everywhere that ground is damp.
在森林里的小路，泥淖和泥炭沼泽以及潮湿的地方无处不在。
That crap grows everywhere, especially where it's not supposed to.
这种垃圾到处都是，在它不该生长的地方长得尤为茂盛。
Abundant grows on roadsides and in fields.
在路边与田野长得很多。
Herring can be smoked, roasted, pickled or boiled. It's very tasty, but one of the boniest fish there are.
鲱鱼，能被烟熏、烘烤、腌制、煮熟。非常美味，但是鱼刺非常多。
The key to the chest obtained from the wife of Captain Frenzl of Suchdol.
从苏赫多尔的弗伦队长之妻那里得到的箱子钥匙。
Shoes made of the finest lambskin leather, belonging to the wife of Captain Frenzl of Suchdol.
苏赫多尔的弗伦队长之妻的鞋子，由最上等的羊皮制成。
Mutt-in-soup. You can’t disguise that bitter taste.
狗肉汤，无论多好吃都让人有些难过。
Soup from a stray dog that used to cheer up the defenders of Suchdol during hard times.
流浪狗制成的汤，在困难时期为苏赫多尔的守军提供了宝贵的食粮。
What's on the heart is on the tongue and worse.
我说实话，这味道可不怎么样。
Honey in a honeycomb, useful to the apothecary, cook, candlemaker and brown bear.
巢状蜂蜜，药剂师、厨师、做蜡烛的人和棕熊都会想要它。
A hat is for show, a hood is for the cold.
靓帽用来显摆，兜帽戴着御寒。
If you have a little more money, it should be apparent. That's the decent thing to do.
如果你有点小钱，就应该显露出来，这是种合乎体面的做法。
Have you achieved success, are you noble and rich, or at least you want it to look that way? You can't go wrong with a brocade lining.
无论你成功与否，富贵与否，或是仅想装成达官显贵？选择一件绸缎内衬绝对不会有错。
Even a quality hood will turn into a worthless rag with time and wear, but it's still better than nothing.
即使再高质量的兜帽，也会随着时间和磨损变成一文不值的破布，但有总比没有好。
There's an unwritten rule. Burghers are not to play the nobleman and definitely prefer good worsted wool to brocade. But what of it? When you have money, you have to show it, don't you?
有这么一条不成文的规定：市民不应装成贵族。但他们确实更喜欢精纺羊毛而非绸缎。总之没关系，既然有钱，就该亮给别人看看，不是吗？
Either you have someone skilled who likes you, or you just have to pay extra for the embroidery.
要是你不认识什么喜欢你的巧手匠人，那么你只能花钱买到这些刺绣。

Whether the sun is shining, it's raining or snowing, this hood will never let you down. There was one who went all the way to Jerusalem wearing it, and when his bereaved sold it, he had a nice funeral out of it too.
无论阳光明媚，还是飘雨落雪，这顶兜帽都不会让你失望。曾有人戴着它一路走到了耶路撒冷，当那人的遗孀卖掉了这顶帽子，他也因此有了一场体面葬礼。
This isn't just any piece of cloth, it's a sacred part of the miner's dress and yacker traditions.
这不仅仅是一块布料，更是矿工装扮和挖客传统中的神圣象征。
This stinking rag has a very sad story attached to it.
这顶发臭的兜帽背后藏着一个悲伤的故事。

As soon as you put the hood on, the scent of mushrooms hits your nose. Or is it mould? Either way, this hood has faithfully served many mushroom pickers before you. With it on your soldiers, you're sure to know which mushrooms are a sensation to the taste buds and which will send you to an early grave.
戴上这顶兜帽，蘑菇的气味便扑面而来（也可能是霉菌的？）。总而言之，这顶兜帽服务过许多采蘑菇为生的人。只要戴上它，你就能分辨出哪些蘑菇能做成美味佳肴，哪些能把你送进坟墓。
Made of good woolen fabric, nicely cut, well stitched, in short excellent quality. No wonder it has a name referring to the priestly state.
由优质羊毛面料制成，剪裁得体，缝制精良，总之质量上乘。难怪它有一个与神职身份相关的名字。

Plain and poorly tailored, but it protects perhaps more than the best wool. For everyone can see at a glance that the wearer is in the service of his master. And a servant can only be kicked with impunity by his master, no one else!
简朴且剪裁粗糙的兜帽，但它的保护性估计比质量最好的羊毛还要好。任何人一眼就能看出，此物的主人是个仆从。而能够肆无忌惮殴打仆人的人，只有他的主人！

Once you are noble, you must make sure that your manners match it. It's impossible to walk like a peasant! Only the finest worsted wool, well cut and carefully stitched, is really good enough to adorn your noble shoulders.
既然你成了贵族，就理应确保你的举止与身份相配，走姿可不能像个农民！只有由最上等的精纺羊毛制成并经过精心剪裁与缝制的衣物，才真正配得上你的贵族身躯。
Flamboyantly simple but coupled with an exceptionally esteemed mission. To be a shepherd and lead his flock through the tearful valley of earthly life, one must have great determination.
绚丽而简约，却肩负着极其尊贵的使命。要引领教众穿越满是悲伤的尘世之谷，就必须拥有强大的决心。
An unmistakable part of Sir Hans Capon of Pirkstein's outfit.
毫无疑问，这是皮克斯坦因的汉斯·卡蓬爵士服装中的一部分。
A hood that protects well against cold and discomfort, although it could definitely use some fixing up here and there.
一顶可以为你抵御寒冷和不适的兜帽，尽管有不少地方需要修补。

An essential piece of every hunter's kit, a hood it protects its wearer from the harsh sun in open clearings, cold winds on morning hunts, and prickly thorns while stalking prey. This one is bedazzled with pearls for good measure.
每位猎人的装备中必不可少的一件物品。这顶兜帽可使佩戴者免受旷野烈日的灼烧、不惧晨猎时寒风的侵袭，它还可遮挡追逐猎物时尖锐荆棘的伤害。为了增加美感，这顶兜帽还镶嵌了珍珠。
A hood with the emblem of the famous Order of the Knights of the cross.
带有名声显赫的十字骑士团徽章的兜帽。
Red cardinal's hood of the papal legate, made of the best fabric and with a good cut.
教皇特使的红色主教兜帽，由极品布料制成，且剪裁精细。
A hood of the good knight Jan Semine of Semine.
杰出骑士杨·塞米的兜帽。
This is a unique clothing asset for an important character. If you got it in game, report it!
这是一个重要角色的独有服装。如果你在游戏中得到了它，请报告给我们！
Ordinary people wear hoods as protection from wind, cold, sun and rain. But some people wear hoods to protect themselves from the eyes of other people.
人们穿戴兜帽通常是为了遮风挡雨、御寒抵热，但是总有些人戴兜帽是为了遮挡他人的目光。

The hook gun is a much more massive weapon than the handgonne. The barrel is fitted with a hook on the underside, which serves to wedge the weapon behind an obstacle and limit recoil when fired. This particular piece is cast from bronze by a master gunsmith, therefore can be fired repeatedly without breaking.
一把钩枪，与手铳不同，它是一种更为大型的武器。枪管底部装有钩子，可将武器楔在障碍物后，降低射击时产生的后坐力。这件武器由一位枪匠大师用青铜铸造而成，因此在射击时，能够承受较大火力所产生的冲击而不会立刻破裂。

A hand cannon, unlike a pistole, is a much more massive weapon. The barrel is fitted with a hook on the underside, which serves to wedge the weapon behind an obstacle and limit recoil when fired. This piece has a barrel made of wrought iron and therefore does not last as long as guns cast in bronze. It is therefore recommended to shoot with a smaller powder charge. Up close, this gun cracks knights in metal like thrushes smash snails on a rock.
一把手铳，与手枪不同，它是一种更为大型的武器。铳身底部装有钩子，可将武器楔住在障碍物后，降低射击时产生的后坐力。此火器铳身由铸铁制成，因此其耐用性与青铜制火器难以比拟，遂建议装填较小火药进行射击。近距离内，这种手炮能像画眉鸟啄击岩石上的蜗牛一样，粉碎披甲的骑士。
It is well known that eating horse meat is not recommended and it should only be eaten in case of extreme emergency, if there is nothing else to soothe your stomach.
众所周知，不推荐食用马肉，只有在极端情况下，找不到其它食物时才会用来应急。
A proper chunk of boiled horse meat. You don't come across something this juicy and nutritious every day!
一大块煮熟的马肉。这么多汁又营养的美味可不是每天都能吃到的！
If you have to slaughter a horse, at least let its meat last as long as possible and not go to waste.
如果必须屠宰一匹马，那至少让它的肉能得到长期保存，不要浪费。
It's a shame about a good horse, but if there's nothing else to eat... And it'll taste better with a little smoke.
可惜了一匹好马，但如果真的没东西吃……加点烟熏味会好些。
Horseradish with a flavour so sharp, it could cut your tongue.
辣根能把你舌头都辣断。
The horseradish was so sharp it could cut your tongue. Once cooked, its infernal taste is dulled.
辣根能把你舌头都辣断。煮熟后，它的味道就会变淡。
Horseshoes that are the result of the efforts of a novice blacksmith. The rider will hardly feel the acceleration of a horse in these.
由新手铁匠努力锻造的马铁蹄，基本无法提升马匹的奔跑速度。
Honest horseshoes with studs to help the animal achieve better speed and grip.
带有螺钉的结实马蹄铁，可助马匹疾驰，且能提供更好的抓地力。
Great horseshoes for a noble steed. The horse will reach almost the best speed with them and they will last for some time.
与高贵骏马相配的上等马蹄铁。能让马匹以几乎最快的速度奔跑，且疾驰状态会持续一段时间。
Horseshoes designed by Romani blacksmiths called fierari. The rider can expect a generous increase in his horse's speed.
由罗姆人铁匠（称作fierari）设计的马蹄铁，可显著提升马匹的奔跑速度。
Flawless horseshoes that enable the horse to reach the highest possible speed.
无可挑剔的马蹄铁，能让马匹尽可能以最快速度奔跑。
A bridle, in which a whole crowd of horses must have taken turns. Looks like it's about to fall apart. It won't do the horse any harm, but it won't add to its speed or stamina.
定是由多只马匹轮番使用过的马勒，看上去已破败不堪。它不会对马匹有任何害处，但也不会对其速度和耐力有何增益。

An old, shabby saddle, which perhaps the great-grandfather of Sigismund of Luxembourg himself rode in his youth. The devil must have owed it to him... It adds little carrying capacity, but fortunately does not slow down the horse.
破旧的马鞍，没准卢森堡的西格斯蒙德的曾祖父年少时就曾使用过，一定是魔鬼亏欠他的......此物可略微提升马匹的负重能力，好在它不会降低马匹的速度。
No one makes hose for beggars - they have to be passed down from person to person, each one poorer than the last, until they reach the poorest of all.
没有人会为乞丐制作长裤——他们只能将裤子代代传承，且一代比一代穷苦，直到裤子落到最贫困的人手中。

Long hose are a staple of men's clothing. They are worn by noble lords as well as simple folks. However, they differ in quality of fabric, cut or richness of colour. These hose are fashionably joined at the crotch by a separate flap.
长袜在男士服装中属于基本款式，无论是平民还是贵族都会穿长袜，不过面料质量，裁剪手艺和颜色丰富度上会有所不同。在长袜的裆部会有一块襟布用作拼接，显得十分时尚。
These are the hose the drowning man was wearing. They smell awful and only a madman would wear them.
溺水者穿过的裤子，气味难闻，只有疯子才会穿。
A proper hunter doesn't pull down his pants before a ford!
合格的猎人从来不会在跋涉过河前扯下裤子！
These colourful trousers are worn by jesters and generally eccentric people. The higher quality suggests that whoever had them made was very serious about their insouciance.
这些色彩鲜艳的裤子主要有小丑和古怪之人穿着。其较高的质量表明，定制此类裤子的人对自己的洒脱风格非常重视。
Decorated trousers of the papal legate, made according to the latest Italian fashion.
教皇特使的漂亮裤子，按照最时髦的意大利风尚制作而成。
A long hose are a staple of men's clothing, but garters are worn only by the nobility, wealthy bourgeoisie or various freedmen. Nothing for the common peasant.
贴身长裤是男装的基本款，但吊袜带只有贵族、富裕中产阶级或各种各样的自由人才可穿戴，而普通农民可没有这种待遇。
Where hands fail, strong legs must step in. These pants won't help you run any faster, but at least they won't give you away when you're hiding in a pile of manure.
当你的双手不争气时，强壮的双腿就必须发挥作用。这件裤子并不会让你跑得更快，但至少可以让你在藏身于粪肥中时不会暴露身形。
Only nomads and Hungarian horsemen wear such strangely frilled trousers wrapped tightly around their calves.
只有游牧民族和匈牙利骑兵才会穿这种紧紧包裹着小腿的奇特褶边裤。
These aren't just any pants. These express their owner's affiliation with a respected craft and are therefore properly worn out from an honest work.
这些裤子可不是普通的裤子。它们彰显出穿戴者从事的是受人尊敬的劳动，裤腿也因辛勤劳动而磨损不堪。
A long hose are a staple of men's clothing. The simple countryman, however, does not look for beauty, but mainly to keep the wind off his knees.
长裤是男装的基本单品。然而，简朴的乡村人并不追求美观，主要想依靠裤子来为膝部挡风。
These colourful hose are worn by troubadours, jesters and generally eccentric people who like to play pranks on others.
穿着这种色彩鲜艳裤子的人通常都是吟游诗人、小丑以及那些喜欢捉弄别人的怪人。
Sausages from Sigismund's personal store. They seem longer than Czech ones. Could the Emperor be compensating for something?
西格斯蒙德私藏的香肠。似乎比捷克风味的长一点。皇帝是想以此作为什么补贴吗？
Wine from Sigismund's personal stock. Sweet, probably italian...
西格斯蒙德私人库存的葡萄酒，味道甜美，可能产自意大利......
A smooth stone that Thomlin tried to pass off as the true thunderstone. Though it doesn't have the same power as its authentic counterpart, maybe it will bring you some good luck anyway.
一块光滑的石头，托姆林试图用它冒充真正的雷石。虽然它没有真品的威力，但也许也会给你带来一些好运。
A finely polished stone of dark colour, endowed with magical powers. It's said to bring good luck and protect from all evil.
一枚打磨精良的黑色石头，具有神奇的魔力。据说能够带来好运，抵挡一切邪魔。
A masterfully made war hammer with a ram's head shaped hammer that excellently smashes skulls and penetrates armour. The mercenary commander Andrew earned his nickname thanks to this weapon.
一把精心打造的战锤，锤头呈羊头状，能够极其出色地粉碎头骨并击破盔甲。雇佣兵指挥官安德鲁的绰号便是因此武器而得。

A finely smoothed stone of dark colour, endowed with magical powers, with a lightning hole in the middle. It's pleasant to the touch and slightly warm in the hand. It will bring me good luck and protect me from all evil.
一块被赋予了魔力的黑色光滑石头，中间有一个闪电形的洞。它摸起来微热，触感舒适。据说它会带来好运，保护我免受一切邪恶的侵害。
Map showing hunting spots around Suchdol.
记录了苏赫多尔附近狩猎点的地图。
The hunting sword is the faithful companion of every hunter or poacher. It is usually used to finish off hunted game, but it's also handy for cutting kindling for a fire.
猎刀是每个猎人（或者偷猎者）的忠实伙伴，通常用来剥皮割肉，但也可以用于砍柴生火。
A hunting sword is the faithful companion of every huntsman and poacher. Commonly used for finishing off hunted game, but can come in handy when chopping woodchips for a campfire.
狩猎剑是每位猎人和偷猎者最忠诚的战友，它们通常用来终结猎物的生命，但当需要砍伐柴火时，狩猎剑亦有大用。
A beautiful hunting sword with a hilt made of deer antler will not disgrace even a nobleman. It is usually used to finish off hunted game, but it will also help against uninvited forest visitors.
以鹿角为柄的狩猎剑，十分漂亮，就算是贵族使用也不辱其身份。它通常用来结束猎物的生命，但也可以刺穿不速之客的喉咙。
The shashka is similar to a long knife, and and its distinctive pommel is in the shape of a bird of prey. It originated in the steppes of Kyiv, but was also favoured by the Cumans of Hungary.
“沙什卡”弯刀与长型小刀相似，它那别具一格的刀柄锻造成了猛禽的形状。这种武器起源于基辅大草原，但也受到匈牙利库曼人的喜爱。
