The hunting sword – originally made for hunting wildlife, nowadays often carried by wealthy burghers, as they aren't allowed to carry a noble's sword at their side.
狩猎剑——最初是用于狩猎野生动物的武器，现在大多由富裕的市民携带，因为他们不被允许携带贵族剑。
A crispy unleavened bread, also called Matzah, which is typically square or round in shape. It is a traditional food for the Jewish holiday of Passover.
一种酥脆的无酵面饼，也被称为“马萨”，通常为方形或圆形。它是犹太教在“逾越节”期间享用的传统美食。
A lute perfect for a wandering bard.
适合流浪吟游诗人的鲁特琴。
Lute strings made of sheep gut.
Many songs sound more like the end result of a sheep's digestive tract than a heavenly chorus. Finally I know why.
别说天籁之声了，许多歌曲听起来甚至和路边的羊粪差不多。我现在终于知道原因了。
Lots of indispensable and undoubtedly necessary things in one place.
一下子就弄到了许多不可或缺的必要材料。

A simple iron helmet for all poor squires. It is usually a good idea to wear it with a quilted hood with a collar, as the helmet alone does not protect the cheeks or neck of the warrior. But it's cheap and can be repaired literally on your knee.
专为贫穷侍从设计的简易钢盔。因为这种头盔并未对战士的脸部和脖颈提供保护，一般来说，最好搭配带有护颈的绗缝兜帽使用。但此头盔价格便宜，随手就可进行修理。

A simple kettle hat composed of several pieces of plate. It protects especially against blows from above and therefore it is good to wear it together with a padded coif or a full collar. The advantage is certainly its lower price.
由多片钢板组合成的简单头盔，适合抵御来自上方的打击，因此通常搭配衬垫头巾或颈甲。比起其他头盔，它的优势显然是价格便宜。

An iron hat forged from a single piece of sheet metal and therefore slightly more durable, but still unnecessarily heavy. Its spin makes it better able to withstand blows to the head, but it needs to be supplemented with a quilted hood or collar, as it does not protect the warrior's cheeks or neck on its own.
由单块铁片锻造而成的铁盔，因而耐用性略微提升，但却尤为沉重。其脊状设计可增强头部对冲击的抗性，但是因为未对战士的脸部和脖颈提供保护，因此应搭配绗缝兜帽和护颈使用。
A kettle hat that was lent to me as part of the equipment for the famous Kuttenberg tournament.
一顶借来的水壶盔，是我参与著名的库滕堡比武大会时使用的装备。
Iron hat with a wide brim. It covers the head well and at the same time, thanks to conveniently placed cut-outs, does not restrict the view, which is an advantage especially for foot marksmen.
宽边钢盔，可良好地覆盖头部。同时，得益于其设计巧妙的开口，这种头盔不会限制视线，为欲要射击目标腿部的弓箭手提供了优势。
The most common shape of kettle hat, popular among the poor squires. It consists of two parts joined together by iron rivets, and therefore isn't as expensive as a helmet forged from a single piece.
形状最常见的水壶盔，深受贫穷侍从的喜爱。这种头盔由两部分组成，通过铁钉拼接，因此与用单块金属锻造而成的头盔相比更为便宜。

A pointed helmet with a broad brim and a spinning torse in the colours of the lord or city in whose service the wearer fights. The kettle hat is made of a single piece of sheet metal, making it slightly lighter and more durable to all slashing and crushing blows.
宽边尖顶头盔，带有旋转的饰带，颜色代表着佩戴者所效忠的领主或城市。这种水壶盔由单个金属板制成，与传统头盔相比略加轻便，且更能抵御劈砍和重击。

An iron hat forged from a single piece of sheet metal so that it is lighter and at the same time can withstand all kinds of blows. One of the finest helmets a simple squire can afford. Of course, it must be worn with a quilted or chainmail collar, as it does not protect the warrior's neck or shoulders.
由单片铁板锻造而成的铁盔，既轻便又能承受各种打击，是普通侍从可负担起最精美的头盔之一。当然，这种头盔需要配合绗缝或链甲护颈佩戴，因为它无法保护战士的脖子和肩膀。
The owner's keys to all his doors and chests.
用于打开钥匙主人所有房门与箱子的钥匙。
The key to every chest and door in the shop.
用于打开商店内所有房门与箱子的钥匙。
All the ordinary keys to the doors and chests in one nice bunch.
你所有的钥匙都在钥匙环上。
A sausage slowly smoked in beechwood.
在山毛榉木中慢慢熏制的香肠。

Wine from the vineyards of Casper Rudolf. It must be said that his product has greatly improved judging by its aroma, but whether his Burgundy vine will achieve the fame of Burgundy wines? Who knows, but there's only one way to find out.
卡斯帕·鲁道夫葡萄园产的葡萄酒，不得不承认它的香味非常吸引人。但这种采用勃艮第葡萄藤的酒，味道上能比得过真正的勃艮第葡萄酒吗？唯一验证的方法就是，让我喝一口！
Records of movements, purchases and sales of goods at The Emperor Charles tavern.
查理皇帝酒馆的货物流动、采购和销售记录。
A lot of indispensable and undoubtedly necessary things in one place.
一下子就弄到了许多不可或缺的必要材料。
The key to the vineyard cellar in Loretz.
洛雷兹葡萄园酒窖的钥匙。

A collection of interesting facts about wine, winemakers and wine culture in general. From the most famous wine connoisseur of the Bohemian land, Bushek of Velhartice, who as is known taught Emperor Charles that even Bohemian wine can be drunk if given enough time.
关于葡萄酒、酿酒师和葡萄酒文化的趣味知识汇总。波希米亚最著名的葡萄酒鉴赏家维尔哈蒂采的布谢克曾对查理皇帝说过，只要经过了足够时间，波希米亚的葡萄酒也会变得很好喝。
Young grapevine seedlings from the monastery garden. It smells pretty good. I wonder how does such a seedling taste like?
修道院花园里的葡萄藤幼苗，闻起来相当不错，吃起来呢？
Aranka's concoction, which should cause some trouble for Tibor's horse
阿兰卡的混剂，应该能给提波的马匹制造麻烦

A letter of safe conduct issued by Sigismund of Luxembourg himself, giving the bearer the right of free movement and the privilege to judge his own subjects according to customary law, not the law of the land.
由卢森堡的西格斯蒙德亲自签发的安全通行函，赋予持有者自由活动的权利，以及按照习惯法而非当地法律审判其属民的特权。
A potion from Aranka, which should make Tibor just a little bit groggy... Perhaps.
从阿兰卡那里取得的药剂，没准......能让提波稍感昏沉。
Key to the room in the barn.
The nail used many years ago by the Troskowitz bailiff to mark the border between Tachov and Zhelejov. Too bad he didn't tell anyone about it.
这是多年前特罗斯科维茨执行官用来标记塔霍夫和哲勒约夫边界的钉子。可惜这件事他谁也没告诉。
Jakesh's compensation for all the hardships he caused Bozhena and Pavlena.
贾克西为对博珍娜和帕芙莱娜造成的一切麻烦所做出的赔偿。
A bad omen and a witness to an evil deed.
不祥之兆和邪恶行为的见证。
A simple pendant, made for Pavlena by her lover a long time ago.
一枚简易吊坠。许久之前由帕芙莱娜的爱人为她亲手制成。
A torn piece of cloth. Looks like the hem of a girl's dress. A dog could probably find the owner by it.
一块撕破的布料，看起来像是女孩裙子的下摆。狗应该能通过它找到衣物的主人。
A dirty and worn-out grosch that someone hid for luck in the foundations of the building.
一枚又脏又破的格罗申，有人把它埋藏在地基里，以求好运。
Finding a horseshoe on the ground is said to be a very lucky sign. Especially if I've lost it myself before.
捡到马蹄铁是个吉兆，尤其是捡到自己曾经遗失的马蹄铁。
A nail brought back by workers as a souvenir from the renovation of the Sedletz monastery.
翻修塞德莱茨修道院的工人们带回来的纪念品。
An axe forged from three protective talismans. Hidden in the attic of the house, it will drive away every storm, fire and hailstorm. Well, perhaps…
一柄由三个护身符锻造而成的斧头，如果放在房子的阁楼里，就可以避免风暴，火灾和冰雹，大概吧……
It whistles through the air, one last attempt to scream, and then silence forever.
它划出破空之音，伴随一声最后的悲鸣，随后一切归于沉寂。
Fortune spins around and you're once down - once up. Once you win big at dice, and then at the end of the rope you'll hang ignominiously.
你败败败，最后是反而胜；你赢赢赢，最后是输光光。
The memory of a great victory.
A beautiful and at first sight excellent long sword. Such a weapon is guaranteed to attract a crowd of scoundrels.
初看顿感惊艳绝妙的精美长剑，如此利器定能引来大群无赖。
A well-made replica of the sword called "Absolver". With a bit of luck, even an experienced eye can't tell the difference.
长剑“赦免者”的完美复制品，哪怕最有经验的鉴定师也未必能分辨真伪。
Light, perfectly balanced and sharp so that the feather is cut in half by its own weight when it hits the blade. That's what this hunting sword should be, but...
很轻，平衡完美，锋利无比，羽毛落在其上都会被切成两半。这把狩猎剑理应如此优秀，然而……
Light, perfectly balanced and so sharp that a feather is cut in half by its own weight when it hits the blade. That's what this blade should be, but…
很轻，平衡完美，锋利无比，羽毛落在其上都会被切成两半。这把剑理应如此优秀，然而……
An important-looking document, signed by a number of people, yet someone simply left it here.
一份看起来很重要的文件，上面有很多人的签名，但有人把它遗失在了这里。
This weapon has been through a lot. Maybe too much. The owner seems to be using it more as a baton than a sword, since its too blunt.
这把武器早已历经沧桑，其经历或许难以估量。因其变钝的刀刃，似乎武器的主人已经把它当作棍棒来使用。
Although it looks quite ordinary, this sword is well forged and perfectly balanced. This is the kind of weapon a blacksmith makes for battle, not for show.
虽然看起来很普通，但这把剑锻造精良，且十分平衡称手。这是铁匠为战斗锻造的兵器，而非单纯的展示品。
The beautiful axe from the legend of the two woodcutters was lost for many years, but Henry of Skalitz found it and restored it to its former glory.
《两个樵夫的传说》中那把美丽的斧头丢失了很多年，但斯卡利茨的亨利找到了它，并使其恢复了昔日的光彩。
It must have been a beautiful weapon once, but years underground have left an indelible mark on it.
它曾经是一件美丽的武器，但多年的埋藏已在它身上留下了不可磨灭的痕迹。
A perfectly authentic replica of the sword with which the knight Valentine once accompanied the Abbot of Sedletz to the Holy Land.
瓦伦丁爵士陪同塞德莱茨修道院院长前往圣地时曾随身携带一把佩剑，这是那把剑的完美复制品。
The molar of the patron saint of all those afflicted by toothache - Saint Apollonia of Alexandria. Or maybe it's just a polished pig's tooth, it's hard to tell.
牙痛患者的守护神——亚历山大的圣阿波罗尼亚的臼齿。也可能只是一颗打磨过的猪牙，谁知道呢。
The famous symbol of the Kuttenberg swordfighting hall is in two pieces due to disputes between Menhart and Jimram.
库滕堡剑术公会的象征，但因为门哈特和吉姆拉姆的争端而断裂。
Very bright was that sword when it was made whole again; the light of the sun shone redly in it, and the light of the moon shone cold, and its edge was hard and keen.
宝剑重铸，光芒万丈。剑锋坚韧而锐利，阳光在剑上泛出虹光，月光在剑上映照冷辉。

Throw into the cold water three coals of fire, three crumbs of bread and three pinches of salt. Wash thy forehead and thy shoulder with the water, that thou mayest wash away the evil from thee, and put it upon the water.
将三块火煤、三块面包屑和三撮盐投入冷水中。用这水洗净你的额头和肩膀，让流水带走你的邪恶。
A good sabre worthy of the Voivode's position. Its wielder is not to be underestimated, for even the slightest cut can cause a terrible curse. At least to those who believe in such things.
一把配得上司令官身份的好军刀。持刀者不可小觑，因为即使是最轻微的割伤也可能引发可怕的诅咒——至少对那些相信这种东西的人来说是这样。
It doesn't seem magical, but the spikes on could prove useful when riding on rocky terrain.
看起来不是什么稀罕东西，但在崎岖地形上骑行时，这种钉子可能会起作用。
A copy of the ledgers of the smelters in Grund.
格兰德冶炼厂的账簿副本
A letter of safe conduct entitling the bearer to move around in the royal mines near Horschan.
一封允许持有者在霍斯昌附近皇家矿山自由活动的安全通行证。
Map showing the location of the secret mint.
记录秘密铸币厂位置的地图。
The key to the well-chilled beer store for hard-working miners.
这把钥匙能打开藏酒处，那里有为辛勤矿工们准备的冰镇啤酒。
Copy of the account ledgerof the royal mines in Horschan.
霍斯昌皇家矿山账簿的副本。
Authentic die for minting the Prague groschen.
铸造布拉格格罗申的标准模具。
A key to the secret mint's preghaus, where the path of the stolen silver ends.
打开秘密铸币厂中铸币间的钥匙，那些被盗银器就被送往了这里。
Records of the secret mint's accounting. They prove royal silver fraud.
秘密铸币厂的账本，是皇家银器欺诈案的有力证据。
A sack of mined silver ore isn't exactly the lightest thing in the world.
一袋银矿石，一点也不轻。
A letter of safe conduts entitling the bearer to enter the smelters at Grund managed by Master Buresh.
一封通行证，允许持有人进入布雷斯大师管理的格兰德冶炼厂。
The key to the chest in the secret mint where Vavak keeps his records.
瓦万克在秘密铸币厂保存他的记录的箱子钥匙。
The key to Gotzlin's chest that he gave me as a reward.
哥特林作为报酬给我的钥匙，可以打开他的箱子。
In the young gentleman's chambers, I found a collection of locks of hair he had kept as trophies. If this doesn't prove he's the killer, I don't know what will.
在那位年轻绅士的房间里，我找到了他作为战利品保存的几缕头发，这毫无疑问可以证明他就是凶手。
A ring I found on the deceased Zdena. I don't recognise the family crest on it.
一枚在兹德娜尸体上找到的戒指，但我并不认识戒指上的家纹。
The scarf that Zdena left to Pint to use as a distraction. Hopefully, it'll be enough for Mutt to track her down.
兹德娜留给派特的围巾，用来分散注意力。希望这足以让呆呆找到她。
磨坊主著名的鹿肉食谱。
Kuba's healing potion for the miller's horses.
用于医治磨坊主马匹的库巴治疗药剂。
Schnapps from the hidden stash. Judging by the smell, it's bound to have the right kick.
被藏起来的杜松子酒，光闻一闻就知道它够劲。
Kuttenberg bacon, so fine and lean, not to share it would be mean.
库滕堡产的熏肉，有着精细的瘦肉，可不要想着吃独食。
Stay well fed, eat Kuttenberg bread.
Kuttenberg sausage, best with some cabbage.
库滕堡产的香肠，适合搭配卷心菜食用。
A map of the Kuttenberg underground, used by the miners themselves.
库滕堡矿工内部使用的库滕堡地下地图。

You can make a good meal like this. First, roast some meat on a spit. Take some white bread, wine and plums and make a black sauce out of them. Add the roasted meat and sweeten with honey. Serve with lard and baked apples and sprinkle with almonds.
你可以这样做出一道佳肴：首先，用烤架烤一些肉，然后取一些白面包、葡萄酒和李子做成黑酱并用蜂蜜调味，涂在烤肉上，再配合猪油和烤苹果，最后撒上杏仁一起享用。
This cooked lamb is melting on your tongue.
这种熟羊肉仿佛能在舌尖上融化。
It's a pity for such a delicate meat as lamb, but if you're already getting sick of it and you really don't know what to do with it…
对于娇嫩的羊肉来说，这么处理十分可惜。但如果你真的厌倦了它，或者不知道如何处理的话......
An excellent meat from curly Bohemian sheep, raised in open paddocks and guarded by a red-haired boy with a whistle.
来自波希米亚卷毛羊的优质肉品，它们饲养于开放的牧场中，由一个拿着口哨的红发男孩看守。

This may not be the most popular meal ever, but what can you do. The best way to prepare it is to fill it with whatever you like or have on hand, sew it up and then boil it for a long time. A dish prepared in this way is very compact and portable and therefore suitable for travelling.
它可能不是最受欢迎的菜肴，但你也别无选择。最好的做法是用你喜欢吃的，或者手头上有的食材把它填满，缝起来，然后煮上很长时间。这样做的菜肴十分小巧便携，非常适合旅行者。
A distant relative of garlic. It whets the appetite and is a garnish to any vegetable soup.
大蒜的远亲，能增进食欲，适合加进蔬菜汤里。

Protection of the entire leg formed by individual iron plates riveted to the honest cowhide leather. This is an older form of folded armour, which can be seen especially in the shape of the knee pads.
由独立铁板连接至优质牛皮，进而形成了对全腿的保护。这是一种较古早的折叠护甲款式，其老式风格尤其体现在护膝部分的形状上。

A full leg protection of a newer type formed by the combination of lamerall and plate armour. While the thighs are protected by folded slats, the warrior's shins are encircled by well-forged metal plates.
一种较新的全腿保护装备，由层叠片甲和板甲结合而成。大腿部由折叠的板条保护，而小腿则由精工铸造的金属板包裹。
Full leg protection, consisting of laminar and plate armour, made with an emphasis on lighter weight, but also with an emphasis on the good looks of the wearer.
全腿保护装备，由层叠片甲和板甲组成，注重轻便性，同时也兼顾了穿戴者的外观美感。
Simple quilted leggings. Not exactly the pinnacle of tailoring skill. Can be used alone or as a softening underlayer beneath better armour.
简单的绗缝护腿裤，并没有应用太高深的裁缝技巧，可以单独穿着，也可以作为盔甲下的柔软内衬。
A quilted hose that have been through a lot. They are rugged and have patches, but can still be used on their own or as a bottom layer for the upper part of armour.
一条历经沧桑的绗缝裤。裤子结实耐用，布满补丁，可单独穿着，或是用作上半护腿的打底裤。
Thick wool trousers, well made of honest fabric so they don't hinder movement and last a while.
厚重的羊毛裤子，由优质面料精心制成，不会阻碍运动，且尤为耐穿。

Thigh-length boots that protect the horseman's legs against chaffing. Putting them on and taking them off is a rather lengthy process, so they're worn more by folks who tend to spend the whole day in the saddle, such as messengers and grooms.
长及大腿的靴子，可以保护骑士的双腿免受伤害。穿脱这类靴子需要花去较长时间，因而此类靴子的穿着者通常是那些整日都要待在马鞍上的人，比如信使和马夫。
Padded leggings that have seen the world. They are comfortably broken-in and freshly repaired so they can keep on serving their purpose.
这条历经世事的衬垫护腿穿起来非常舒适，还刚刚修补过，现在可以继续发挥它的作用。
A leg protection consisting of forged plates of sheet metal suitably fit together. Such armour protects the warrior's entire leg, but its weight depends on the craftsmanship of the maker.
由合理拼接的锻造金属板组装而成的腿部护甲，能够保护战士全腿，但其重量则取决于锻造者的工艺水平。
Leg protection consisting of forged pieces of sheet metal. The front consists of plates equipped with a dorsal edge, so the armour is harder to cut through and will even endure a crushing blow.
由锻造金属片组成的腿甲。其正面甲片边缘经过加固，难以切断，甚至可以承受沉重的钝击。

A masterpiece of plate armour decorated with brass lining. The forged plates are further hardened to achieve higher durability, while the metal sheet could be weaker and therefore lighter overall. The plate legs are completed with foot protection called sabatons.
饰有黄铜镶边的精致板甲。锻造的板材经过进一步硬化，进而提升了护甲的耐用性，而金属板相对轻薄，从而使护甲整体更轻盈。护甲腿部还配有称为“足甲”的脚部保护器具。
Partial leg protection, coverinng only the thighs and knees of its wearer who, for some reason, decided to save on armour cost. One should think twice whether this is a good idea, though.
此盔甲仅为腿部提供部分保护，即仅可保护战士的大腿和膝盖，适合想要在购买盔甲时省钱的人。决定穿戴前还请三思。

A leg protection made from tempered sheet metal plates forged into the dorsal edge to better withstand slashing and crushing blows. The armour is not fitted with sabatons, as its intended wearer is not a horserider and often must move on foot.
腿部护具，由经过回火处理的金属板制成，可更好地抵御劈砍和重击。此护甲没有配备护靴，因为穿戴者并非骑士，而通常是些步兵。

Simple knee pads that can be part of full armour. They are most often worn separately by those who cannot afford more expensive armour or who would be unnecessarily restricted in their movement by it.
简易护膝，可用作全身护甲的一部分。受众人群通常是些无法负担昂贵盔甲的人，或是由那些觉得全身护甲会阻碍行动的人穿戴。
Simple knee pads called couters with a leaf to improve protection against slashing blows.
简易护膝，其叶状部位可增强对劈砍的防护。
The perfect leg protection made of hardened sheet metal that not just anyone can afford. The legendary Bohemian Prince Brunswick himself is said to have worn such armour.
此护甲提供了完美的腿部保护，由硬化金属板制成，并非任何人都可负担得起。据说传奇人物波希米亚王子布伦瑞克曾穿过这一护甲。
Plated leg protection of Lord Hans Capon of Pirkstein.
皮克斯坦因的汉斯·卡蓬领主的板甲护腿。
You can easily recognise the lepiota even at a distance. It's tall and has a wide cap.
即使在远处，你也能很容易的识别出环柄菇，它又高又有宽帽。
Cooked lepiota has a delicate taste and is used by the poor to substitute meat.
熟菌菇味道鲜美，穷人经常拿它们来代替肉类。
Why would anyone do that? What a shame! There's nothing like such nice round cuttings from a lepiota...
怎么会有人这么干呢？真是可惜！没有什么能比圆形菌菇切片更美味了……
A letter for Markold of Louny. It might be of interest to a few other people...
一封写给洛尼的马尔科的信，或许有些人对此信会感兴趣……
A love poem that a miner dedicated to me when I promised to help him write a letter. I don't think it's a very good love poem. It's a pretty nasty thing.
我答应帮一位矿工写信后，他为我写的情诗。我觉得写的不怎么样，挺低俗的。

A longsword for swordmasters is a noble and damn dangerous weapon. Like the tongue of a viper, it can cut the thread of life in an instant. This blade is designed primarily for tournaments, but in a more fierce battle it could quickly come to naught.
对于剑术大师而言，长剑不仅象征着尊贵，更是种令人胆寒的兵器。宛如毒蛇之舌，刹那间它便能让生命灰飞烟灭。此剑主要用于比武，但在更为激烈的战斗中，它可能会很快就会化为乌有。
A perfectly balanced long sword with a wide blade is the gold standard. What it lacks in speed it makes up for in durability.
一把完美平衡且剑刃较宽的长剑，理想之选。尽管在速度上有所欠缺，但耐久十分优秀。

The longsword is a perfectly balanced lethal weapon. Its price is not small, because only a master of his craft can forge a thin yet flexible blade! The longsword is not meant for the heat of battle, but for swift swordplay.
这把长剑是拥有完美平衡的致命武器。它价格不菲，因为只有锻造大师才能造出如此轻薄而灵活的剑刃！这把剑不适合用在战场上，而是为了快节奏的剑术格斗打造的。

The long sword is a fearsome weapon commonly used by knights and warriors in 15th century Europe. With a blade measuring over 3 feet in length, it is designed for powerful strikes and precise thrusts, making it versatile in both one-on-one combat and battlefield skirmishes. Its sturdy construction and balanced weight allow for swift movements and devastating blows, making it a popular choice for those seeking to dominate their opponents in close combat.
长剑是15世纪欧洲骑士和战士常用的可怕武器。它的刀刃长度超过3英尺，专为强有力的打击和精确的刺击而设计，无论是在一对一的战斗中还是战场厮杀中都很通用。长剑结构坚固、重量平衡，能够使持剑者动作迅速的同时有强大的打击力，因此成为那些寻求在近战中压倒对手的人的热门选择。
A perfectly balanced sword with a slender blade for true sword masters. The longsword is a noble weapon for swordfighting and a quick way to send any fool to the other side.
一把平衡感堪称完美的长剑，剑刃纤细，适合真正的剑术大师。长剑是高贵的武器，也可以将瞧不起它的蠢货轻松送入地狱。
Original long swords have a slightly wider blade and a pronounced groove for durability. They are not weapons for decoration, but noble blades to uphold knightly honour and family tradition.
最初的长剑有一个略宽的刀刃和一个明显的耐用凹槽。它们不是装饰用的武器，而是维护骑士荣誉和家族传统的高贵利刃。
A sword forged by my father for Sir Radzig Kobyla, which was later stolen by that scoundrel Istvan Toth.
这把剑是我父亲为拉德季·科比拉爵士锻造的，后来被伊斯特万·托思那个混蛋偷走了。
A heavier long blade will last longer and won't break easily, but it must be balanced by a much larger pommel. This sword is designed for actual battle rather than a quick sword fight.
更重的剑在战场上更为耐用，不容易断裂，但需要更结实的剑柄。这把剑是为战场设计的，在要求速度的剑术格斗中并不适用。
You won't believe it, but brocade and broccoli have a common basis in the Latin word broccus - pointed. Why? Nobody really knows.
你肯定不信，brocade（英语：织绵）和broccoli（英语：西兰花）有着相同的拉丁语词源，即broccus，也就是“尖”的意思。你问为什么？真相无人知晓。
A candle made out of left over beef or mutton fat by a handy soapmaker or butcher.
一根由制皂师或屠夫用残余的牛羊肉脂肪制成的蜡烛，做工精巧。
Every blank canvas should be filled.
应填满画布上的每一块空白。
Perhaps a beautiful maiden used it to comb her hair, or maybe some filthy beggar combed lice out of his beard with it. You never know.
也许某个美丽的少女用它梳过头发，或者某个肮脏的乞丐用它从胡子里梳出虱子。谁知道呢。
Can be used in various manners in the morning, day, evening and night. It just needs to be washed thoroughly.
无论是凌晨、白天、傍晚还是深夜都可以任意使用，只要之后清洗干净。
Two out of three pieces of copper ware were made from copper mined in Falun, Sweden, where a large copper mountain is said to be located.
据说瑞典法伦有一座大型铜山，几乎三分之二的欧洲铜器都是由那里的铜制成的。
I'd rather not whistle on it. I don't want to be annoying like the fools I see on every corner.
我不太想吹它，主要是不想像街上的那些傻瓜一样引人注目。
I'll just have one cup and go.
Looking at his disciples, Jesus said: "Blessed are you who are poor, for yours is the kingdom of God."
耶稣对他的门徒说：“贫穷的人有福了，因为天国是你们的。”
Even sour wine tastes good from a golden goblet.
即便是发馊的葡萄酒，用金杯盛起也能可口无比。
Geese were used to guard property. No wonder, since they're always angry, as scribes are always plucking their feathers.
鹅曾肩负着看守财产的职责，难怪它们总是生气，因为抄写员老是拔它们的羽毛。
It would certainly adorn any hair, be it ravishing raven, velvety auburn, angelically fair or suspiciously red.
无论是迷人的黑发，天鹅绒般的赤褐色发，天使般的金发，还是可疑的血色红发，这一发夹的装点都能令其锦上添花。
They say it's darkest under a candlestick, but have you ever seen the shadow this lamp casts?
人们常说“灯下黑”，但你是否留意过这盏灯所投下的影子？
If the husband does not respect his wife, she can appeal to the law and then, along with her dowry and all the gifts she received during the marriage, remove herself from the household.
如果丈夫不尊重他的妻子，她可以诉诸法律，然后带着她的嫁妆和她在婚姻期间收到的所有礼物一起离开这个家庭。
Stones the colour of blood are said to have a calming effect, help concentration and help women with their worries.
据说血色石头具有镇静宁神的功效，能够助人集中注意，也能帮助女性化解忧虑。
Captivating, velvety, shiny river clam pearls arranged nicely next to each other. Tempts the most virtuous woman to vanity.
迷人、柔滑、闪亮的河蚌珍珠像这样整齐排列在一起，哪怕最贤惠的女人也会被牵动起虚荣心来。
Well dried and ground, it's an invaluable aid in tanning and dyeing. The bark is supplied by the millers, who dry and grind it when they have nothing better to do.
经过妥善的干燥和研磨后会成为鞣革和染色的宝贵材料。这些树皮由磨坊主提供，他们闲来无事时就会做将树皮烘干和磨碎的活计。
Dark liquid made from crushed oak galls and gum Arabic, used for writing on parchment.
用捣碎的栎瘿与阿拉伯树脂制成的黑色液体，可作为羊皮纸的书写材料。
Those who can't afford it don't need it; those who can likely pay handsomely for it. Pepper comes from far eastern countries and is brought over by merchants on their rickety ships.
胡椒源自远东，商人们的破旧船只渡过远洋将它运来。买不起的人不需要它，而买得起的人会为它花上大价钱。
For particularly thirsty drinkers. In an emergency, it can also be used to water the garden.
要是渴得不行，就用它吧。在紧要关头也可以用来浇灌花园。
Drinks served from pewter dishes taste a little strange, but the pitcher sparkles and that's all that matters!
从锡制器皿倒出的酒有些许怪味，不过酒罐闪闪发光，这才是最重要的！
A pin here, a pin there...
A greasy black liquid used to lubricate wagon wheels, mill gears and mining equipment. It is made by mixing pitch, tallow and crushed plaster so it stays nice and smooth.
一种用于润滑车轮、磨坊齿轮和采矿设备的油腻黑色液体。由沥青、动物脂和粉碎的石膏制成的，十分光滑。
One of the most common types of counting devices. It doesn't count money, but something quite different.
最为常见的计数工具之一。并非用于数钱，而是另有他用。
One of the most common types of counting beads. It doesn't count coin, but something quite different.
最为常见的计数珠之一，并非用于数钱，而是另有他用。

It is said that the priest once survived several days alone in the wilderness, to face pagan superstitions with his faith. This very rosary helped him overcome fear and find light even in the darkest moments.
据说，这位牧师曾独自在荒野中生存数日，并用他的信仰对抗了异端迷信。期间，正是这串念珠在他最黑暗的时刻给予了一线光明，帮他克服了恐惧。
One of the most common types of counting devices. It doesn't count money, but something quite different.
最为常见的计数工具之一。并非用于数钱，而是另有他用。

It is said that work in the vineyard is as busy as in the church. And who should know more about it than Hroznata himself, who devotes his life to both. Through the wine he finds the way to God, and through God the way to the wine. One would think that the beads on the rosary would be the actual vine grapes.
有人说，葡萄园的工作就像教堂里的工作一样忙碌。而对此最为了解的，莫过于既为葡萄园工作，又献身于教堂的赫罗兹纳塔了。他通过美酒寻得了参见上帝的道路，又向上帝祈求到酿制美酒的精髓。甚至有人以为他脖子上的念珠都是葡萄做的。
One of the most common types of counter. It doesn't count money, but something quite different.
最为常见的计数工具之一。并非用于数钱，而是另有他用。
A mineral suitable for flavouring dishes. To some it's more precious than gold.
一种能当调味料使用的矿物，对某些人来说比黄金还要珍贵。
Smooth fabric in satin weave. The nightmare of anyone who foots the bill for a wedding dress.
光滑的缎织面料，所有为婚纱付账的人的噩梦。
A rusty key to the Sedletz mortuary.
一枚锈迹斑斑的钥匙，可打开塞德莱茨停尸间。
A copper ewer reserved for noble guests and special occassions.
用于迎接贵宾和特殊场合的铜酒壶。
One day in the future, people with battle with sticks for such a trophy… maybe on ice!
在未来，人们会在草地上用棍子互相争夺这样的奖杯……也可能是在冰上！
Essential equipment for every conscientious drinker. Silver, as is known, is good for your health!
喝酒行家人手一个的器皿。众所周知，银对健康有益！
A thick black oil produced by the charcoal-burning process and used to fill barrels and treat ropes and fishing nets. Pitch-soaked fabrics are waterproof but also more flamable.
在烧木炭的过程中产出的浓厚黑色油状物，可以用来填充桶的缝隙，或是处理绳索和渔网。经过沥青浸泡的布料可以防水，但也变得易燃。
The three-legged cup is really hard to drink from, but it makes you look like you're consuming a mystical elixir.
这种三条腿的杯子很难用，但你用它喝什么看起来都会像是在饮用神秘的灵药。
"Plate armour" for a knight on a budget. (Disclaimer: Don't actually use it as armour.)
为预算有限的骑士准备的“板甲”。（免责声明：不能当做真的盔甲用。）
A new key to the armoury at Trosky.
特罗斯基军械库的新钥匙
Must be owned by anyone who has been struck by Cupid's arrow.
这就是坠入爱河之人该看的东西。
Two old prayers, Lord have Mercy on Us, and Saint Wenceslas
两段古老的祷词，分别是《愿主怜悯我们》，和《圣瓦茨拉夫祷告词》
How to get rid of fleas and cure warts.
记载了跳蚤和肉赘的治疗方法。
How the vixen found a pitcher and how resentment and anger led her to her death.
讲述了一只狐狸如何对待她找到的水罐，并最终死于她自己的怨恨和愤怒的故事。
An old Czech satirical poem about an argument between a scholar and a groom over who has it better in life.
古老的捷克讽刺诗，讲述了一个学者和一位马夫之间的争论。
A brief history of the Kingdom of Bohemia.
About the miracles born from the remains of St. Wenceslas.
关于圣瓦茨拉夫遗骸带来的奇迹。
论圣多萝西和她殉道的结局
On the wonders of the land of India.
How Good Mead is Brewed in home conditions
如何在家酿出上好的蜂蜜酒
On monastic obedience and the monastic abbot.
关于修道院规章与修道院院长的讨论。
On Monastic Obedience and the Monastry Abbot.
关于修道院规章与修道院院长的讨论。
About the Adamite sect and their unpleasant end.
讲述了亚当派的悲惨结局。
About the greatest ruler of the Kingdom of Bohemia, Charles IV, who excelled above all other kings and raised the country from the ashes.
讲述了波希米亚王国最伟大的统治者查理四世的故事，他的功绩超越其他所有国王，将这个国家从灰烬中带来新生。
About how the Emperor of the Holy Roman Empire is elected.
神圣罗马帝国的皇帝是如何选出的。
How the Czechs indulge in iniquity and sin.
关于捷克人沉湎淫逸的前因后果。
How princess Libusse found a husband and thus began the Premyslid Dynasty.
讲述了丽波瑟与丈夫成婚，并开启了普热米斯尔王朝的故事。
The first part of the glorious deeds that the Czech warriors distinguished themselves with at Milan.
捷克战士们在米兰的光辉事迹的第一部分。
The second part of the glorious deeds that the Czech wariors distinguished themselves with by Milan.
捷克战士们在米兰的光辉事迹的第二部分。
About how the Maidens' War began.
About how the Maidens' war ended.
About the wars that Jobst and Procopius fought against each other in the Moravian March and how Sigismund emerged victorious.
讲述了约布斯特和普罗科普在摩拉维亚边区的战争，以及西格斯蒙德是如何获胜的。
The first part of the Luxembourg legend of the fairy Melusine.
卢森堡仙女传奇《美露莘传说》的第一部分。
The second part of the Luxembourg legend of the fairy Melusine.
卢森堡仙女传奇《美露莘传说》的第二部分。
On the council of beasts, which advised the King how to rule well and for the good of all.
野兽们在议会上向他们的王为治理国家与造福民众提出建议的故事。
How the Czechs came to their homeland.
讲述了捷克祖先是如何来到他们的家园的。
How two popes came together on the papal throne and what it means for Christianity.
讲述了教会的分裂，以及对基督教产生的影响。
On the City of a Hundred Spires.
On Saint Adalbert, his life and miserable death at the hands of the pagans.
圣阿达尔贝特的传记，记载了他的生平和被异教徒残忍杀害的结局。
A discussion about the monk Procopius and how he founded the monastery.
关于修士普罗科匹厄斯及其创立修道院的故事。
A book about Prince Wenceslas and how his brother had him killed.
讲述了瓦茨拉夫王子的故事，以及他被哥哥杀死的结局。
How Prague was besieged by several armies and how the siege was ended without any bloodshed whatsoever.
讲述了布拉格的围城战，布拉格是如何被多支军队围困，又是如何兵不血刃地平息了这场战争的。
Treatise of Master Jan Hus on the Papal Simony.
扬·胡斯大师关于教皇职位买卖的论文。
介绍了骑士比武的种种细节。
About King Wenceslas IV and how he reigned badly and ended even worse.
介绍了瓦茨拉夫四世糟糕的统治及其更糟糕的结局。
How the wicked blacksmiths help the dishonest craft and to all manner of theft.
讲述了一位邪恶的铁匠用他的技艺协助盗贼行窃的故事。
关于圣威尔格福蒂斯（或圣斯塔罗斯塔）
Supposedly part of the Königinhof manuscript, though I have doubts about its authenticity.
据说是克尼真荷夫手稿的一部分，但其真实性存疑。
On how the poor take no heed and sing merrily to themselves.
贫民们可以无所顾忌，开心传唱的歌。
A precious volume that the customs collector Matthew stole from the Sedletz monastery.
关税吏马修从塞德莱茨修道院偷来的珍贵书籍。
I found this bloodied broken arrow near the place Natan told me about. Maybe Mutt can sniff out its owner.
在纳坦告诉我的地方发现的沾血断箭，或许呆呆可以嗅出它的主人。
An ear from a lost sheep, which the shepherd Smoliek needs as proof that he did not sell it.
一只走失绵羊的耳朵，牧羊人斯莫利克想要它作为没有卖掉那只绵羊的证据。
The remains of Siegfried's sheep, which was torn apart by wolves. It may help Mutt to sniff them out.
西格弗里德的羊的遗骸，被狼撕成了碎片。呆呆或许可以跟着这个的气味找到线索。
A mace with steel flanges is a formidable weapon, yet it is still nimbler than a simple axe. It can crush and break bones even through quality plate armour.
带有钢刺的战斗狼牙棒是一种可怕的武器，且比简易斧头更为灵活。它可以穿透坚固的护甲，进而粉碎敌人的骨骼。
Bronze mace cast in one piece with ground tips. It expresses both position and determination to make one's case, even if one has to beat one's ideas into opponent's head with force.
由青铜一体打造的狼牙棒，尖端经过打磨。它既象征着地位，也表明了一种决心——即要用武力将思想灌输到对手脑海之中。
A wooden bludgeon for every street thug or bandit who waits by the roadside for an unsuspecting traveller.
一根木制棍棒，适合用于应付每个等在路边，伺机伏击毫无戒心的旅者的街头恶棍或土匪。
A wooden bludgeon reinforced with blunt spikes that can quickly turn anyone's face to a bloody mash. A weapon like this can put a swift end to any tavern brawl or absent-minded traveller's life.
一根带有钝刺的木制棒槌，转瞬间即可将人的脸打成血糊。如此武器可迅速终结任何酒馆斗殴，或是杀死心不在焉的旅人。
A fine, agile weapon with a dangerous tip forged into the shape of a dagger. No pauper can get his hands on a weapon like this, unless he steals it.
一把精致且灵活的利器，尖端锻造成匕首的形状，极具危险性。贫民要想染指如此利器，偷盗几乎是他们唯一的选择。

A captain's mace is a great weapon expressing the status of the owner and the punishment that will befall anyone who opposes him. A single movement with the weapon in hand is enough to set in motion whole ranks of warriors!
首领手中的狼牙棒是一种强大的武器，象征着持有者的身份，也预示着反对者即将遭受的惩罚。仅凭挥动此武器的简单动作就足以让整个队伍的战士动起身来！
A soft wood bludgeon, so that it doesn't hurt too much in a practice fight.
一把质地柔软的木制棍棒，所以用来练习战斗也不会伤人几分。
The magic arrowhead from Karel the Arrow's head.
A shaft with an arrowhead, which I pulled out of the head of the dead Karel, whom folk called Arrowhead. It's supposed to be magical, but I have my doubts.
我从死去的卡雷尔头上拔下的一柄带箭头的箭矢，而人们都叫卡雷尔“锋⽮”。这支箭似乎有魔力，但我对此秉持疑虑。
The crossbow that was to bring Pasha invincibility and God's favour. Unfortunately, it failed.
这把弩本应使帕夏战无不胜，为他带来上帝的恩典，可惜最后事与愿违。
The needle used to sew vicar Jan of Pomuk into a bag, after which he was thrown into the Vltava river, all on the orders of Wenceslas IV.
在瓦茨拉夫四世的命令下，杨·波穆克副主教被缝进袋子，丢进了伏尔塔瓦河，这就是当时用到的针。
Remnants of the spear that allegedly pierced Christ's body. The broken spearhead is covered in a dried black substance.
一柄长矛的残骸，据说曾刺穿耶稣的躯体，其断裂的矛尖覆盖着一层黑色物质。
The veil that ended Saint Ludmila's life. Even the absence of blood didn't prevent her canonization.
终结了圣卢德米拉生命的面纱。即使并未染血，也并不影响她的封圣。
The veil that Saint Veronica used to wipe the blood and sweat off the forehead of Jesus Christ.
圣维罗妮卡曾用于擦拭耶稣基督额头上的血汗的面纱。
A long, chainmail shirt with sleeves covering the arms and forearms.
一件长链甲衫，袖子覆盖手臂和前臂。
A long chainmail shirt with short sleeves covering only the arms of its wearer.
一件长链甲衫，衣衫的短袖仅可覆盖战士的手臂。
Shortened chainmail shirt with long sleeves.
Lightweight short chainmail shirt with shortsleeves.
Extensions of an artist's hands, used to capture the beauty of even the most fleeting moments.
艺术家挥动双手，即能捕捉到稍纵即逝的美好瞬间。
A head full of ideas, whispering into the artist's ear.
涌现的灵感在创作者的耳边低语。
Nice scarf, probably belongs to Marika, a young girl from the nomadic camp.
漂亮的围巾，似乎属于游民营地的年轻女孩玛丽卡。
A quality mead that tastes great, warms you up and gives you strength.
优质的蜂蜜酒，味道很不错，能温暖你的身体并带给你力量。
A jug filled to the brim with fresh milk.
装满一整壶的新鲜牛奶。
Leather cover, stamped corners. The mysterious book that the miller Kreyzl wants. The author is one Black Bertold.
皮革封面，盖有印章，这就是磨坊主克雷泽想要的神秘书籍。它的作者是布莱克·贝尔托德。
A rat carcass that barely resembles a rodent any more.
几乎看不出是老鼠的老鼠尸体。
A key of the owner of the Zhelejov baths, which opens a chest containing washed and patched clothes.
哲勒约夫浴场主的钥匙，可以打开一个箱子，里面装有缝补并清洗过的衣服。
A strange list of raw materials for Miller Krejzl.
磨坊主克雷泽的奇怪原材料清单。
A copy of the key that opens the chest of stolen goods at the Troskowitz Rathaus.
一把复制品钥匙，能够打开位于特罗斯科维茨市政厅里装有赃物的箱子。

Groschen, Groschen, Groschen
My silver cushion
It's a merchant's world
Groschen, Groschen, Groschen
It's my passion,
now my goods are sold.

格罗申，格罗申
大家都爱
格罗申
格罗申，格罗申
旋转起来真迷人…...
A colour darker than the night itself. It will stand out very nicely on a white bull. And most importantly, it won't wash off easily.
比夜晚还要黑的颜料，涂在白色公牛上会十分显眼。最重要的是，它非常难洗。
打开阿诺特克的牛圈的钥匙。
A pretty turquoise rosary, which, God knows why, is the focus of attention of many in Trosky Castle.
一串漂亮的绿松石念珠，不知为何突然成为了特罗斯基城堡中众人关注的焦点。
The bunch of keys of the Lord of Trosky Castle. One flew through a window and the other is somewhere behind the hills. So they are now in my custody.
特罗斯基城堡领主的一串钥匙。其中一把飞出了窗外，另一把掉到了后山，现在它们都在我手里。
Orders from Sigismund, the sly fox, to his followers. Letter confidentiality is an important institution, but I'll make an exception this time.
狡诈之徒西格斯蒙德交给其追随者的密令。信件保密向来是项重要议题，但这次我要破例。
A sack with supplies ready for travel.
装有旅行必需品的麻袋。
An older hat I found in a pile of bloodied rags in Nebakov. Who knows how it got there. It stinks pretty bad, but with a little care, it could still be useful.
在内巴科夫的一堆血迹斑斑的破布里找到的一顶旧帽子，鬼知道它为什么会在那种地方。它臭气熏天，但稍加清理或许仍会有用。
A shield with the coat of arms of the Lords of Leipa, which I found at the Nebakov castle.
一面印有莱佩领主纹章的盾牌，是我在内巴科夫城堡发现的。
The key to the lower tower of Nebakov Fortress.
内巴科夫堡垒下方塔楼的钥匙。
The key to the jail at Nebakov Fortress.
内巴科夫堡垒的监狱钥匙。
The key I found in Nebakov Fortress, probably fits to some door there.
我在内巴科夫要塞找到的钥匙，也许能打开那里的某扇门。
The necklace of the nomadic foreman protects against bewitchment and evil spells.
游民首领的项链，可抵抗妖术和邪恶法术。
Very beautiful gold jewelry with dark red gems.
镶有深红色宝石的黄金珠宝饰品，属实炫彩夺目。
This piece is decorated with freshwater pearls of a beautiful cream colour.
此物品装饰有美丽的奶油色淡水珍珠。
A tiny pendant, usually worn around the neck or wrapped around the wrist, is associated with praising the Virgin Mary and other saints.
小巧的配饰，通常佩戴于脖上，或绕在手腕上，被视为是颂扬圣母玛利亚和其他圣人的标志。
A tiny pendant, usually worn around the neck or wrapped around the wrist, is associated with praising of the Virgin Mary and other saints.
小巧的配饰，通常佩戴于脖上，或绕在手腕上，被视为是颂扬圣母玛利亚和其他圣人的标志。
A tiny pendant, usually worn around the neck or wrapped around the wrist, is associated with the veneration of the Virgin Mary and other saints.
小巧的配饰，通常佩戴于脖上，或绕在手腕上，被视为是对圣母玛利亚和其他圣人崇拜的标志。
Very nice cross with a deep red gemstone.
镶有深红色宝石的优质十字架。
A decorated cross is made from silver, but one can certainly pray without precious ornaments.
银制的装饰性十字架，但人们完全可以在没有宝贵装饰的情况下进行祈祷。
A simple cross made of plain pewter, but it will certainly suffice for a supplication for a better tomorrow.
一枚用普通锡制成的简单十字架，虽然朴素，但足以用来祈求更美好的明天。
A map of the old hideout of Innkeeper Beikovetz's disbanded gang of robbers.
一张地图，上面是已解散的贝科维茨强盗团伙曾经的藏匿处。
A map disclosing the location of the secret store of Innkeeper Beikovetz's former band of thieves.
一张地图，上面揭示了客栈老板贝科维茨昔日盗贼团伙的秘密藏匿点。
A key I found in a bird's nest in an old willow tree in the swamp outside of Kuttenberg, near Sedletz.
在塞德莱茨附近，库滕堡郊外沼泽中一棵老柳树上的鸟巢里找到的钥匙。
First class bridle consisting of a bronze decorated bit, cheekpieces, reins, headpiece, browband and noseband. It helps the horse to achieve higher speed and stamina.
质量一流的马勒，配有青铜嚼环、颊片、缰绳、头带、鼻带和额带，可提升马匹速度和耐力。
Bridle decorated with crenellation consisting of a bit, cheekpieces, reins, headpiece, browband and noseband. It helps the horse to achieve higher speed and stamina.
饰有锯齿状物的马勒，配有嚼环、颊片、缰绳、头带、鼻带和额带，可提升马匹速度和耐力。
A cape of thick cloth covering the entire body of the horse decorated with embroidery. It makes the animal much bolder, but slows it down and limits its carrying capacity.
厚布料制成的披挂物，可覆盖整个马身，装饰有刺绣。此物可使马匹更为勇猛，但会减慢其速度且限制负重能力。
A cape of thick cloth covering the entire body of the horse decorated with embroidery and crenellations. It makes the animal much bolder, but slows it down and limits its carrying capacity.
厚布料制成的披挂物，可覆盖整个马身，装饰有刺绣和锯齿状物。此物可使马匹更为勇猛，但会减慢其速度且限制负重能力。

A cape of thick cloth covering the entire body of the animal except its head and neck, decorated with embroidery. It makes the animal considerably bolder, but slows it down and limits its carrying capacity.
厚布料制成的披挂物，可覆盖马匹除头部与脖颈以外的躯体，饰有刺绣。此物可使马匹变得十分勇猛，但会减慢其速度且限制负重能力。

A cape of thick cloth covering the entire body of the horse except its head and neck, decorated with embroidery and crenellations. It makes the animal much bolder, but slows it down and limits its carrying capacity.
厚布料制成的披挂物，可覆盖马匹除头部与脖颈以外的躯体，装饰有刺绣和锯齿状物。此物可使马匹更为勇猛，但会减慢其速度且限制负重能力。

A cape of thick cloth covering the head, neck and shoulders of the horse. The cape is decorated with embroidery. It makes the animal bolder, but it also slows it down and limits its carrying capacity.
厚布料制成的披挂物，可覆盖马匹的头、颈和肩膀部位。此披挂还饰有刺绣，可使马匹更为勇猛，但会减慢其速度且限制负重能力。

A cape of thick cloth covering the head, neck and shoulders of the horse. The cape is decorated with embroidery and crenellations. While it makes the animal bolder, it also slows it down and limits its carrying capacity.
厚布料制成的披挂物，可覆盖马匹的头、颈和肩部。此披挂还饰有刺绣和锯齿状物，可使马匹更为勇猛，但会减慢其速度且限制负重能力。

A cape of thick cloth covering the head, neck and shoulders of the horse. The cape is decorated with embroidery, crenellations and a Mainz harness. It makes the animal significantly bolder, but slows it down and limits its carrying capacity.
厚布料制成的披挂物，可覆盖马匹的头、颈和肩膀部位。此披挂还饰有刺绣、锯齿状物且配有美因茨马具，可使马匹变得十分勇猛，但会减慢其速度且限制负重能力。

A cape of thick cloth covering only the head, neck and back, decorated with embroidery and crenellations. It makes the animal much bolder, but at the same time slows it down and limits its carrying capacity.
厚布料制成的披挂物，仅覆盖马匹头、颈和背部，装饰有刺绣和锯齿状物。此物可使马匹更为勇猛，但同时会减慢其速度且限制负重能力。
Thick cloth cape with embroidery covering only the horse's loins. While the cape makes the animal bolder, it also slows it down and limits its carrying capacity.
厚布料制成的披挂物，饰有刺绣，仅覆盖马匹的腰部。此披挂可使马匹更为勇猛，但会减慢其速度且限制负重能力。

A cape of thick cloth covering the head, neck and shoulders of the horse. The cape is decorated with embroidery and crenellations and is completed with a Hague harness. It makes the animal significantly bolder, but slows it down and limits its carrying capacity.
厚布料制成的披挂物，可覆盖马匹的头、颈和肩膀部位。此披挂还饰有刺绣、锯齿状物且配有海牙马具，可使马匹变得十分勇猛，但会减慢其速度且限制负重能力。
A cape of thick cloth covering the entire body of the horse decorated with embroidery and crenellations. It makes the animal much bolder, but slows it down and limits its carrying capacity.
厚布料制成的披挂物，可覆盖整个马身，装饰有刺绣和锯齿状物。此物可使马匹更为勇猛，但会减慢其速度且限制负重能力。

A first class versatile saddle with bronze-lined cantle, decorated fenders and sheep's wool pads. The generous extension of the carrying capacity brings with it a reduction in the speed of the animal.
一流的多功能马鞍，配有镶铜的鞍尾、装饰性蹬革和羊毛垫。此物能大幅提升马匹的负重能力，但随之也降低了马匹的速度。
High quality tournament saddle with bronze lined cantle and fur cushions. The generous increase in carrying capacity brings with it a reduction in the speed of the animal.
质量上乘的比武用马鞍，配有镶铜的鞍尾和毛皮垫。此物能大幅提升马匹的负重能力，但随之也降低了马匹的速度。
Excellent versatile saddle made of solid wood with decorative horn and saddle bags. The generous extension of the carrying capacity brings with it a reduction in the speed of the animal.
优良的多功能硬木鞍具，配有装饰性号角和鞍袋。此物能大幅提升马匹的负重能力，但随之也降低了马匹的速度。
This sword has been through a lot, and with a little care, could still be.
这把剑历经沧桑，如果稍加保养，仍然可以继续使用。
An onion: healthy, juicy and fresh.
洋葱：有益于健康、多汁且新鲜。
A nice onion can improve any dish.
优质的洋葱可以提升任何菜肴的风味。
Thick quilted cape covering the whole body of the horse decorated with crenellations. It makes the horse more courageous and strong, but limits its speed and stamina.
加厚的绗缝披挂，可覆盖马匹全身，饰有锯齿状物。此物可使马匹更为勇猛，但同时会限制它的速度和耐力。
Thick quilted cape covering the entire body of the horse, shortened above the knees. It makes the horse more courageous and strong, but noticeably limits his speed and stamina.
加厚的绗缝披挂，可覆盖马匹全身，长度短至马匹膝部。此物可使马匹更为勇猛，但同时会显著限制它的速度和耐力。
Thick quilted cape covering the horse's head, neck and shoulders. Makes the horse bolder and braver. It does, however, slightly limit its speed and stamina.
加厚的绗缝披挂，可覆盖马匹头、颈和肩膀部位。此物可使马匹更为勇猛，但同时会轻微限制它的速度和耐力。
Thick quilted hood covering the horse's head, neck and shoulders decorated with crenellations. Makes the horse bolder and braver. It does, however, slightly limit his speed and stamina.
加厚的绗缝披挂，可覆盖马匹头、颈和肩部，饰有锯齿状物。此物可使马匹更为勇猛，但同时会轻微限制它的速度和耐力。

Thick quilted cape covering the horse's head, neck and shoulders. The cape is decorated with crenellations and is completed with a Wielun harness. It makes the horse bolder and braver, but at the same time limits its speed and stamina.
加厚的绗缝披挂，可覆盖马匹头、颈和肩膀部位。此披挂饰有锯齿状物，且配备了维隆马具，可使马匹更为勇猛，但同时会限制它的速度和耐力。

Thick quilted cape covering the horse's head, neck and shoulders. The cape is completed with a Mainz harness. It makes the horse bolder and braver, but at the same time it noticeably limits its speed and stamina.
加厚的绗缝披挂，可覆盖马匹头、颈和肩膀部位。此披挂配备了美因茨马具，可使马匹更为勇猛，但同时会显著限制它的速度和耐力。

Thick quilted cape covering the horse's head, neck and shoulders. The cape is decorated with crenellations and completed with a Mainz harness. It makes the horse bolder and stronger, but at the same time limits its speed and stamina.
加厚的绗缝披挂，可覆盖马匹头、颈和肩膀部位。此披挂饰有锯齿状物，且配备了美因茨马具，可使马匹更为勇猛，但同时会限制它的速度和耐力。
Thick quilted cape covering the horse's head, neck and shoulders, complete with a Hague harness. It makes the horse bolder and stronger, but also limits its speed and stamina.
加厚的绗缝披挂，可覆盖马匹头、颈和肩膀部位。此物配备海牙马具，可使马匹更为勇猛，但同时会限制它的速度和耐力。

Thick quilted cape covering the horse's head, neck and shoulders. The cape is decorated with crenellations and is completed with a Hague harness. It makes the horse bolder and braver, but at the same time it noticeably limits its speed and stamina.
加厚的绗缝披挂，可覆盖马匹头、颈和肩膀部位。此披挂饰有锯齿状物，且配备了海牙马具，可使马匹更为勇猛，但同时会显著限制它的速度和耐力。
A small worn-down statuette of St Mary Magdalene. Beikovetz must have stolen it straight from some church or monastery.
一个破旧的⻢格达莱妮圣玛利亚的小雕像，肯定是贝科维茨从教堂或者修道院偷来的。
A hastily scribbled letter addressed to Christian of Pisek.
一封草草写给皮塞克的克里斯蒂安的信。
The key to the treasury of the Italian Court.
Makes running impossible and reduces all weapon skills by 2.
致人丧失奔跑能力，且所有武器技能降低2点。
Makes running impossible and reduces all weapon skills by 3. Gradually reduces Health by 20.
致人丧失奔跑能力，且所有武器技能降低3点，同时逐渐减少20点生命值。
Makes running impossible and reduces all weapon skills by 4. Gradually reduces Health by 30.
致人丧失奔跑能力，且所有武器技能降低4点，同时逐渐减少30点生命值。
Makes running impossible and reduces all weapon skills by 5. Gradually reduces Health by 50.
致人丧失奔跑能力，且所有武器技能降低5点，同时逐渐减少50点生命值。
To make you last a long time. Healing from root to green bud.
能让你长时间保持最佳状态，从根茎到嫩芽均具有治疗效果。
A juicy sweet fruit with a fine fuzz that makes many a young man feel amorous.
甜美多汁的水果，表面有一层细绒毛，让许多年轻人感到内心的蠢动。
The pear is a symbol of generosity, goodness and modesty. On top of all that, it tastes great too.
梨子象征着慷慨、善良与谦逊，而且它的味道也格外美妙。
Cooked pear softens up and smells wonderful.
When you have no idea what to do with all those pears.
当你对该如何处理那些梨毫无头绪时……
Rare Arabic spice for a delicious flavour.
珍贵的阿拉伯香料，散发着美味的香气。

Perch or other fish are healthy, you should eat a lot of them. You can season fish with spices and coat it in flour. Then fry it in butter. Finally, sprinkle it generously with fried onion and serve with bread.
鲈鱼，或者说所有的鱼类都利于健康，你应该多吃一点。可以用香料调味鱼肉并裹上面粉，然后在黄油中煎炸，最后撒上大量的炸洋葱，配上面包一起享用。
Increases Charisma by 1 for 20 minutes. However, if you use it in combination with another perfume, it decreases Charisma by 5.
增加1点魅力，持续20分钟。但如果与其它香水混用，将减少5点魅力。
Increases Charisma by 5 for 40 minutes. However, if you use it in combination with another perfume, it decreases Charisma by 5.
增加5点魅力，持续40分钟。但如果与其它香水混用，将减少5点魅力。
Increases Charisma by 3 for 30 minutes. However, if you use it in combination with another perfume, it decreases Charisma by 5.
增加3点魅力，持续30分钟。但如果与其它香水混用，将减少5点魅力。
Increases Charisma by 2 for 20 minutes. However, if you use it in combination with another perfume, it decreases Charisma by 5.
增加2点魅力，持续20分钟。但如果与其它香水混用，将减少5点魅力。
Increases Charisma by 3 for 3 minutes. However, if you use it in combination with another perfume, it decreases Charisma by 7.
增加3点魅力，持续3分钟。但如果与其它香水混用，将减少7点魅力。
Increases Charisma by 10 for 10 minutes. However, if you use it in combination with another perfume, it decreases Charisma by 7.
增加10点魅力，持续10分钟。但如果与其它香水混用，将减少7点魅力。
Increases Charisma by 7 for 5 minutes. However, if you use it in combination with another perfume, it decreases Charisma by 7.
增加7点魅力，持续5分钟。但如果与其它香水混用，将减少7点魅力。
Increases Charisma by 4 for 4 minutes. However, if you use it in combination with another perfume, it decreases Charisma by 7.
增加4点魅力，持续4分钟。但如果与其它香水混用，将减少7点魅力。
Its smell makes your toes curl.
它的味道让人难以忍受。
Raw pork liver should be eaten for some diseases, but otherwise it is better to cook it.
生吃猪肝对治疗某些疾病益处非凡，但除此之外，最好还是将其煮熟后再食用。
Fatty pork liver, a delicacy of courts and backyards. But it should be prepared first. Perhaps by frying them with onions in butter, then pouring black beer over them and adding pieces of bread.
肥美的猪肝，既是一种宫廷美食，也是一道家常菜肴。它的料理方式十分讲究，需要将它和洋葱一起放在黄油中煎炸，之后倒入黑啤酒，并加入一些面包屑。
There are many ways to prepare pork. Just be careful not to burn it or undercook it!
准备猪肉的方法很多，但是要注意火候。

You can make a delicious pastry with pork. Salt the meat and boil it until tender. Slice apples, add eggs and pepper, add to the meat and continue cooking. Mix the flour with the wine, add the eggs and cream, put a little saffron on top, and knead a good dough. Place the meat on top, cover with the pastry and then bake until golden brown.
在猪肉上撒些盐，煮至嫩滑，切几片苹果，再加入鸡蛋和胡椒粉，继续烹饪一段时间。把面粉和葡萄酒混合，加入一些鸡蛋和奶油，再放上一点藏红花揉成面团，裹在煮好的猪肉上，烤至金黄色，就是一道美味的酥皮点心了。
Dried pig is excellent for long trips to the mountains...
风干猪肉适合在山区长途跋涉的旅行者......
Smoked pig tastes best on plum wood.
在李子木上熏制的猪肉味道最佳。

Here is a Hungarian way of cooking pork. Pound the meat, put it in water and let it rest overnight. Take it out of water, salt it and sear it. Fry plenty of onion, add wine, vinegar, juniper, caraway, cloves, pepper, ginger and a little nutmeg too. Bring everything to boil, add the meat, keep the lid on and cook over a low heat for a long time, while basting with wine.
一种来自匈牙利的猪肉烹制方法。先将肉捣碎，放入水中浸泡过夜，之后取出肉，加盐煎制。之后把大量的炸洋葱、葡萄酒、醋、杜松子、葛缕子、丁香、胡椒、生姜和一点肉豆蔻混在一起煮沸，再加入肉，盖上盖子，小火煮的同时浇上葡萄酒，煮上一段时间后就大功告成了。
Placeholder weapon, if you found it in the final build, report it!
占位符武器，如果你在游戏成品中发现，请向我们汇报！
A tool used for picking locks. Just don't get caught doing it.
撬锁用的工具。别被抓个正着就行。
Spades are for digging graves, shovels are for tossing sand.
挖土的是铁锹，挖沙的是铲子。

This spade is like a gift from the heavens. Its blade is so sharp, it could split the clouds. When you firmly grasp it in your hand, you feel as if it wants to speak through you. The subtle cuts and scrapes on it are like the graceful strokes of the angels themselves. On its blade, you can make out not only soil, but also traces of clay, calcium, and charcoal left behind by its many years of service. With a spade like this, you wouldn't even hesitate going up against the local invaders.
这把铲子仿佛上天赐予之物，锋利得像是能撕开云层。当你的双手紧紧握住铲柄时，你仿佛能感受到它在与你共鸣，铲子上细微的切口和划痕如同天使亲自雕刻般优美。经过多年的使用，铲刃上沾染了土壤的痕迹，黏土、钙质和木炭也在铲头上留下了印记。若持此铲，面对侵扰之敌，你将毫不畏惧。
Delicious fruit with fragrant flesh. Watch out for the sharp pit inside!
美味的水果，果肉散发着芳香，但要小心里面尖锐的核！
A dark faded tunic. Once dressed, the wearer becomes invisible... but more likely, no one will want to look at him.
一件深色的褪色长袍。穿上后，穿戴者便可身形隐匿......但更可能是因为没人愿意去留意他。
Florian's copies of the verses of Margrave Prokop of Luxembourg from his captivity in Pressburg.
卢森堡的普罗科普侯爵在普雷斯堡被囚期间的诗句，由弗洛里安抄录。
Good poems about women, love and wine by pupils of the scoundrels.
学生中的混混们关于女人，爱和美酒的一手好诗。
A key found near two dead marksmen.
在两名射手尸体身边发现的钥匙。
A book by the noble Ctirad of Loretz on why the crossbow will never replace the bow. Can be read from level 10 of the Marksmanship skill.
洛雷兹贵族特雷德写的著作，讲述了为什么弩永远不会取代弓。射术技能10级以上才能阅读。
A treatise by the venerable Albrecht the Sharpshooter on why the crossbow is the new bow. Can be read from level 10 of marksmanship.
著名神射手阿尔布雷希特的著作，介绍了弩是如何取代弓的地位的。射术技能10级以上才能阅读。
A key from the Kopanina bandit.
科帕尼那强盗那里的钥匙。
The key I found in a skeleton by an abandoned cart on the riverbank.
河岸上一辆废弃马车旁的骷髅身上的钥匙。
Remnants of a rope, likely a noose.
一段残余的绳子，原本可能是一个绞索。
A map that was clutched by the hand of a skeleton in the Zelejov marshes.
一张地图，被发现时紧握在哲勒约夫沼泽中的一具骷髅手中。
An odd straw hat I found lying under an old tree. I have a strange feeling about it. It seems to carry with it the will of those who wore it before me.
我在一棵老树下发现的奇特草帽。它给我一种奇怪的感觉，似乎这顶帽子承载着旧主的意愿。
The map that the caught thief had in his possession. I wonder what it leads to?
被抓的小偷身上的地图。它指向何处？
A child's skull I dug up in the Sedletz cemetary.
在塞德莱茨墓地挖到的孩童的颅骨。
A skull I dug up, from a grave under the walls of Kuttenberg.
我从库滕堡城墙下的一处坟墓中挖出的头骨。
Key hidden in a chicken coop in Mesoles.
藏于梅索莱斯一处鸡笼里的钥匙。
A map I found in a chest beneath the wall of Sedletz monastery.
我在塞德莱茨修道院墙下的一个箱子里找到的地图。
Map showing places where you can hunt game in the vicinity of Slatego.
地图上标记处了斯拉戈附近的狩猎点。
A key I took out of a jug in the ruins of a half-built cottage near Slatego.
我在斯拉戈附近的一座未完工的小屋废墟中捡到的钥匙，当时它放在一个罐子里。
A key I found in a jug in an abandoned cottage.
在一个废弃小屋的罐子里找到的钥匙。
Key I found in the hands of a skeleton in Apollonia.
一把钥匙，在阿波罗尼亚的一具尸骨手中发现的。
Nobody makes mead like that anymore.
现在还有谁会那样酿制蜂蜜酒。
A soaked map, completely illegible. This won't be leading me anywhere.
一张湿透的地图。完全无法辨认，也没法为我指引方向。
Lost key to the fisherman's house, probably dropped on his way out of the tavern.
丢失的渔夫家钥匙，可能是渔夫离开酒馆之后不小心在路上丢的。
The lost key to the gamekeeper's house, he must have lost it on his way home from the tavern.
猎人丢失的家钥匙，一定是他从酒馆回家的时候丢的。
The lost key to the farmhouse, found its place under the bridge at the Zhelejov tavern.
丢失的农舍钥匙，在哲勒约夫酒馆的桥下找到的。
An old rusty key I found in a cave beneath Trosky.
我在特罗斯基地下山洞里找到的一把生锈旧钥匙。
A bottle of moonshine that's been hidden in the caves beneath Trosky since the castle was built. It's a once-in-a-lifetime experience.
一瓶自特罗斯基城堡建成以来就藏在地窖之中的私酿酒，如此美酒此生能得几回逢？
A key that someone keeps in a chest by the front wall of Sedletz Monastery.
在塞德莱茨修道院院墙附近箱子中的钥匙。
Everything you ever wanted to know about gardening but were afraid to ask. Can be read from level 5 of the Survival skill.
记录了一切关于园艺你想知道却不敢问的内容。生存技能5级以上才能阅读。
A heavy work axe used by carpenters to repair beams. If there's no better weapon at hand, it can become a tool of revenge.
一把用于修理梁木的重型斧头，通常由木匠使用。不过如果手边没有更好的武器，它也可以成为反击的工具。
A key I found on a weird alchemist hiding in the ruins of the Rabstein fortress.
一个藏起来的怪异炼金术士身上的钥匙，我在拉布斯坦堡垒废墟中找到的。
A map I found hidden at Hunter Vostatek's.
在猎人沃斯塔克家里藏着的地图。
A bow I found in an abandoned poacher's hideout.
在一个废弃的偷猎者藏匿点找到的弓。
An arrow with black crow feathers.
以黑色乌鸦羽毛作箭羽的箭矢。
A very worn and battered tome. Can be read from level 10 of the Scholarship skill.
一本破旧的大部头书。学术技能10级以上才能阅读。
A piece of parchment with a message full of despair.
一张羊皮纸，上面写满了绝望。
A map I found on a dead smuggler in the Kuttenberg underground.
我在库滕堡地下的走私者尸体上找到的地图。
The key to the chest where the gravedigger stores the belongings of the dead.
掘墓人用于存放死者遗物的箱子的钥匙。
A map the gravedigger found on a dead man.
掘墓人在一名死者身上发现的地图。
It has a nice golden colour, but the taste is not all that impressive. It's more of an average vintage.
呈现出漂亮的金黄色，但味道就很一般了，像是一瓶普通的年份酒。
Good enough for the Prague folk.
对布拉格居民来说已经很不错了。
There was not enough sun and the autumn was rainy, so the grapes did not have time to ripen properly.
由于阳光不足，秋季多雨，没有足够的时间让葡萄成熟。
The young winemaker Prokop's first vintage. It's drinkable…
年轻酿酒师普罗科普的首款葡萄酒，姑且还能喝......
Someone fucked up and let the wine ferment all the way down to vinegar.
有人搞砸了，把酒发酵成了醋。
Well, this swill isn't very nice.
呃，这“泔水”真是难以下咽。
1402 was an excellent vintage and the winemaker clearly had considerable talent. This is the best wine ever made here.
1402年是个好年份，酿酒师也很有本事，这是这里酿过的最好的酒了。
Rough sketch of a map of the site by the pond.
Ivy green trousers. When I wear them, I'm drawn to the water. But I can't swim.
颜色为常青藤绿的裤子。当我穿上这条裤子，就会被水吸引，但我不会游泳。
The key I found on a corpse in the pond outside of Bohunowitz.
在博胡诺维茨外池塘里的尸体上找到的钥匙。
I found this key not far from the Lower Semine mill in a nest in a clearing.
我在下塞米不远处空地上的一个鸟巢中发现了这把钥匙。
A map from the bandits that camped above the Vidlak Pond.
维德拉克池塘旁扎营强盗的地图。
This key belonged to one of the bandits from the camp above Vidlak pond.
维德拉克池塘上方一个强盗的钥匙。
A key found on a hanged man above the pond near Horschan.
在霍斯昌附近的池塘找到的钥匙，当时在一个上吊者的身上。
The key from the overgrown shelter not far from Trosky.
特罗斯基附近杂草丛生的避难所中找到的钥匙。
A key I found lying around near the closed mine. And what could it be for?
我在附近的废弃矿洞里找到的一枚钥匙。这是什么的钥匙呢？
Sauerkraut from Pepa the dimwit. I don't know how the lad does it, but this sauerkraut can cure anything.
傻瓜佩帕的酸菜，我不知道这小子是怎么弄到它的，但这酸菜确实可以治愈一切。
A simple pole weapon for those who need to keep the enemy and the cities' scum at bay. Its original blade is joined with a hook for tripping enemies' legs and pushing ladders off battlements.
一种简易长柄武器，适合那些需要与敌人和恶徒保持战斗距离的人。它的原始刀刃上连接着钩子，用于绊倒敌人和掀翻城墙上的攻城梯。
A knight's battle axe on a staff. This is exactly what George the Lion of Wartenberg wanted. In the end, I made it according to the lost instructions.
一把带有长柄的骑士战斧。由瓦滕贝格之狮乔治亲自设计。如今，我已根据失传的设计重新打造了它。

A simple pole weapon for those who aren't highborn enough to get their hands on something better. It's nothing more than a long blade with a sharp point on a long handle, but unlike other pikes it doesn't have a hook.
一种简易的长柄武器，适合那些出身卑微、无法使用精良兵器之人。它只是一把由尖锐刀刃与长柄拼接而成的武器，但与其他长矛不同的是，它没有钩子。

An excellent long weapon for infantry and anyone who prefers to keep their opponent at bay. The secret of its true power is hidden in the tight formation of the trained men who, with its help, can resist even a charge of knightly cavalry.
一种优质的长柄武器，适合步兵和一切希望与对手保持距离的人使用。它真正的威力藏于由受过训练的士兵组成的紧密队形之中，借助这武器，他们即可抵挡骑兵的冲锋。

A crushing polearm weapon whose name may refer to the first morning star, but for the enemy, a blow from its blade is likely to be the last thing they will ever see. A seemingly clumsy weapon that can command respect in any brawl.
又名莫根斯特恩（Morgenstern），一把适合进行重击长柄武器，它的名字可能指的是第一颗启明星，但对敌人来说，它的攻击可能是他们死前经历的最后一件事。这柄武器虽然看似笨拙，但在任何打斗中都能让人肃然起敬。
If nothing better is at hand, at least this will do. A simple but effective tool, which is as good for pitching hay as it is at stabbing the enemy where the sun don't shine.
如果找不着更好的武器，至少这个能派上用场。它是一种简单却有效的工具，既可以用来整理干草，也可击伤敌人的隐秘部位。

A pitchfork left here by farmer Matthew. Everyone in Tachov knows that wherever Matthew and his pitchfork go, merriment follows. It seems Matthew may have gotten a bit too merry, as he left his pitchfork behind.
一把被农夫马修留在此处的干草叉。在塔霍夫，众人皆知，马修及其干草叉所到之处，必有欢笑随行。但马修喝得似乎有些忘乎所以，才会把干草叉抛之脑后。

A knight's battle axe on a pole designed especially for noble warriors, because its forging cannot be entrusted to any village blacksmith. A terrible crushing and slashing weapon, it can cut through even the best armour like a knife through butter.
一把安装在长柄上的骑士战斧，专为贵族战士而设计，因为没有哪个乡村铁匠能完成它的锻造工作。这是一把劈砍有力的可怕武器，能如刀切黄油一般轻松劈开最坚固的盔甲。
An immortal weapon well known to mankind since the creation of the world. A simple long spear with an added hook for tripping the legs of enemies and pushing ladders off battlements.
对人类来说，自创世以来，这种不朽利器就家喻户晓。这是一种简易长矛，附有钩子，用于绊倒敌人和掀翻城墙上的攻城梯。
A wooden pole without reinforced ends, so it wouldn't hurt so much during infantry training. It can also be used at any time to prove that there are no small men only small targets.
一根末端未设利器的木杆，因此在步兵训练中就不会造成太大伤害。它也可以随时用来证明，勇者持棍棒亦可杀敌。

A polearm commonly used by foot soldiers. A virtuous knight would not touch such a weapon, but for a city patrol it is an invaluable tool for establishing order and respect in even the most crime-ridden places.
一种步兵常用的长柄武器。尽管高尚的骑士并不会触碰这种兵器，但对于城市巡逻兵来说，它可是无价之宝，即使在犯罪猖獗的地方，也能靠它建立秩序和威信。
A good poppy seed cake is beneficial to all the senses. It calms and soothes. Quick, one more piece before it's banned for being too delicious!
一块上好的罂粟籽蛋糕有百利而无一害，它能镇静和舒缓情绪。快，再吃一块，免得它因为太好吃而被禁止了！
A key to a chest found in the possession of the poacher, Mach of Marschowitz.
在偷猎者⻢绍维茨的⻢赫身上发现的钥匙。
A squirrel's tail, used to identify members of Mach of Marschowitz's band of poachers. The local huntsman is sure to pay a bounty for these.
一条松鼠尾巴，用于识别马施维茨的马赫偷猎者团伙的成员。本地猎人肯定会为它支付赏金。
A beautiful white hide taken from a buck. Found in the poachers' camp in the forest near Suchdol.
一张美丽的白色雄鹿皮。发现于苏赫多尔附近森林中的偷猎者营地。
A white hide taken from a young roebuck. It's sad, I reckon there aren't many white roebucks in the region.
从一只年幼雄性狍子身上取下的白色兽皮。本来就稀缺的白色狍子又少了一只，真遗憾。
Increases Horsemanship and Houndmaster by 3 for a quarter of a day. Animals will take less notice of you, so you'll find it easier to approach them.
提升3点马术和训犬，持续四分之一天。动物对你的警觉性降低，因此你可以更为轻易地接近它们。
Increases Horsemanship and Houndmaster by 7 for one day. Animals will take less notice of you, so you'll find it easier to approach them. Dogs won't notice you at all.
提升7点马术和训犬，持续一天。动物对你的警觉性降低，因此你可以更为轻易地接近它们，犬类也将不再对你有所察觉。
Increases Horsemanship and Houndmaster by 5 for half a day. Animals will take less notice of you, so you'll find it easier to approach them. Dogs won't notice you at all.
提升5点马术和训犬，持续半天。动物对你的警觉性降低，因此你可以更为轻易地接近它们，犬类也将不再对你有所察觉。
Increases Horsemanship and Houndmaster by 3 for half a day. Animals will take less notice of you, so you'll find it easier to approach them.
提升3点马术和训犬，持续半天。动物对你的警觉性降低，因此你可以更为轻易地接近它们。
Decreases Nourishment by 20 and cures food poisoning.
降低20点营养，治愈食物中毒。
Decreases Nourishment by 30, cures poisoning and increases Vitality by 3 for 20 minutes.
降低30点营养，治疗中毒，同时提升3点活力，持续20分钟。
Decreases Nourishment by 20, cures poisoning and increases Vitality by 2 for 10 minutes.
降低20点营养，治疗中毒，同时提升2点活力，持续10分钟。
Decreases Nourishment by 20, cures food poisoning and increases Vitality by 1 for 10 minutes.
降低20点营养，治疗食物中毒，同时提升1点活力，持续10分钟。
You lose 15% less Health for 5 minutes.
你的生命值消耗降低15%，持续5分钟。
You lose 60% less Health and bleed 60% slower for 15 minutes.
你的生命值消耗降低60%，流血速度降低60%，持续15分钟。
You lose 30% less Health and slows bleeding by 30%. Lasts 10 minutes.
你的生命值消耗降低50%，同时降低30%的流血速度，持续10分钟。
You lose 15% less Health and slows bleeding by 10%. Lasts 10 minutes.
你受到的伤害减少15%，且流血速度降低10%，持续10分钟。
Increases Strength by 6 and both attack and defence cost 35% less Stamina. Lasts 15 minutes.
提升6点力量，攻击和防御消耗的耐力均降低35%，持续15分钟。
Increases Strength by 4 and both attack and defence cost 25% less Stamina, lasts 10 minutes.
提升4点力量，攻击和防御消耗的耐力均降低25%，持续10分钟。
Increases Speech by 3 for half a day.
Increases Speech by 7, increases reading speed and increases the amount of experience gained by 50% for two days.
提升7点口才，同时提升阅读速度，并且经验获取量提高50%，持续两天。
Increases Speech by 5 and increases your reading speed for a day.
提升5点口才，同时提高阅读速度，持续一天。
Increases Speech by 3 and increases your reading speed for a day.
提升3点口才，同时提高阅读速度，持续一天。
Increases Marksmanship by 8 and stops Stamina loss when aiming for 15 minutes.
提升8点射术，瞄准时不再消耗耐力，持续15分钟。
Increases Marksmanship by 5 and slows down Stamina loss when aiming by 50% for 10 minutes.
提升5点射术，同时瞄准时的耐力消耗降低50%，持续10分钟。
Increases Marksmanship by 3 and slows down Stamina loss when aiming by 20% for 10 minutes.
提升3点射术，同时瞄准时的耐力消耗降低20%，持续10分钟。
Increases Agility by 6 and Sprint will cost 30% less stamina, lasts 20 minutes.
提升6点敏捷，冲刺时消耗的耐力降低30%，持续20分钟。
Increases Agility by 4 and Sprint will cost 20% less Stamina, lasts 15 minutes.
提升4点敏捷，冲刺时消耗的耐力降低20%，持续15分钟。
Increases Agility by 4 and Sprint will cost 10% less stamina, lasts 10 minutes.
提升4点敏捷，冲刺时消耗的耐力降低10%，持续10分钟。
Fever and related complications can often lead to death. This tonicum will alleviate fever if given in time.
发烧及相关病症常常会导致死亡，而及时服用此种药剂将可缓解发热症状。
An unknown potion. God alone knows what good - or bad - it can do.
一瓶来路不明的药剂，也不知它会带来福禄，还是会招致横祸。
Eliminates drunkenness, hangover and temporarily suppresses the effects of alcoholism.
消除醉酒与宿醉反应，并暂时抑制酒精中毒。
缓解醉酒或消除宿醉反应。
Strong alcoholic drink. Watch out for the hangover!
高度数酒精性饮料。小心宿醉！
Increases Energy by 30 and Energy decreases 50% slower for a day.
提升30点能量，且能量的消耗速度降低50%，持续一天。
Increases Energy by 20 and Energy decreases 20% slower for half a day.
能量提升20点，且能量减少速度降低20%，持续半天。
Heals 15 health over one minute and hangover passes 50% faster.
在一分钟内恢复15点生命值，宿醉反应的消退速度提升50%。
Heals 25 health over one minute and hangover passes 100% faster.
在一分钟内恢复25点生命值，宿醉反应的消退速度提升100%。
Heals 40 health over one minute and instantly cures hangover.
在一分钟内恢复40点生命值，且立即消除宿醉反应。
Heals 60 health over one minute and instantly cures hangover.
在一分钟内恢复60点生命值，且立即消除宿醉反应。
You will see better in the dark for 10 minutes.
你于黑暗中的视觉将得到提升，持续10分钟。
You will see better in the dark and Energy will decrease 25% slower, lasts 15 minutes.
你于黑暗中的视觉将得到提升，且能量消耗速度降低25%，持续15分钟。
You will see better in the dark and Energy will decrease 50% slower, lasts 20 minutes.
你于黑暗中的视觉将得到提升，且能量消耗速度降低50%，持续20分钟。
You will see better in the dark and Energy will not decrease at all, lasts 25 minutes.
你于黑暗中的视觉将得到提升，且能量不会减少，持续25分钟。
Increases Craftmanship and Thievery by 2 for 20 minutes.
工艺和偷窃提升2点，持续20分钟。
Increases Craftmanship and Thievery by 4 for 20 minutes.
工艺和偷窃提升4点，持续20分钟。
Increases Craftmanship and Thievery by 6 for 40 minutes.
工艺和偷窃提升6点，持续40分钟。
Increases Craftmanship and Thievery by 8 for 1 hour.
工艺和偷窃提升8点，持续1小时。
Suppresses the effects of injury and your maximum Stamina decreases with Health 15% less. Lasts 10 minutes.
抑制受伤造成的影响，你的最大耐力因生命值降低的数值降低15%，持续10分钟。
Suppresses the effects of injury and your maximum Stamina decreases with Health 30% less, lasts 15 minutes.
抑制受伤造成的影响，你的最大耐力因生命值降低的数值降低30%，持续15分钟。
Suppresses the effects of injury and your maximum Stamina decreases with Health 50% less, lasts 20 minutes.
抑制受伤造成的影响，你的最大耐力因生命值降低的数值降低50%，持续20分钟。
Suppresses the effects of injury and your maximum Stamina decreases with Health 75% less, lasts 15 minutes.
抑制受伤造成的影响，你的最大耐力因生命值降低的数值降低75%，持续15分钟。
A strange tasteless and odourless liquid. I wonder what will happen if I drink it?
一份奇怪的液体，无色无味，喝下去会发生什么呢？
Drink one mouthful and you'll forget all earthly experience. Obliterates all perk points, so they can be used elsewhere.
喝下一口你就能忘掉年轻时的经历。重置所有技能点，这样你就可以重新分配了。
Saves the game, heals 10 health and increases Strength, Vitality and Agility by 1 for 3 minutes.
保存游戏，恢复10点生命值，且力量、活力和敏捷均提升1点，持续3分钟。
Saves the game, heals 20 Health points and increases Strength, Vitality and Agility by 2 for 5 minutes.
保存游戏，恢复20点生命值，且力量、活力和敏捷均提升2点，持续5分钟。
Saves the game, heals 30 Health points and increases Strength, Vitality and Agility by 3 for 8 minutes.
保存游戏，恢复30点生命值，且力量、活力和敏捷均提升3点，持续8分钟。
Increases Stamina by 60% and Stamina regeneration by 30% for 1 hour.
耐力提升60%，同时耐力恢复速度提升30%，持续1小时。
Increases Stamina by 30% and Stamina regeneration by 15% for 40 minutes.
耐力提升30%，同时耐力恢复速度提升25%，持续40分钟。
Pouches can be worn on the belt and usually hold small items such as food, bandages or potions, which are then more quickly available when one wants to use them.
口袋可挂在腰带上，通常用来存放一些诸如食物、绷带或药剂的小物品，必要时即可快速使用。
An old broken sword made of otherwise fine Damascene steel.
一把由精美的大马士革钢制成的旧剑，如今已经破损。
An appointment decree of Knight Ambrose to the honourable role of the Seneschal of the Knights of the Cross with the Red Star with the seal of the Grand Master.
任命安布洛斯骑士为红星十字骑士团执事的法令，盖有大团长的印章。
Diary entries of Conrad, a correctional officer of the Knights of the Cross.
红星十字骑士团惩戒骑士康拉德的日记。
The old bones of Ambrose's dead brother John.
安布洛斯亡兄约翰的遗骨。
Old chronicle of the Knights of the Cross with a red star. The blank sheets of parchment at the end of the book reveal that its author never finished it.
古老的红星十字骑士团的编年史，这本书的最后几页是空白的，看来作者并未能完成这本书。
An old letter to Seneschal Ambrose from a mysterious informer. It seems that Ambrose was once on the trail of a fire at the Order's commandery in the Old Town of Prague.
一封神秘线人写给安布洛斯总管的旧信。看起来安布洛斯曾经追查过布拉格老城区骑士团总部的火灾。
Some old scribbled notes from Seneschal Ambrose on the fire investigation.
安布洛斯总管关于火灾调查的旧笔记。
Brand new cloak with the Crusader's Red Cross symbol. It was only recently buried in the ground, unlike the rest of the old papers.
印有十字军红十字图案的崭新斗篷。与其他的老旧纸张不同，这件斗篷应该近期才被埋于地下。
A good blade of Toledo steel created from the broken sword of a dead hermit
一把好用的托莱多钢剑，由一位死去隐士的断剑重铸而成。
A good sword of Toledo steel, made from the broken sword of a hermit.
一把好用的托莱多钢剑，由一位隐士的断剑重铸而成。
A small wooden cross carved by the old hermit Ambrose.
一个由老隐士安布洛斯打造的木制十字架。
A fine dress that will make even an ordinary girl a lady worthy of a knight's favour.
惊艳到就连平平无奇的姑娘、女士穿上后都能得到骑士爱慕的长裙。
Bertha the cook's potion. Only she knows exactly what it does.
伯莎厨师的药水，只有她本人知道它有何用处。
An empty bottle with a foul smell coming from it. If someone drank this, it's no wonder they ended up the way they did.
散发着恶臭的空瓶子。如果有人喝了这里面的东西，他的下场可想而知。
Miller Kreyzl's finished book with personal dedication to Hermes Trismegistos.
磨坊主克雷泽以个人名义献给赫耳墨斯·特里斯墨吉斯忒斯的书。
A love letter whose contents only Regina understands.
一封情书，内容只有雷吉娜知道。
A piece of paper from the scribe Erazim posted next to his door at Trosky.
抄写员埃拉兹姆贴在特罗斯基房门旁的纸条。
A footpad's bow is shrouded in mystery, but there is no doubt that it is intended for hunting villagers and less well-equipped merchants.
一把充满神秘色彩的路贼弓，但可以肯定的是，这把弓专门用来抢劫村民和那些手无缚鸡之力的商人。
A mysterious playing die found in a ruined house. Suspiciously, it tends to land on 1.
一个神秘的骰子，经常骰出1点。
Key to the armoury of the Italian Court.
打开意大利宫军械库的钥匙。
A wooden statuette of St. Barbara made by an unknown wood carver.
不知名匠人制作的圣芭芭拉木雕。
It smells like regular ham, so I don't know what's so special about it.
闻起来就是普通的火腿，也不知到底有何特别之处。
The key to Csaba's private chest in the kitchen of the Italian Court.
查巴在意大利宫厨房里的私人箱子的钥匙。
A silver cross with a reliquary said to hold the foot bone of St. James.
一个银制十字架，据说在其内部藏有圣雅各布的足骨。
According to a legend told by a merchant, this drawing was made years ago by the famous Master Theodoric himself at the King Charles Inn in order to pay his debt to the innkeeper.
据一位商人说，这幅画是多年前著名的狄奥多里克大师在查理皇帝酒馆绘制的，用于偿还他的债务。
A key to the chambers in which Wenceslas' ally lords are imprisoned in the Italian court.
意大利宫的牢房钥匙，牢房里关押着瓦茨拉夫的盟友。
Juniper brandy, a pick-me-up for proper lads from the Upper Hungary. Csaba's well-guarded treasure.
杜松子白兰地，是上匈牙利小伙子们专用的提神酒，也是查巴的宝贝。
Minter's tools. Property of the Italian court.
铸币师的工具。这是意大利宫的所有物。
Scraps of a silver plate or waste from the minting of groschen. I reckon it's worth something.
银盘的碎片或铸造格罗申时的废料。我想应该还是值点钱的。
A ring originally belonging to Oats that I won in a game of dice against Tankard.
一枚原本属于奥兹的戒指，我在和坦卡德的骰子游戏中赢来的战利品。
Pretzel, with salt and caraway, dried and hard.
椒盐卷饼，加了盐和藏茴香，又干又硬。
Equipment of the poaching nobleman Hans Capon. Evidence for the gamekeeper Varel.
贵族汉斯·卡蓬的偷猎装备，猎场看守人瓦雷尔将其用作物证。
Poacher's kit found in the woods of Kopanina. My dog should be able to track down its owner.
在科帕尼那森林里发现的偷猎者装备。我的狗应该能追踪到这装备的主人。
A hunting knife, which the poacher from Slatego had in his possession. Evidence for the huntsman. A dog may be able to sniff out its owner's encampment.
一把猎刀，斯拉戈偷猎者的私人物品。可作为证据交给猎人，猎犬或许能嗅出其主的位置。
Equipment of the poachers from their camp in Lower Semine. Evidence for the huntsman.
从下塞米偷猎者营地弄到的装备，可作为证据交给猎人。
Equipment of a poaching bandit from the Lower Semine. Evidence for the huntsman.
来自下塞米的强盗的偷猎装备，可作为证据交给猎人。
A poacher's knife found in the Slatejov forests. Evidence for the huntsman. A dog should be able to sniff out its owner.
一把在斯拉戈森林发现的偷猎者短刀。可作为证据交给猎人，猎犬或许能嗅出其主的位置。
The gear the poacher from Rocktower pond was carrying on him. It'll serve as evidence for Gamekeeper Vostatek.
石塔池塘偷猎者的偷猎装备，猎场看守人沃斯塔克将其用作物证。
Poacher's equipment found in a ruin near the Rocktower pond. Evidence for the huntsman. A dog may be able to track down its owner.
在石塔池塘附近的废墟中发现的偷猎者装备。可作为证据交给猎人，猎犬或许能嗅出它主人的气味。
Rusty key to a chest in the camp of the Vidlak poacher.
锈迹斑斑的钥匙，用于打开偷猎者维德拉克的营地中的箱子。
The gear that the Vidlak poacher was carrying on him. Evidence for Gamekeeper Vostatek.
维德拉克偷猎者的偷猎装备，猎场看守人沃斯塔克将其用作物证。
Poacher's kit found in a secret stash in the woods near the Vidlak pond. Proof for the gamekeeper - my dog should be able to track down its owner.
一套偷猎者装备，发现于维德拉克池塘附近树林里的一个秘密藏身处，可以作为证据交给猎场看守人——我的狗应该能追踪到这装备的主人。

It might look awful, but offal and entrails are all healthy, the heart most of all. You can fry or boil them or add them to soups. The main thing is to use everything and not waste any of the carcass.
虽然看起来很恶心，但动物的内脏其实有益于健康，尤其是心脏部分。你可以把它们煎、煮或加入汤中。最重要的是要物尽其用，不然太浪费了。

Hare meat is very good, healthy and tender. It's a welcome addition to the diet of many villagers. You can prepare it with onions by taking the whole hare and putting it in a baking dish. Salt it and pour some butter under it. Once roasted, cut it into pieces, put it in some beer and continue to cook with a little vinegar. Meanwhile, fry some onion in fat until golden brown. Then add it to the sauce, thicken with breadcrumbs or flour and cook until done. You can season it with any spice you have.
兔肉味道鲜美，口感嫩滑，营养价值也很高，广受村民们喜爱。你可以把整只兔子撒上盐和洋葱放入烤盘中，在下面倒入一些黄油后开始烤制，烤好后切成小块，加入少量啤酒和醋继续烹调。同时用脂肪把洋葱煎炸至金黄色，加入酱汁之中，用面包屑或面粉勾芡，煮至兔肉熟透。你也可以加入任何你想要的香料来调味。
Cooked wild hare meat. White and tender, just like chicken.
熟野兔肉，又白又嫩，像鸡肉一样。
There's even less of that little bunny now, but at least it won't spoil so fast.
风干过的兔肉变得更少，但至少不会很快变质了。
Hare meat is tender, tasty and healthy. Only hares aren't very big, so it might not fill your belly.
兔肉鲜嫩、美味且健康。但兔子很小一只，可能吃不饱。
The rusty key to the shed where the greengrocer Veisar locks his dog Monarch.
一把生锈钥匙，可以打开菜农维萨的狗狗“国王”的棚屋。
A gift from Ignatius the knacker. Gloves made of fine deerskin are flexible and retain feeling in the fingers, making them perfect for grave digging or perhaps even thieving.
废畜屠夫伊格内修斯赠予的礼物。这副优质鹿皮制成的手套柔韧性强，穿戴时仍保留着手指的触觉，因而非常适合戴来掘墓，没准用来偷鸡摸狗也不在话下。
The knacker's sack for carrying carrion. It smells just like you'd expect it to.
装腐肉的袋子。和你想的一样难闻。
The key to the door of the Slatego ruins, where the gravedigger Ignatius has a trap for wild animals.
打开斯拉戈遗址大门的钥匙。掘墓人伊格内修斯在那里设下了一处捕捉野生动物的陷阱。
Increases strength and, if good quality, reduces how much Stamina it costs to attack and defend.
提升力量，高品质药剂还会降低攻击和防御时消耗的耐力。
Increases riding and dog-handling skills. If good quality, animals will take less notice of you and dogs won't bark at you.
可提升骑术以及训犬能力，高品质药剂还可让你不会轻易被动物察觉，且可避免犬类对你吠叫。
Reduces Nourishment and cures food poisoning and in better quality any poisoning. In better qualities it also increases Vitality.
降低营养的同时治愈食物中毒，高质量药剂可以治愈所有类型的中毒，更高质量的药剂还可以提升活力。
The bearded axe is a battle axe which is a simple tool in its origin, but it can chop down shields as well as trees.
由简单工具演化而来的一种战斧，既能劈开盾牌，也能砍倒树木。
The battle axe, called a broadaxe, is related to the ordinary carpenter's axe, but is much lighter and forged specifically for combat. It's a good weapon against shields and chainmail.
这种战斧又称宽刃斧，与普通木匠斧相似，但要轻得多，专门为战斗而锻造。能轻松劈开盾牌和锁甲。
The horseman's pick is a light riding axe with a spike. Used correctly, it's a good friend in a pinch. Its sharp point can cut through armour, its blade through any shield.
骑兵斧是一种带有尖刺的轻型骑兵斧。使用得当的话，在紧要关头能发挥很大用处。它锋利的斧尖可以轻易击穿盔甲，而斧刃则可以劈开任何盾牌。
A knight's battle axe. A dexterous weapon that can pierce good armour or crush the bones underneath with its spike. It also has a pointed tip to finish off tougher opponents.
骑士战斧是一种灵活的武器，其刃既可以击穿坚固的盔甲，也可以敲碎盔甲之下的骨头。它还有一个尖头，可以用来对付更难缠的对手。
Cuman long-handled fokosz. A fast and agile weapon of the Hungarian raiders. It can pierce light armour or the skull of a good Christian.
库曼长柄战斧。匈牙利人常用的一种敏捷的武器。它可以轻易穿透轻甲，或击碎一个基督徒的头骨。
A lightweight, well-forged battleaxe. The blade forged to a point replaces the spike, which can be used to cut through chainmail and the belly underneath.
轻便，锻造精良的战斧。斧刃被锻造成尖头形状，代替了传统的尖刺，可以用来切穿锁子甲，开肠破肚。
Lightweight axe designed for work in the woods or on the farm. An invaluable tool for all woodcutters, but also for angry people who don't have a better weapon at hand.
轻便的工作斧，专为森林或农场的工作而设计。对伐木工来说是必备的工具，而对愤怒的人而言，在手头没有其他东西的时候也能做一件趁手兵器。
Heavy work axe used by carpenters for working beams. If there's no better weapon at hand, it can become a tool of revenge.
木匠用来加工横梁的重型工作斧。但如果手头没有别的武器，它自然也可以用来反击。
Depletes 110 health and therefore leads to certain death. In better quality, it depletes health faster. It's better for poisoning cauldrons than applying to weapons.
消耗110点生命，可能导致死亡。更高品质的药剂会更快生效，对锅中食材下毒的效果比在武器上涂毒要更好。
Improves speech and speeds up reading if good quality. Also increases the amount of experience gained if best quality.
提升口才能力，高品质药剂还可提高阅读速度，且当药剂品质最优时则提高经验获取量。
A blacksmith's horseshoe sketch. Because every master had to start somehow.
铁匠的马蹄铁草图。每个大师都是从这种小事开始的。
Improves your Archery skill and, if good quality, reduces loss of Stamina while aiming.
提升射箭能力，高品质药剂还能降低瞄准时所需的耐力消耗。
Sleep heals you faster and if good quality, Energy replenishes faster while sleeping.
睡眠可以更快地为你恢复伤势，如果睡眠状态良好，也会更快地恢复能量。
Increases Agility and in better qualities reduces how much stamina sprinting drains.
提升敏捷，更高质量的药剂可以降低冲刺的耐力消耗。
Increases energy and in better qualities slows down fatigue.
可以增加能量，高品质的药剂还可以减缓疲劳。
Fever and its complications can often end in death. This tonic will relieve and soothe the fever if given in time.
发烧及相关病症常常会导致死亡，而及时服用此种药剂将可缓解发热症状。
Reduces drunkenness or, in better quality, removes it completely. In better qualities it also helps with hangovers or alcoholism.
缓解醉酒，较高品质的药剂可以完全消除醉酒，更高品质的药剂可以缓解宿醉或酒精中毒。
Gradually heals part of your health. Helps against hangover, or cures it immediately if good quality.
可缓慢恢复部分生命值，并可缓解宿醉效果，高品质药剂则可立即解除宿醉。
Henry's home-brewed moonshine. A strong drink that is sure to put you in a good mood.
亨利自家的私酿酒。虽口感浓烈，但定能让你神清气爽。
The hunting sword is the faithful companion of every hunter or poacher. It is usually used to finish off hunted game, but it's also handy for cutting kindling for a fire.
狩猎剑是每个猎人（或者偷猎者）的忠实伙伴，通常用来终结猎物的生命，但也可以用于砍柴生火。
An older cousin of the broad-bladed sword. A somewhat outdated weapon for some, perhaps, but there's nothing like tried and tested methods on the battlefield.
宽刃剑的前身。对一些人来说可能稍显过时，但在战场上，经受过时间考验的东西才真正可靠。
A beautiful hunting sword with a hilt made of deer antler will not disgrace even a nobleman. It is usually used to put out hunted game, but it will also help against uninvited forest visitors.
以鹿角为柄的狩猎剑，十分漂亮，就算是贵族使用也不辱其身份。它通常用来结束猎物的生命，但也可以刺穿不速之客的喉咙。
Shashka is similar to a long knife and quite unmistakable with its pommel in the form of a bird of prey. It originated on the Kyiv steppes, but was also favoured by the Cumans of Hungary.
“沙什卡”是一种独特的弯刀，它的剑首锻造成了猛禽的形状。这种武器起源于基辅大草原，但也受到匈牙利库曼人的喜爱。
A perfectly balanced long sword with a wide blade is the golden mean. What it loses in speed it makes up for in durability.
一把完美平衡且剑刃较宽的长剑，理想之选。尽管在速度上有所欠缺，但耐久十分优秀。

The longsword is a perfectly balanced lethal weapon. Its price is not small, because only a master of his craft can forge a thin yet flexible blade! The longsword is not meant for the heat of battle, but for swift swordplay.
这把长剑是拥有完美平衡的致命武器。它价格不菲，因为只有锻造大师才能造出如此轻薄而灵活的剑刃。这把剑不适合用在战场上，是为了快节奏的剑术格斗打造的。
A perfectly balanced sword with a slender blade for true sword masters. The longsword is a noble weapon for swordfighting and a quick way to send any fool to the other side.
一把平衡感堪称完美的长剑，剑刃纤细，适合真正的剑术大师。长剑是高贵的武器，也可以将瞧不起它的蠢货轻松送入地狱。
This sword has been through a lot, and with a little care, could still be.
这把剑历经沧桑，如果稍加保养，仍然可以继续使用。
A heavier long blade will last longer and won't break easily, but it must be balanced by a much larger pommel. This sword is designed for actual battle rather than a quick sword fight.
更重的剑在战场上更为耐用，不容易断裂，但需要更结实的剑柄。这把剑是为战场设计的，在要求速度的剑术格斗中并不适用。
You will see better in the dark and your Energy will deplete slower or if good quality, not at all.
你于黑暗中的视觉将得到提升，且能量消耗速度降低，高品质药剂可以避免能量消耗。
Suppresses injury effects and reduces how much maximum stamina decreases with health.
缓解负伤效果，并减少因生命值下降而导致的最大耐力减值。
Disables running and reduces weapon skills. In better qualities, it also reduces Health. It's better suited to applying to weapons than poisoning food pots.
受害者将无法奔跑，武器技能降低，更高质量的药剂还能降低生命值。比起在锅中食材里下毒，这种药剂更适合涂在武器上。
A weak but long-lasting perfume. Slightly increases Charisma for a long period, but reduces Charisma if used with another perfume.
此种香水气味清淡，但可长久留香。使用后可在较长时间内略微提升魅力值，若与其他香水混合使用将会降低魅力值。
A strong but short-lasting perfume. Substantially increases charisma for short periods, but reduces charisma if combined with another perfume.
此种香水香飘十里，却难长久留香，其可在短时间内大幅度提升魅力值，若与其他香水混合使用将会降低魅力值。
A copy of the order of Sir George of Wartenberg for a beautiful poleaxe.
和瓦滕贝格的乔治爵士订购的漂亮长柄斧属于同一款式。
If you want to put to rights the imprudent choices of your life, all it takes is 1 mouthful, and you can chose your perks anew. Beware, though, the procedure is irreversible and painful!
曾经那些草率的决定让你有所懊悔了吗？想重新分配技能点就喝上一口吧。但是注意啦，这个过程可不好受，而且将无法挽回！

An unusual curved blade used by nomads on fast horses in the middle of the Hungarian steppes and the remote Arabian deserts. It can be swift and excellent for offense and defense. Every good Christian should beware of losing his head to such a weapon.
一种不寻常的弯刃刀，匈牙利平原和遥远的阿拉伯沙漠中的游牧民族会一边骑着快马，一边使用它们发起迅捷的攻击和防御。每一个好基督徒都应当心，以免自己的头被这种武器砍掉。

An unusual curved blade used by nomads on fast horses in the middle of the Hungarian steppes and remote Arabian deserts. It can be swift and excellent for offense and defense. Every good Christian should beware of losing his head to such a weapon.
一种不寻常的弯刃刀，匈牙利平原和遥远的阿拉伯沙漠中的游牧民族会一边骑着快马，一边使用它们发起迅捷的攻击和防御。每一个好基督徒都应当心，以免自己的头被这种武器砍掉。
Saves your game, and when brewed well also increases your Strength, Vitality and Agility.
喝下它后保存游戏。如果酿造得当，还会提升你的力量、活力和敏捷。
A book by the Wysoka parish priest. He spent many years working on it…
一位维索卡牧师撰写的书籍，他花费了多年时间才完成此书......

A short sword that is said to have been given its special name because of its origin. Whether it really originated in the Swiss city of Basel is questionable, but it is certainly a great weapon that can be carried, unlike the sword, even by non-noble townspeople.
这种短剑据说得名于它们的发源地，但是否真的起源于瑞士城市巴塞尔目前尚存疑问。但它确实是优秀的武器，贵族和平民都可以携带。
A light sword with a wide blade and a thin tip, it stings like a wasp sting.
一把剑刃宽而剑尖细的轻剑，用起来像黄蜂的刺一般凶猛。
A sword for the noble and those who think they can pass themselves off as such. Its beauty slightly exceeds its combat qualities, but it is still a superb weapon.
适合贵族（或者冒充贵族的人）佩戴的长剑，比起战斗性能更注重美观，但依然是实用的好武器。
A terrible skull opener or a mere figment of the tortured mind of a clumsy apprentice who abused the blacksmith's craft to create such wickedness and called it a hunting sword?
是一把可怕的开颅刀，还是一个笨拙的学徒滥用铁匠工艺创造出的，号称狩猎剑的邪恶产物？
Although it looks quite ordinary, this sword is well forged and perfectly balanced. This is the kind of weapon a swordsmith makes for battle, not for show.
虽然看起来很普通，但这把剑锻造精良，且十分平衡称手。这是铁匠为战斗锻造的兵器，而非单纯的展示品。
Gunpowder used to fire lead shot that even the best plate armour can't stop at close range.
用于发射铅弹的火药，即便是最坚硬的板甲也无法承受如此火药轰出的近距离射击。
Gunpowder for shooting scrap iron and other small projectiles. It'll pierce anyone at close range, hit no one at a distance.
用于发射废铁或其它小型弹丸的火药，在近距离可以穿透一切，但远距离效果很差。
Reduces restedness to 0. Reduces stamina regeneration if good quality. Suitable for applying to weapons and for poisoning cooking pots.
可将休息度降至0，高品质药剂还将降低耐力的恢复速率。无论是用作餐中毒药还是涂抹武器都有所奇效。
可提升偷窃技能和工艺技能。
You can't wash your own clothes without soap.
Increases stamina and increases stamina regeneration if good quality.
可提升耐力值，高品质药剂还将提升耐力恢复速率。
Reduces loss of health and slows bleeding.
降低生命值损失，并减缓流血效果。
The mysterious chest that Posy and Tugbone had been searching for so long. I wonder what's inside?
“花骨朵”和“扯骨”寻找了很久的神秘箱子。里面有什么呢？
The key to the Cuman Sharkan's chest.
库曼人沙康的箱子钥匙。
A set of tools for repairing metal parts of armour, chainmail and quilted armour pieces. Includes a hammer, pliers, twine and some replacement chainmail and oil.
一套工具，用于修理盔甲、链甲和绗缝盔甲的金属部件。包含锤子、钳子、麻线以及一些备用的锁甲片和润滑油。
A set of tools for keeping your bow or crossbow in good condition. Includes lubricant, replacement bowstrings, and tools to repair other minor damage.
一套工具，用于修理及维护弓弩。包含润滑剂、备用弓弦以及其它修复轻微损伤的工具。
A set of tools for repairing boots and other leather items. Includes a cobber's hammer, pliers, lard, wire, rivets and various small nails.
一套工具，用于修理靴子和其它皮革制品。包含鞋匠锤、钳子、猪油、铁丝、铆钉和各种小钉子。
